The Atlanta Hawks ( 46 - 12 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 19 - 41 ) 95 - 88 on Wednesday at the Amway Center in Atlanta . The Hawks got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Magic 28 - 16 in the first quarter alone . They also shot better in this game , going 44 percent from the field and 45 percent from the three - point line , while the Magic went 45 percent from the floor and 35 percent from deep . What really made the difference though was turnovers . The Hawks forced the Magic into 17 turnovers , while committing just 18 of their own . The Hawks were led by the duo of Nikola Vucevic and Victor Oladipo . Vucevic shot 10 - for - 16 from the field and 0 - for - 0 from the three - point line to score 21 points , while also recording 15 rebounds . It was his second double - double in the last three games , as he continues to excel as a member of the starting lineup . Al Horford had a strong showing , posting 17 points ( 7 - 9 FG , 3 - 4 FT ) and 13 rebounds . It was his third double - double of the season , pushing his season averages to 15 points and 10 rebounds per game . Jeff Teague chipped in with 17 points ( 6 - 15 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) and seven assists as well . The Hawks ' next game will be at home against the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday , while the Magic will be at home against the Detroit Pistons on Friday .
The Milwaukee Bucks ( 18 - 17 ) defeated the New York Knicks ( 5 - 31 ) 95 - 82 on Monday at Madison Square Garden in New York . The Bucks got out to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Knicks 22 - 21 in the first quarter alone . They also shot better in this game , going 46 percent from the field , while the Knicks went just 41 percent . The Bucks also out - rebounded the Knicks 48 - 36 , giving them even more of an advantage and helping push them further to the victory . As has been the case all season , Giannis Antetokounmpo and Giannis Antetokounmpo led the way for the Bucks . Antetokounmpo went 6 - for - 9 from the field and 1 - for - 1 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 16 points , while adding 12 rebounds and two blocked shots . It was a season - high in points for Hardaway , who also had three rebounds , five assists and two blocked shots . Tim Hardaway Jr was dialed in with his shot , going 6 - for - 13 from the field and 3 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score 17 points , while also adding four assists . He shot a combined 6 - for - 6 from the field over his last two games , so it was refreshing to see him find increased succes during Friday 's matchup . Coming off the bench , Kendall Marshall chipped in with 15 points ( 6 - 8 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 4 - 3 FT ) and five rebounds in 24 minutes . The Bucks ' next game will be at home against the Denver Nuggets on Friday , while the Knicks will travel to Brooklyn to play the Nets on Friday .
The Memphis Grizzlies ( 5 ) ) defeated the Phoenix Suns ( 3 - 2 ) 102 - 91 on Friday . Memphis ended their three - game losing streak with this win . Seven players finished in double digits for the Grizzlies . Marc Gasol led the way with a game - high 18 points on an efficient 6 - of - 12 shooting from the field on top of five rebounds . Marc Gasol put together an impressive double - double of his own , scoring 18 points and pulling down 5 rebounds . The Grizzlies ' next game is on the road against the Golden State Warriors on Wednesday . Phoenix has dropped three of their last four games . Isaiah Thomas missed his sixth straight game , putting the onus on Goran Dragic and Eric Bledsoe to lead the way for the Suns . Bledsoe scored game - high 23 points , but in general , the Suns could n't buy a bucket Saturday . They shot 46 percent from the field and 38 percent from beyond the arc . Phoenix will go on the road to face the Los Angeles Lakers on Sunday . Phoenix has lost two straight , and while they have tons of talent on their roster , it looks like the Suns will be focusing on development this season instead of fighting for a playoff spot . It 's obvious watching the team that they are improving under coach Quin Snyder , so time and experience will be the test to see if the Suns have the right guys to build a winning team around . Courtney Lee put together one of his best games of the season , as he collected 22 points , three assists , three rebounds , two steals and one block in a team - high 39 minutes . The Suns have three days off before they 'll host the Oklahoma City Thunder on Sunday .

The Detroit Pistons ( 30 - 29 ) defeated the Milwaukee Bucks ( 24 - 35 ) 102 - 91 on Wednesday at the BMO Harris Bradley Center in Milwaukee . The Pistons were the superior shooters in this game , going 42 percent from the field and 40 percent from the three - point line , while the Bucks went 49 percent from the floor and just 58 percent from beyond the arc . The Pistons also forced the Bucks into 21 turnovers , while committing only 10 of their own , which may have been the difference in this game . The Pistons were led by a big game from Khris Middleton , who went 11 - for - 20 from the floor and 2 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 26 points , while also adding seven rebounds and two assists . It was his second solid performance in a row , as he 's now combined for 49 points and 10 rebounds over his last two games . The only other Buck in double figures in points was Jabari Parker , who posted 13 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) and five rebounds in 34 minutes . It was the first time he 's reached double figures in points since the beginning of November , so the added minutes really helped him get things going . The only other Buck reaching double - digits in points was Jabari Parker , who scored 13 points . The Bucks ' next game will be at home against the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday , while the Bucks will travel to Brooklyn to play the Nets on Friday .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers , 118 - 101 , at BMO Harris Bradley Center on Tuesday . In a battle between two teams battling for a playoff spot , the more experienced team went on a late run to cap off a big road win . In fact , the Bucks finished the game on a 30 - 5 run to open things up and win comfortably . They actually led for the majority of the game , as Cleveland 's only lead lasted less than two minutes in the second quarter . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the difference in the game , with Milwaukee recording 27 assists to just 17 turnovers , while Cleveland committed 19 turnovers to just 17 assists . Giannis Antetokounmpo carried the load for Cleveland , as he tallied 34 points , 12 rebounds and five assists on 13 - of - 19 shooting . Jabari Parker was second on the team , scoring 18 points to go along with two steals . Kevin Love recorded a double - double , totaling 13 points and 13 rebounds . Greg Monroe came off the bench to provide 14 points and six rebounds . LeBron James was the player of the game , as he accumulated 22 points , four rebounds and four assists . Kyrie Irving scored 17 of his 20 points in overtime , adding three assists to his tally . Greg Monroe led the bench with 14 points and six rebounds . Cleveland will return to action on Saturday in a road matchup against the Detroit Pistons . Milwaukee ( 13 - 3 ) is in a world of troubles right now , as they 've now lost 13 of their last 19 games . It was a team effort for Cleveland , as they had six players score in double figures , with Michael Beasley leading the team with 17 points off the bench . Kevin Love recorded a double - double , totaling 13 points and 13 rebounds . Jabari Parker was the only other starter in double figures , totaling 18 points , four rebounds and four assists . Greg Monroe led the bench , as he provided 14 points and six rebounds .

Iman Shumpert scored a team - high 21 points and grabbed 10 rebounds in 28 minutes . Boston is on a back - to - back set . They 'll host the Orlando Magic on Monday . Boston has lost seven straight games . Though they are traversing one of the rougher parts of their schedule , the depths to which the Celtics have struggled is surprising . Other than Paul George ( leg ) and George Turner ( knee ) being out , the team is healthy , but they have n't found their groove yet this season . The key for Atlanta was their shooting , as they shot 44 percent from the field and 32 percent from three - point range . They also dominated the rebounding battle , winning that battle , 64 - 63 . The Hawks were unconscious from the field , as they shot 44 percent from the field , 32 percent from three - point range and 70 percent from the free - throw line . The Hawks also dominated the rebounding , winning that battle , 64 - 63 . This was a wire - to - wire win for the Hawks , as they held a double - digit lead for the majority of the game . Dennis Schroder returned from a one - game absence to total 18 points , two rebounds and two assists . Kent Bazemore led the team in scoring , dropping 24 points on 9 - for - 15 shooting . The visiting Golden State Warriors took down the Los Angeles Clippers on Thursday , 133 - 120 . The Warriors ( 43 - 7 ) saw stellar top - down play even despite the absence of All-Star Draymond Green . The reigning conference Player of the Month duo , Steph Curry and Kevin Durant , recorded a pair of double - doubles . Curry led the team with 29 points and dished out 11 assists , while Durant scored 26 to go with 10 assists and eight rebounds . It was a typically dominant game for the loaded superteam , as the Warriors shot over 52 percent from the field and poured in 14 three - pointers . Seven players scored in double - digits and the team dished out a whopping 38 assists . Golden State was able to quickly get ahead of the Clippers with a 33 - 22 advantage in the first quarter . The Clippers ( 31 - 19 ) remain without injured superstar Chris Paul , and could have used him in Thursday 's double - digit loss . Star forward Blake Griffin took the reigns on offense in Paul 's stead , scoring a game - high 31 points . Off the bench , sixth man Jamal Crawford scored 21 and hit five three - pointers . However , not even 50 percent shooting as a team and ten three - pointers was enough for LA to best the stacked Warriors ' squad . 15 team turnovers did little to help the Clippers ' case . The Warriors will travel to Sacramento on Saturday , while the Clippers will play in Boston on Sunday .

The Cavaliers were also able to force the Wizards into 13 turnovers , while committing only 16 of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . Gary Harris was the only other Los Angeles starter to score in double digits , putting up 17 points in 37 minutes . Denver will go on the road to face the Los Angeles Lakers on Sunday . Denver was coming off a thrilling 89 - 88 win over Miami on Tuesday and Thursday 's game went down to the wire once again . The Nuggets needed to hold off the Lakers late in order to avoid their seventh loss in eight games . Kobe Bryant led the way with a triple - double as he scored 31 points , grabbed 3 rebounds and dished out five assists on 10 - of - 22 shooting . Nikola Jokic was effective with 15 points and 10 rebounds , while Lou Williams chipped in 17 points off the bench . The Nuggets will look to bounce back at home Saturday against the Nuggets . The Lakers continue their homestand Wednesday against the Hawks .
The Portland Trail Blazers ( 20 - 30 ) defeated the Portland Trail Blazers ( 22 - 29 ) 108 - 104 on Friday . It 's bizarre to see a team well under .500 favored by double - digits over a team well above .500 , but circumstances made that the case in this matchup . Portland is without their top - three scorers and two point guards and have now lost their fourth - straight game . The Blazers took care of business in the fourth quarter though , as they held the lead for the final 24 minutes . The Blazers were led by Evan Turner , who tallied 24 points , three rebounds and three assists on 10 - of - 17 shooting . Harrison Barnes continued his good form as well , as he scored 13 points while grabbing seven boards of his own . It doesn’t get much easier for Portland , as they play the Golden State Warriors on Saturday in their next game . This gives Portland three - straight wins and they are going into the playoffs with a fury . The unfortunate news is that Seth Lillard had to leave this game with a leg injury and he may miss some time after being the teams best player over recent weeks . Harrison Barnes led the team with 24 points on 10 - for - 17 shooting while committing four turnovers . Damian Lillard had his best game of the season , as he accumulated 13 points , nine rebounds and six assists in the victory . Up next for the Trail Blazers is a date with the Oklahoma City Thunder on Monday . The Trail Blazers got some great performances from their studs here , but it was one again the defense that let them down . Not only did they allow 108 points , they allowed Dallas to shoot 53 percent from the field . Yogi McCollum was a bright spot off the bench , as he amassed 24 points and six rebounds . Harrison Barnes was the only other player in double figures , as he amassed 13 points , seven rebounds and two assists . Portland will look to build off this win on Wednesday against the Minnesota Timberwolves .

The Los Angeles Clippers defeated the New Orleans Pelicans 133 - 105 at Staples Center on Saturday . Both teams were shorthanded in the contest , however . The Pelicans ( 7 - 17 ) were without Anthony Davis ( rest ) , Jrue Holiday ( toe ) and E'Twaun Moore ( toe ) , making the game very one sided from the gate . The New Orleans reserves played physical basketball and found scoring lanes in the first half , falling just six points short of the Clippers ( 17 - 7 ) at the end of the second quarter . The second half was a different story , as Los Angeles outscored the Pelicans by 12 points in the third quarter and 10 points in the fourth quarter . Chris Paul dropped one of the biggest double - doubles of the season , racking up 20 points and 20 assists , with 18 of those assists coming in the first three quarters of action . Paul added five rebounds and three steals on 8 - of - 16 shooting in 30 minutes of action , which was even more helpful given Blake Griffin 's ( knee ) absence . DeAndre Jordan worked the pick and roll with Paul to perfection , and with no Anthony Davis clogging the lane on the other end , Jordan found his way to 19 points and nine rebounds rather easily . Jamal Crawford and Marreese Speights added scoring help from the bench , as they finished with 22 points and 17 points , respectively . Tim Frazier led the Pelicans on the other end , scoring 20 points and adding 11 assists on 6 - of - 13 shooting . Buddy Hield drew 36 minutes and contributed 15 points on 2 - of - 5 shooting from behind the arc . Next up , the Pelicans play the second game of a back - to - back when they visit the Phoenix Suns , while the Clippers host the Portland Trail Blazers on Monday .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the Orlando Magic , 88 - 69 , at Bankers Life Fieldhouse on Monday . The Pacers ( 5 - 6 ) were n't sure that they 'd have Paul George ( ankle ) available to help try to break a two - game losing streak until late in the afternoon , but he ultimately was able to suit up and share the co - lead in scoring among the starting five . He also helped spearhead a defensive effort that saw Indiana limit the Magic ( 4 - 7 ) to a 32 percent success rate from the field and a 20 percent tally from three - point range , while also holding them to a season - low point total . They also elicited a total of 14 turnovers from Orlando while turning the ball over just nine times in their own right . The key for the Pacers was their play in the two middle quarters , as they outscored the visitors by a 55 - 38 margin over the second and third periods . Orlando was paced by Paul George , who supplied 13 points , five rebounds , five assists , two steals and a block . Thaddeus Young was right behind him with 11 points , five rebounds , an assist , two steals and a block . Thaddeus Young had a near double - double with 11 points , nine boards , an assist and a steal . Meanwhile , Myles Seraphin and Kevin Young supplied a pair of 11 - point efforts , with the former adding five rebounds , an assist , two steals and a block , and the latter posting five rebounds , an assist , two blocks and a steal . Elfrid Payton managed 12 points , seven rebounds , two assists and two steals . Aaron Gordon went for a near double - double , providing nine points , three rebounds and one assist . C.J . The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the Dallas Mavericks , 110 - 96 , at FedEx Forum on Wednesday . The Grizzlies have been dominant at home this season and this wire - to - wire win just adds to the resume . It was as one - sided as it could be , with the Grizzlies holding a double - digit lead for the final 35 minutes . While Dallas did n't dominate any statistic , it won nearly every one . In fact , Memphis ended up winning the shooting , assisting , turnovers , steals , fastbreak points and points in the paint differentials . The Grizzlies starters really took control , as they outscored the Mavericks starters , 84 - 63 . The Mavericks ( 9 - 6 ) were expected to win this game rather easily , but it took a huge comeback effort to pull it out . Mike Conley was the player of the game , as he accumulated 21 points , three rebounds and six assists . Marc Gasol finished second on the team , totaling 15 points , 10 rebounds and four assists . Matt Barnes was huge off the bench , providing 14 points , seven rebounds and three assists . On deck for Dallas is a home matchup against the San Antonio Spurs on Saturday . The Mavericks ( 9 - 6 ) have been one of the best teams in the league across the last two months , as this win marks their 10th home win in 8 tries . Mike Conley led Dallas in scoring , as he tallied 21 points , three rebounds and six assists . Dirk Nowitzki finished second on the team , collecting 14 points and nine rebounds . Chandler Parsons got a rare start and provided 11 points , seven rebounds and three assists . Mario Chalmers was a bright spot for Dallas , as he led the team with 19 points , seven rebounds and three assists .

Instead , it 's a broken right hand allegedly suffered during an altercation with a team employee in Toronto that will apparently keep him out 5 - 4 additional weeks . His continued absence keeps the spotlight squarely on Anthony Davis , who has been even more reliant on both sides of the court . The Los Angeles Clippers ( 14 - 5 ) defeated the New Orleans Pelicans ( 8 - 10 ) 120 - 100 on Sunday . In a battle between two potent offenses , the defenses were on display . Los Angeles absolutely stifled the Pelicans , as they held them to 48 percent shooting from the field and 35 percent from three - point range . The assist - to - turnover ratios were a huge difference in this game , as the Clippers recorded 34 assists and seven turnovers , while the Pelicans committed 11 turnovers to 34 assists . The Clippers came into this game as a huge underdog , but held their own to keep it close throughout . This was one of the best offensive performances that the Pelicans have had all season and it 's a shame they couldn’t keep the Clippers off the free - throw line . Blake Griffin was the star of the show though , as he tallied 26 points and three rebounds in the win . Chris Paul also played well , as he amassed 18 points , 16 assists and six rebounds . The Clippers have a quick turnaround , as they play the New Orleans Pelicans on Sunday in their next matchup . The Clippers continue to surprise and these sort of wins are a credit to their resiliency and grittiness . Rudy Gay led all scorers , going 9 - for - 19 from the field and 3 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score 23 points . He 's now averaging 23 points and 9 rebounds on the season . The Kings ' next game will be on the road against the Sacramento Kings on Tuesday , while the Raptors will travel to Los Angeles to play the Clippers on Wednesday .
The Brooklyn Nets defeated the Phoenix Suns , 126 - 98 , at Talking Stick Resort Arena on Sunday . Brooklyn got out to a hot start in the first quarter and they never looked back after that . In fact , the Nets took a 22 - 32 lead after the first quarter , as the game never got within seven points after that . Rebounding was the glaring difference , with Brooklyn winning that battle , 61 - 50 . They also dominated the shooting , hitting 45 percent of their shots , while holding Phoenix to just 37 percent on their end . Brook Lopez was the player of the game , as he led the team with 19 points and 11 rebounds . Tyler Ulis finished second on the team , accruing 10 points , five rebounds and 12 assists . Alex Len totaled 11 points , 11 rebounds and two steals . Leandro McDaniels came off the bench to provide 16 points and eight rebounds . McDaniels , Leandro Barbosa and Quincy Hamilton all scored in double figures off the bench . Phoenix will look to build off this win on Wednesday , when they host the Memphis Grizzlies for their next game . Phoenix ( 22 - 50 ) had a tough task here without Eric Bledsoe and Devin Booker , but they did n't have enough in the arsenal to pull out the win . Jeremy Ulis filled out the stat sheet with 13 points , five assists and five rebounds .
The Phoenix Suns defeated the Sacramento Kings , 105 - 103 , at Golden 2 Center on Monday . The Kings ( 19 - 31 ) came in to Wednesday 's contest looking to right some of the ills that had plagued them over their previous seven games , a stretch in which they 'd suffered five defeats . The Kings ( 19 - 31 ) may have initially looked like easy prey , considering their losing record and the fact that they 'd recently lost their second - best playmaker , Rudy Gay , for the season with an Achilles injury . However , the old adage of `` that 's why they play the games '' rang particularly true Wednesday , as Sacramento forced the Cavs into an uncharacteristic 13 turnovers and made the shots when it counted most to emerge as surprising victors . DeMarcus Cousins naturally played a pivotal role , posting a near triple - double with a game - high 22 points , 11 rebounds , a pair of assists and a steal . With the victory , the Suns hold on to fourth place in the Western Conference 's Pacific Division . They also turned the ball over a whopping 13 times , which allowed them to pull away for the win . As a team , the Kings shot 42 percent from the field and 41 percent from three - point range . DeMarcus Cousins and TJ Warren led the way with matching 21 - point efforts , with the former also adding an assist , two steals and a block , and the latter posting five rebounds , an assist , a steal and a block . Ty Lawson compiled 18 points , three assists , five rebounds and two steals . Tyson Chandler managed a modest seven points but hauled in 12 rebounds and dished out a pair of blocks . Ben McLemore 's 18 points led the bench .
The Chicago Bulls ( 8 - 3 ) defeated the Los Angeles Clippers ( 5 - 4 ) 105 - 89 on Wednesday at the Staples Center in Los Angeles . The Clippers were the superior shooters in this game , going 49 percent from the field and 39 percent from the three - point line , while the Clippers went 44 percent from the floor and just 30 percent from beyond the arc . The Bulls were able to force the Clippers into 12 turnovers , while committing only eight of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . Jamal Crawford had a big day for the Clippers , as he went 10 - for - 17 from the field and 1 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 24 points , while also adding five assists . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 27 points and 12 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 17 points and 10 rebounds on the season . Jimmy Butler was the only other Clipper to score in double figures for the Clippers . He finished with 12 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 1 - 1 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) and seven assists , while Hinrich added 14 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 4 - 6 3Pt ) and two rebounds . The Bulls ' next game will be on the road against the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday , while the Clippers will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Wednesday .

The New Orleans Pelicans defeated the Detroit Pistons , 109 - 86 , at Smoothie King Center on Wednesday . New Orleans was desperate for a win and this dominating victory inches them a little closer to the eight - seed in the west . They did all their damage in the first and fourth quarter , as they outscored Detroit , 62 - 34 . The Pistons had one of the worst shooting games of the season , as they went 40 - of - 103 from the field , 3 - of - 17 from the free - throw line and 8 - of - 23 from three - point range . Defensive rebounding was decisive as well , with New Orleans winning that battle , 45 - 40 . The host Los Angeles Lakers handily defeated the Golden State Warriors on Friday , 117 - 97 . It was Lakers ( 3 - 3 ) coach Luke Walton 's first game against the Warriors since leaving the organization over the offseason . Walton coached the Warriors for the beginning of their historic 2015 - 16 regular season in place of an injured Steve Kerr , but later left to pursue the head coaching job in Los Angeles . Walton certainly got the best of his former team , as the Lakers were able to maintain their hefty halftime lead down the stretch . The team successfully capitalized on their size advantage , holding a 51 - 40 advantage in the rebounding column . Third-year forward Julius Randle led the team with 20 points and was a monster on the boards , pulling down 14 rebounds . The Lakers also saw success from the line , hitting over 90 percent of their free - throws . For the Warriors ( 4 - 2 ) , it was a tough night from beyond the arc . After showing dominant offensive flow on Thursday in a rout of the Thunder , the Warriors shot just 5 - for - 32 from three in Friday 's contest . This included 0 - for - 10 for Steph Curry , whose NBA-record streak of 157 games with a three - point make finally came to an end . The results were n't much better for Klay Thompson , who went just 2 - for - 10 . Kevin Durant , meanwhile , continued to perform with his new team , leading the game with 27 points . The Lakers will host the Suns on Sunday , while the Warriors will host the still - winless Pelicans on Monday .

Chicago was able to keep the Celtics off the glass extremely effectively , winning the rebounding battle 55 - 36 . The Celtics ' edge was particularly pronounced on the offensive end , as they earned 18 offensive rebounds compared to Boston 's three . Boston ( 1 - 1 ) , meanwhile , managed to keep the game close throughout . All-Star point guard Isaiah Thomas led the charge for the Celtics ' offense , scoring 25 points . With bench guard Marcus Smart sidelined by injury , sophomore Terry Rozier saw 22 minutes coming off the bench . He made the most of his time on the floor , scoring eight points and recording two rebounds and four assists while recording no turnovers . Boston had a solid shooting night , converting on half of their shots from the floor overall . However , struggles on the glass ended up weighing the Celtics down despite keeping Chicago to just 43 percent shooting . The Orlando Magic defeated the Chicago Bulls , 97 - 98 , at Amway Center on Wednesday evening . The Magic ( 16 - 38 ) may sport the worst record in the league , but they may be one of the feistiest cellar dwellers in the history of the NBA . Orlando has kept their competitive spirit thriving despite the disappointing season , and has often played as if they 're capable of beating virtually any team in the NBA on the right night . The Magic ( 32 - 20 ) were the latest unit to learn that lesson the hard way , as they first saw the Magic storm back from a 16 - 16 first quarter deficit to forge a 63 - 71 halftime with 1:52 to play to tie the game at both 94 and 98 in the closing seconds . Taking the ball for a final possession with two seconds remaining , the Magic saw Jimmy Butler drain a jumper off a Tony Snell assist with three seconds remaining with two seconds remaining , sealing the hard - fought home win over Chicago . Jimmy Butler led the way with 27 points , which he supplemented with two rebounds , five assists and six steals . Victor Oladipo was a distant second behind Butler , managing 18 points , four rebounds , six assists , two steals and a block . Tobias Harris was next with a bench - leading 15 points , along with eight rebounds , an assist and three steals . Elfrid Payton registered 10 points , nine rebounds , three assists and two steals . Channing Frye led the bench with 12 points , one rebound , two assists and one steal . Jimmy Butler paced Orlando with 27 points , which he supplemented with two rebounds , five assists and one steal . Tobias Harris was next with a bench - leading 15 points , along with eight rebounds , one assist and three steals . Derrick Rose registered 10 points , 11 assists and one rebound . Channing Frye led the bench with 12 points , one rebound , two assists and one steal . The Magic head back home to tangle with the Detroit Pistons on Wednesday night , while the Magic remain home to face off with the Milwaukee Bucks on Sunday evening .

Rebounding was the key for the Hawks , as they won that battle , 50 - 51 . In addition , they shot 41 percent from the field and 74 percent from the free - throw line . The Hawks also dominated the rebounding , winning that battle , 50 - 51 . Paul Millsap led the way for Atlanta , as he tallied 13 points , 17 rebounds , eight assists and three steals . Atlanta will look to build off this win on Wednesday in a road matchup against the Philadelphia 76ers .
The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the visiting Brooklyn Nets , 129 - 109 at Target Center on Saturday evening . Karl-Anthony Towns imposed his will on this one , as he poured in a game - high 37 points to help the Timberwolves dominate , as they won every quarter on their way to the 20 - point win over the struggling Nets . The Timberwolves ( 18 - 29 ) shot 51 percent from the field , as all five starters scored in double digits to lead the way . Karl-Anthony Towns grabbed 13 rebounds and recorded four blocked shots , to go along with his game - high 37 points . Andrew Wiggins followed up with 23 points , while Zach LaVine chipped in 20 . Shabazz Muhammad came up big off the bench for Minnesota , as he finished with 18 points and seven rebounds . The Timberwolves will look to keep rolling , as they play host to the Magic on Monday . The Nets ( 9 - 27 ) outscored the T-Wolves 58 - 48 in the paint and 23 - 12 in fast - break points but were not able to compete as efficiently , as they shot 48 percent from the field , and 27 percent from deep , compared to the 45 percent the T-Wolves hit from deep . Brook Lopez was the high - point man for the Nets , with 25 points , to go along with seven rebounds . Three other players scored in double digits for Brooklyn , including Sean Kilpatrick , who added 14 points , in 25 minutes off the bench . The Nets will look to bounce back , as they visit Miami on Monday .

When Houston 's James Harden corralled a defensive rebound with time dwindling in the fourth , trailing by one , it was another opportunity for the MVP runner - up to hit a buzzer - beater . It was n't to be on Thursday , however , as Houston 's 16 turnovers led to the Rockets ' bench . The Warriors were able to space the floor and find open cutters throughout the fourth , which led to them outscoring the Rockets 24 - 18 to close out the game . Golden State will continue their road trip on the road against the Phoenix Suns on Tuesday . Houston saw their three - game win streak come to an end with the loss . Nearly all of the Rockets ' key players struggled to finish on offense . MVP candidate Draymond Green delivered a triple - double with 18 points , eight rebounds , and six assists . The Warriors have now won two straight after a three - game losing skid last week allowed the Rockets to climb the standings . Houston will go on the road to face the Denver Nuggets on Saturday . Houston has lost three straight , but with Al Jefferson ( groin ) expected to miss at least the next four weeks , it 's getting hard to find reasons to think the Rockets could climb back into the playoff conversation this season . The Rockets will return to action Saturday in Milwaukee .

The Houston Rockets notched their ninth straight win as they defeated the New Orleans Pelicans , 122 - 100 , at Toyota Center on Friday night . The Rockets made history in a couple of different ways in this contest , beginning with their nine - game win streak , which is their longest win streak in eight years . They also sank an NBA-record 24 three - pointers , while James Harden passed Hakeem Olajuwon , to become the Rockets ' all time triple - double leader , as he notched his second straight triple - double , for the fifteenth of his career . Harden finished with 29 points on 7 - of - 15 shooting , along with 13 assists and 11 rebounds , in 34 minutes . Meanwhile , Eric Gordon notched a season - high 29 points on 10 - of - 17 shooting , including 7 - of - 12 from deep , in 28 minutes off the bench . The Rockets ( 20 - 7 ) shot 24 - of - 61 from long distance and tallied 27 assists in the game . They moved to 10 - 2 at home and will head out to Minnesota to take - on the Timberwolves on Saturday , for their second game in as many nights . The Pelicans ( 9 - 19 ) fell short on the second night of a back - to - back as they struggled shooting , going 41 percent from the field , 33 percent from long range and only 55 percent from the foul line . Anthony Davis scored 19 points before he was forced to leave the game in the third quarter with a leg contusion , and did not return . No player tallied more than 20 points for the Pelicans but five players scored in double figures , including Cheick Diallo who went 4 - of - 5 from the field , for 10 points , along with seven rebounds , in 22 minutes off the bench . The Pelicans fell to 3 - 10 on the road and will look to bounce back as they visit San Antonio on Sunday .
The Sacramento Spurs ( 5 - 4 ) defeated the Sacramento Kings ( 6 - 4 ) 91 - 94 on Sunday at Sleep Train Arena in Sacramento . The Kings were able to use a strong second half , where they out - scored the Kings 47 - 38 , to coast to a nine - point victory on the road . The Spurs were the superior shooters in this game , going 43 percent from the field and 29 percent from the three - point line , while the Kings went 43 percent from the floor and just 29 percent from beyond the arc . The Spurs were also able to force the Kings into 14 turnovers , while committing only 14 of their own , which may have been the difference in this game . The Spurs were led by DeMarcus Cousins , who went 10 - for - 19 from the floor and 5 - for - 6 from the free throw line to score 25 points , while also adding 10 rebounds and a blocked shot . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 53 points and 12 rebounds over his last two games . The only other King in double figures was Danny Green , who recorded 16 points ( 6 - 9 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and two assists in 34 minutes . It was the first time he 's reached double figures in points since the beginning of November , so the added minutes really helped him get things going . The only other King to reach double figures in points was Danny Green , who came off the bench to score 16 points ( 6 - 9 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) in 23 minutes . The Spurs ' next game will be at home against the Portland Trail Blazers on Friday , while the Kings will be at home against the Golden State Warriors on Wednesday .

The assist - to - turnover ratios were a huge difference in this game , as the Heat recorded 27 assists to just 11 turnovers , while the Heat committed 15 turnovers to just 14 assists . The Clippers have been playing competitively lately , but this win like some of their offense is just what they needed to get going . The San Antonio Spurs defeated the Oklahoma City Thunder 108 - 94 Tuesday at AT & T Center . The Spurs avoided suffering from their first three - game losing streak in almost a year in pretty dominant fashion , as they opened with a big opening period and adopted a bend - but - don't - break mentality the rest of the way . San Antonio was carried by a pair of stellar performances from their stars in the frontcourt , with Kawhi Leonard and LaMarcus Aldridge shining from start to finish . Leonard finished with a game - high 36 points on top of eight rebounds and four assists , while LaMarcus Aldridge shot 8 - of - 15 from the field en route to scoring 25 points and grabbing six rebounds of his own . With the pair accounting for over half of the Spurs ' points Tuesday night , no other San Antonio players managed to score in double figures , but six managed to score at least six points . For the Thunder , they could n't overcome a slow start to the game and one of their poorest shooting performances of the season . Overall as a team , Oklahoma City shot just 35 percent from the field and 25 percent from beyond the arc . Russell Westbrook managed to lead the way with a team - high 27 points on top of 14 assists and six rebounds , while the starting frontcourt of Steven Adams and Domantas Sabonis each recorded their own double - doubles , combining for 29 points and 22 rebounds . The Thunder have now dropped two straight against two of the NBA 's best teams by a combined 30 points . Up next , the Spurs will remain home Thursday to take on the 76ers , while the Thunder will head home Wednesday and play the Bulls .

The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Charlotte Hornets , 100 - 93 , at Quicken Loans Arena on Sunday . More often than not , the trio of LeBron James , Kevin Love and Kyrie Irving are essentially enough to overcome most opponents . It was a different story Sunday , however , as veteran Channing Frye actually led the way with a season - high 20 - point effort in 25 minutes off the bench . The aforementioned starters were n't necessarily underwhelming , as they combined for 55 points , including four total three - pointers from Love and James . Defense was also undeniably a factor , as Cleveland ( 8 - 1 ) held the Hornets ( 6 - 3 ) to 38 percent success rates from both the field and three - point range . The Hornets were led by Kemba Walker , who tallied 21 points , four assists , two rebounds and a steal . Marvin Williams posted 16 points , six rebounds and two assists . Nicolas Batum managed a near double - double with 15 points , nine boards , seven assists , two steals and a block . Michael Kidd-Gilchrist did get there , supplying 11 points , 10 rebounds , two assists and a steal . Frye added three rebounds and three blocks to his team - high scoring total . A pair of 19 - point efforts from James and Irving paced the starting five , with the former also filling out the stat sheet with eight rebounds , eight assists , a steal and a block and the latter dishing out four assists , posting three rebounds and recording a steal . Love was strong as well , pouring in 17 points and bringing in 11 rebounds , four assists and a steal . Tristan Thompson mustered a modest four points , but did bring in 12 rebounds . The Hornets move on to Minnesota to take on the Timberwolves on Tuesday night , while the Cavaliers remain home to take on the Raptors on Tuesday evening as well .
The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the Charlotte Hornets 105 - 90 at Spectrum Center on Monday . The Grizzlies ( 9 - 5 ) pulled out their fifth straight win behind a strong effort from Mike Conley . The floor general for the Grizzlies was an all around force from end - to - end , especially after losing James Ennis ( calf ) . The calf injury flared up after returning to the lineup on Monday , and is another blow to the front court for Memphis given Chandler Parsons ( bruised left knee ) inability to play for roughly two more weeks . Memphis controlled the pace of the game from start to finish and never let the Hornets ( 8 - 5 ) get close enough to make it a game . The game got blow fully open after Conley buried a 27 - foot three point shot to take a 69 - 45 lead with just a few seconds left in the third quarter . The Grizzlies point guard finished with 31 points , four rebounds , two assists and three steals on 11 - of - 21 shooting . JaMychal Green had a great performance in the starting lineup with 12 points , eight rebounds and an assist on 4 - of - 4 shooting in 31 minutes . Kemba Walker led the starting lineup in scoring for the Hornets , but failed to provide enough to get his team back in the game after contributing 17 points and two assists . Charlotte got strong productivity from the bench , where Frank Kaminsky dropped 23 points on 11 shots in 20 minutes , while Spencer Hawes added 14 points and 10 rebounds . Both teams play on Saturday , as the Hornets host the San Antonio Spurs , while the Grizzlies head to Philadelphia to take on the 76ers .
The Memphis Grizzlies ( 24 - 16 ) defeated the Utah Jazz ( 23 - 16 ) 88 - 79 on Monday at Energy Solutions Arena in Salt Lake City . While both teams shot very similar percentages from the field , the Grizzlies took the upper had from behind the three - point line , going 38 percent from the field , while the Jazz went just 39 percent . The Grizzlies also forced the Jazz into 17 turnovers , while committing only 4 of their own . The Grizzlies were led by the duo of Marc Gasol and Mike Conley . Gasol shot 7 - for - 18 from the field and 0 - for - 3 from the three - point line to finish with a team - high of 17 points , while also adding four rebounds and three steals . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 23 points and 17 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 27 points and 18 rebounds on the year . George Hill had a strong showing as well , going 6 - for - 15 from the field and 2 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score 15 points . It was his second strong showing in a row , as he 's combined for 35 points and 17 assists over those two games . Zach Randolph was the only other Celtic in double figures , as he finished with 13 points . The Grizzlies ' next game will be on the road against the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday , while the Jazz will be at home against the Pelicans on Wednesday .

Too much should n't be read into the correlation , but it 's worth mentioning , because if the team does n't like the direction they 're heading with Rondo this season , he could end up on the trade block with his contract set to expire . The Kings were up 50 points from the rest of the game , with Victor Oladipo leading the way with 18 points and five assists . Both offenses were scoring at ease , with both teams shooting over 55 percent from the field . The Nuggets feasted down low , as they won the rebounding differential , 44 - 33 , and outscored the Knicks , 68 - 52 , in the paint . The Nuggets ( 24 - 29 ) have been one of the best offenses in the league this season and this 131 - point outing shows just how efficient they can be . Kristaps Porzingis was second on the team , finishing with 17 points , four rebounds and two assists . Brandon Rose started for Emmanuel Mudiay and accrued 16 points , seven rebounds and two assists .

The Oklahoma City Thunder defeated the Dallas Mavericks 92 - 91 Monday at American Airlines Center . With just over three minutes remaining in Monday 's contest , the Thunder ( 42 - 31 ) looked dead in the water , as they were down 13 and the Mavericks ( 31 - 42 ) had control for majority of the game . Russell Westbrook , however , had other plans , as he led the team on a 140 run to end the game that was topped off by a game - winning jumper from the free throw line . Westbrook finished with yet another triple - double of 37 points ( 16 of which came in the final quarter ) , 13 rebounds and 10 assists in 36 minutes , and he did so while shooting an efficient 15 - of - 30 from the field . And the MVP-candidate carried the load for Oklahoma City , as Victor Oladipo ( 15 ) and Taj Gibson ( 13 ) were the only other players to score in double figures for the Thunder . As for Dallas , they played a strong 45 minutes before collapsing down the stretch and missing their final six shots from the field . Six different Mavericks players managed to score in double figures , but overall , it ended up being a subpar offensive performance from the team , as they shot just 44 percent from the field and 35 percent from behind the arc . Up next , the Thunder will stay home Wednesday to take on the Trail Blazers , while the Mavericks will look to get back on the right track in Milwaukee on Friday .

The two teams battled turnover problems and defensive struggles all game long , with poor offensive execution hurting both teams . The Magic defense was especially lackluster , as they allowed an ugly 56 points in the paint . They 'll need to sure up their defense if they want to get out of this deep hole they are digging . The Magic were led by Shabazz Napier in this game , as he tallied 22 points , three assists and four steals in the loss . However , that did n't deter them from notching their sixth road victory of the season on the strength of standout efforts from Davis ' replacement Jahlil Okafor and Dewayne Okafor . The two combined for more than half of the team 's points on the night , and the team shot 53 percent from the field overall . The San Antonio Spurs ( 47 - 13 ) defeated the New Orleans Pelicans ( 24 - 38 ) 101 - 98 on Sunday at the Smoothie King Center in New Orleans . Fighting to get back into the playoff hunt in the stacked Western Conference , the Spurs have started to hit their stride , notching their third straight victory in a row . They used their superior shooting in this game , going 42 percent from the field and 22 percent from the three - point line , while the Pelicans went just 39 percent from the floor and 32 percent from beyond the arc . The Spurs were able to force the Pelicans into 16 turnovers , while committing only 10 of their own , which may have been the difference in this game . The Spurs were led by Anthony Davis , who went 7 - for - 18 from the field and 1 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score 29 points , to go along with 24 rebounds and four blocked shots . It was far - and - away his best game of the year so far , as it marked a new season - high in points , along with being his first double - double of the year . He 's averaging just 7 points and seven rebounds on the year . He also chipped in seven rebounds , five assists and one steal as well . He 's now averaging 16 points and 10 rebounds on the year . The Spurs ' next game will be on the road against the Houston Rockets on Friday , while the Pelicans will be at home against the Minnesota Timberwolves on Friday .

The Oklahoma City Thunder ( 16 - 8 ) defeated the Utah Jazz ( 10 - 12 ) 104 - 98 on Sunday . Oklahoma City has won three of their last four games . Kevin Durant returned from a six - game absence due to an ankle sprain and put up a season - high 31 points in 43 minutes . Russell Westbrook was ejected in the second quarter after collecting two technical fouls . He put up 25 points and five assists in 40 minutes before his ejection . Dion Waiters made his season debut after being sidelined since training camp with a hamstring injury . He put up 13 points and four rebounds in 39 minutes off the bench . Rudy Gobert is expected to miss at least another three weeks with a stress reaction in his foot . Rookie Rudy Gobert did his best to keep the Jazz in the game , finishing with 31 points and five rebounds in 43 minutes . The Jazz have taken a bold stance by putting out some of their lesser - known players in the starting lineup over Westbrook and Durant , but the gamble has largely paid off , as they 've won six of their last nine games . Utah will stay home to host the Boston Celtics on Sunday . Utah has lost two straight , and while they 've tons of talent on their roster , it looks like the Jazz will be focusing on development this season instead of fighting for a playoff spot . It 's obvious watching the team that they are improving under coach Quin Snyder , so time and experience will be the test to see if the Jazz have the right guys to build a winning team around . Gordon Hayward paced the Jazz on Friday , finishing with 23 points and three blocks in 41 minutes . Utah 's next game is at home against the Chicago Bulls .
The Charlotte Hornets ( 30 - 39 ) defeated the Washington Wizards ( 42 - 27 ) 98 - 93 on Friday . The Wizards came into this game as a double - digit favorite and simply couldn’t hold off a bad Hornets team . The key for Charlotte was their shooting , as they shot 43 percent from the field and 38 percent from three - point range . They also dominated the rebounding battle , winning that battle , 41 - 44 . This was a wire - to - wire win for the Wizards , as they held a double - digit lead for the final 9 - plus minutes . Defense was key , as they held Washington to 37 percent from the field and 33 percent from three - point range , while the Wizards shot 37 percent from the field and 33 percent from long distance . Washington also abused Washington on the boards , winning that battle , 41 - 44 . The Wizards ( 30 - 27 ) had to play this game without Al Horford and Avery Bradley , as they did n't have enough bullets in the arsenal to hold off the Hornets . Cody Zeller led the team in scoring , totaling 19 points and five rebounds on 8 - of - 10 shooting . Nicolas Batum was the only other starter in double figures , as he accrued 18 points , three rebounds and two assists . Marcin Gortat scored just six points , but grabbed 15 rebounds in the defeat . Frank Kaminsky was the only other player in double figures , as he provided 14 points , four rebounds and two assists . The Wizards will look to play better on Wednesday in a road matchup with the Charlotte Hornets .
The Los Angeles Clippers ( 36 - 19 ) defeated the San Antonio Spurs ( 34 - 20 ) 119 - 115 on Friday . The Clippers were led by DeAndre Jordan , who put up another stellar performance , he finished with 26 points , 18 rebounds and one block . He 's been the leading rebounder in every Los Angeles game dating back to Feb. 21 . His play has helped lead them to six straight victories , three of which were on the road . JJ Reddick had to leave the game after just 27 minutes with knee soreness , but he was able to put up 15 points and two assists in 40 minutes . The Clippers have now won three straight to maintain its position in the West 's crowded playoff picture . The Clippers needed this win to avoid being caught by the Spurs in the standings after San Antonio routed Atlanta earlier in the afternoon . Tony Redick scored a game - high 26 points , but Tony Parker scored a team - high 21 points . Cory Ginobili recorded a career - high 10 points off the bench in 24 minutes off the bench . The Spurs will stay at home to host the Indiana Pacers on Wednesday . San Antonio has lost two straight , and while they 've tons of talent on their roster , it looks like the Spurs will be focusing on development this season instead of fighting for a playoff spot . It 's obvious watching the team that they are improving under coach Quin Snyder , so time and experience will be the test to see if the Clippers have the right guys to build a winning team around . Jamal Crawford paced the Clippers with 26 points and shot 8 - for - 15 from the field . Jamal Crawford continued his strong play as well , putting up 26 points and five assists . Jamal Crawford was the high scorer off the bench with 26 points . The Clippers will go on the road to face the Denver Nuggets on Friday .
The Toronto Raptors ( 28 - 17 ) defeated the San Antonio Spurs ( 36 - 9 ) 106 - 108 on Sunday at the Air Canada Centre in Toronto . The Raptors got out to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Raptors 25 - 29 right away in the first quarter . They were the superior shooters as well , going 45 percent from the field and 24 percent from the three - point line , while the Spurs went 45 percent from the floor and just 29 percent from beyond the arc . The Raptors also secured a 45 - 36 rebounding advantage . For the Raptors , Kyle Lowry had a big game . He shot a ridiculous 9 - for - 23 from the field and 1 - for - 7 from the three - point line to score 30 points , while also handing out two assists . He was able to get to the free throw line 12 times and converted on a perfect 11 of those attempts . With Tyson Kawhi Leonard sitting out , LaMarcus Aldridge finished with a team - high of 21 points ( 6 - 14 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 9 - 11 FT ) , to go along with seven rebounds and a pair of blocked shots . It marked his second double - double over his last three games , a stretch where he 's averaging 20 points and 12 rebounds . The only other Raptor to reach double figures in points was Patrick Patterson , who added 12 points ( 5 - 6 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt ) and five rebounds off the bench . The Raptors ' next game will be at home against the Oklahoma City Thunder on Thursday , while the Spurs will travel to Sacramento to play the Kings on Friday .
The Boston Celtics defeated the Dallas Mavericks , 90 - 83 , at TD Garden on Friday . Boston were expected to win this game rather easily , but it took a monster second half to do so . In fact , Boston outscored Dallas , 54 - 43 , in the second half . Defense was key for the Celtics , as they held the Mavericks to 41 percent from the field and 35 percent from three - point range . Rim protection killed Dallas as well , as they failed to record a block in their loss . The assist - to - turnover ratio kept the Celtics hanging around , as they committed 29 turnovers to 16 assists , while the Celtics committed 19 turnovers to just 18 assists . Harrison Barnes led the team in scoring , as he dropped 28 points on 12 - of - 24 shooting . Avery Bradley was the only other starter in double figures , totaling 18 points , 13 rebounds and four steals . Kelly Olynyk was huge off the bench , as he provided 10 points and four rebounds . Harrison Barnes led the way for Boston , as he accrued 28 points , two rebounds and two steals . Avery Bradley finished second on the team , totaling 18 points and 13 rebounds . Avery Bradley was the only other Mavericks player in double figures , accumulating 18 points , four rebounds and four assists . On deck for the Celtics is a road matchup against the Philadelphia 76ers on Friday . The Celtics ( 6 - 8 ) were undefeated in their home building coming into this , but folded late in the fourth quarter . Wesley Matthews led the team in scoring , as he dropped 22 points to go along with three rebounds . Avery Bradley stepped up in his absence , tallying 18 points , 13 rebounds and five assists . Kelly Olynyk was huge off the bench , as he provided 10 points , four rebounds and three assists .
The Dallas Mavericks ( 10 - 23 ) defeated the Los Angeles Lakers ( 12 - 24 ) 101 - 89 on Sunday at the Staples Center in Los Angeles . In a very evenly matched game , it was the Mavericks who pulled out the close victory , as they took down a team that they could see again when the playoffs come around . Both teams had similar shooting percentages , with the Mavericks going 49 percent from the field and 45 percent from the three - point line , while the Lakers went 47 percent from the floor and just 37 percent from beyond the arc . The Mavericks were also able to force the Lakers into 15 turnovers , while committing only 15 of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Mavericks were led by the duo of Julius Randle and Wesley Matthews . Matthews went 6 - for - 14 from the field and 4 - for - 9 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 20 points , while also adding six rebounds and two blocked shots . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 35 points and 30 rebounds over his last two games . Harrison Barnes was the third Nugget to reach double figures in points , as he finished with 17 points ( 6 - 17 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 0 - 2 FT ) and nine rebounds . The Mavericks ' next game will be on the road against the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday , while the Lakers will travel to Minnesota to play the Timberwolves on Wednesday .

In a winning effort , the Suns finished the game shooting 48 percent from the field and 27 percent from beyond the arc . The Suns shot 47 percent from the field and 32 percent from the three - point line , while the Suns shot 47 percent from the field and only 32 percent from beyond the arc . Led by Andre Drummond , the Pistons were led by the duo of Andre Drummond and Andre Drummond . Drummond went 10 - for - 14 from the field and 3 - for - 4 from the free throw line to score 23 points , while also adding 14 rebounds and a blocked shot . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 71 points and 31 rebounds in his last two games . He 's now averaging 14 points and 8 rebounds on the year . Smith came off the bench and went 4 - for - 5 from the field and 0 - for - 1 from the three - point line to score 11 points . It was a season - high for Tucker , as he was able to get to the free throw line at a high rate . In the two games since returning from the All-Star break , he 's combined for 12 points , 13 rebounds and five assists . Rookie Kentavious Caldwell-Pope nearly notched the victory , posting a season - high of 17 points ( 7 - 13 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) , to go along with eight rebounds and two steals . There was an NBA record tied in this game , as there were 88 combined three - point attempts . There were eight ties and 28 lead changes in total , with neither team leading by more than 10 points . Houston actually led for the majority of the game , as Toronto 's only lead lasted less than two minutes in the third quarter . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the difference in the game , with Houston recording 27 assists to 17 turnovers , while the Raptors committed 17 turnovers to 19 assists . James Harden added another triple - double to his tally , collecting 40 points , 10 rebounds and 10 assists in the win . He also added two blocks and two steals , but committed 10 turnovers . Trevor Ariza was the only other starter in double figures , tallying 17 points , seven rebounds and three assists . Montrezl Harrell was a beast off the bench , dropping 18 points on 12 - of - 13 from the field . Montrezl Harrell was second on the team , as he dropped a career - high 28 points on 12 - of - 13 shooting off the bench . Trevor Ariza collected 17 points , seven rebounds and three assists . Cory Joseph was a nice spark off the bench , scoring 10 points on 4 - of - 8 shooting . Cory Joseph and Cory Joseph were huge off the bench , as they combined for 19 points , six rebounds and five assists .

It was the first time he 's reached double figures in points since the beginning of November , so the added minutes really helped him get things going . The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Cleveland Rockets , 128 - 60 , at Quicken Loans Arena on Thursday . The Cleveland-Golden State matchup is always one of the showcase games of the year and that ended up being the case in this Christmas Day classic . Despite Houston leading for the majority of the game , the Cavaliers never led by more than four points and held a double - digit lead for the final three quarters . Shooting was key , with the Cavaliers shooting 52 percent from the field and 50 percent from three - point range . The Cavaliers could only muster up 48 percent shooting from the field and 39 percent from three - point range . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive as well , with the two teams matching in turnovers , while Cleveland won the assist battle , 22 - 22 . Defensive rebounding was dominant for the Cavaliers as well , with Cleveland winning that battle , 42 - 26 . The Cavaliers ( 4 - 0 ) had a tough task here without LeBron Love and Devin Booker , as they did n't have enough ammunition to match with the Cavaliers . Kyrie Irving led the team in scoring , as he dropped 32 points , two rebounds and four assists . LeBron James was n't far behind , as he accumulated 19 points , 13 rebounds and eight assists . Kevin Love recorded another double - double , totaling 24 points and five rebounds on 9 - of - 16 shooting . Eric Gordon went just 6 - of - 13 from the field , but finished with 16 points , three rebounds and three assists .

The Pacers were the superior shooters in this game , going 48 percent from the field and 29 percent from the three - point line , while the Pistons went 41 percent from the floor and just 35 percent from deep . After going on record saying he 'd come out much more agressive in this outing , Paul George backed those words up , as he finished with a game - high of 21 points ( 9 - 14 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt , 0 - 1 FT ) , to go along with three rebounds , four assists and one steal in 32 minutes . It marked his second double - double over his last three games , a stretch where he 's averaging 18 points and 14 rebounds . The Pacers were the superior shooters in this game , going 43 percent from the field and 40 percent from the three - point line , while the Bucks went just 43 percent from the floor and a meager 29 percent from beyond the arc . The Miami Heat defeated the host Indiana Pacers , 113 - 95 , at Bankers Life Fieldhouse on Friday . It 's rare to see Indiana struggle so badly at home , but that was just the case here . In fact , Miami pulled out the rare wire - to - wire win , as they held a double - digit lead for the final 27 minutes . Shooting was key , with the Heat shooting 49 percent from the field and 42 percent from three - point range . The Pacers could only muster up 40 percent shooting from the field and 33 percent from three - point range . The rebounding was a huge factor as well , with Miami winning that battle , 43 - 43 . The Heat also dominated the assist ratio , recording 29 assists to Indiana 's 21 . Despite the game being close throughout the first half , Indiana led for the entirety of the second half . The Pacers ( 30 - 29 ) continue to be one of the hottest teams in the league , as this marks their 19th win in 21 games . Hassan Whiteside dominated the glass , as he totaled 22 points and 17 rebounds in the win . Dion Waiters was the only other starter in double figures , as he accrued 22 points , two rebounds and three assists . Paul George led the Pacers in scoring , as he accumulated 16 points , three rebounds and six assists . James Johnson was huge off the bench , providing 15 points , seven rebounds , eight assists , two steals and two blocks . Miami will look to keep rolling on Friday in a home matchup against the Charlotte Hornets .

Denzel Valentine was the only other starter to register double - digit scoring , registering nine points , two rebounds and an assist . Washington remains in third place in the Eastern Conference 's Southeast Division , and are slotted in the sixth seed as well . They head to Boston to take on the Celtics on Monday night . The Wizards were paced by Markieff Morris ' 19 points , which he supplemented with five rebounds , two assists and three steals . Bradley Beal was right behind with 19 points , three assists and four rebounds . Michael Carter-Williams was next with 14 points , seven rebounds , two assists and two steals . Beal followed with 19 points , three rebounds , three assists and a block . Michael Carter-Williams was next with 14 points , seven rebounds , two assists and two steals . The free - throw shooting was a big differ as well , with Golden State going 23 - for - 21 , while Golden State went just 8 - for - 28 . The ball movement was huge as well , with the Warriors handing out 31 assists to the Warriors 31 . The one criticism with Chicago is that they are a two - man team and that became the issue on Thursday . The Thunder got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Timberwolves 21 - 21 in the first quarter alone . They also shot better in this game , going 43 percent from the field , while the Thunder went just 43 percent . He 's combined for 59 points over his last two games , as he continues to have the hot hand . Wiggins on the other hand went 8 - for - 19 from the field and 2 - for - 5 from beyond the arc to score 20 points . It was only the second time he 's reached double figures in points since the beginning of November , so the added minutes really helped him get things going . The Dallas Mavericks defeated the Philadelphia 76ers 113 - 95 Wednesday at American Airlines Center . The Mavericks ( 19 - 30 ) steamrolled their way to a fourth straight victory as they continue to be much - improved since the start of the new year . They have now won five of their last six games and boast a 9 - 6 record in 2017 . A major part of this run has been the play of Seth Curry , who scored a game - high 22 points Wednesday on top of six assists , four steals and three rebounds . It was his ninth game since the start of the new year with at least 15 points . The surprise performance of the night , however , came off the bench from Salah Mejri , who played just 21 minutes as a reserve but recorded 16 points and a game - high 17 rebounds in that time . Devin Harris also had a solid day off the bench , scoring 14 points in just 19 minutes . As for the 76ers ( 18 - 30 ) , they 've cooled off a bit since their hot start to January , as they have now lost three of their last four games after Wednesday 's defeat . Jahlil Okafor put together a solid offensive performance in the loss , scoring 16 points in 24 minutes , but it 's clear that Philadelphia is missing the inside presence of Joel Embiid , who has now missed five of the last six games with a knee contusion . Ersan Ilyasova added a double - double of 13 points and 10 rebounds , but overall for the 76ers , it was a forgettable night offensively . The team ended up shooting just 46 percent from the field and 27 percent from behind the arc while committing 21 total turnovers . Up next , the Mavericks will look to continue their winning ways against Portland on Friday , while the 76ers will travel Thursday to San Antonio .

It also figured to add more offensive responsibility to Beal 's backcourt mate John Wall and small forward Markieff Morris . Houston 's ongoing transformation to a winning team has not been as evident all season as it was Friday , when they thoroughly dominated a team that still has postseason aspirations in the Hornets ( 20 - 19 ) . Frank Kaminsky III was productive in a reserve role as well with 22 points ( 14 which came in the fourth quarter ) . Frank Hawes followed with 16 points , five rebounds and an assist . Ryan Anderson turned in 13 points , two rebounds , an assist and two steals . Jeremy Lamb was productive as a reserve as well with 15 points , five rebounds and one block . Frank Kaminsky III was also productive as a reserve , registering 14 points , two rebounds , four assists and two steals . Kemba Walker 's 25 points paced the Rockets , a total he supplemented with six rebounds , 10 assists , one steal and one block . Kemba Walker was right behind with a 25 - point , 10 - assist double - double that also included six rebounds . Marvin Williams produced a 16 - point , 8 - rebound double - double that also included a block . Jeremy Lamb provided 11 points , five rebounds and a steal . Roy Hibbert led the second unit with 16 points and five rebounds , while Jeremy Lamb provided 11 points in a reserve role .
Youngsters were on display in this matchup of struggling teams and Andrew Wiggins shined the brightest . Wiggins finished the game with 36 points and eight rebounds on 13 - of - 29 shooting . He 's on quite the tear right now , as he has scored 111 points across his last three games . Karl-Anthony Towns played well too , as he accumulated 21 points and seven rebounds on 8 - of - 15 shooting . Zach LaVine finished with 17 points and five rebounds on 5 - of - 16 shooting . Tyus Jones provided 12 points and seven rebounds of his own . Bojan Bogdanovic was the only bench player in double figures , accruing 12 points , five rebounds and seven assists . Bojan Bogdanovic led the bench with 13 points , while Isaiah Whitehead collected 6 points , seven assists and four steals of his own . Andrew Wiggins led the Timberwolves in scoring , as he scored 17 points on 13 - of - 29 shooting . Brooklyn will have a quick turnaround , as they host the Houston Rockets on Tuesday for their next game . Minnesota ( 1 - 5 ) have been a huge disappointment this season and this loss only adds to their struggles . Zach LaVine had one of the best games of his career though , accumulating 17 points , two rebounds and four assists . Trevor Booker also recorded a double - double , totaling 15 points and nine rebounds . Bojan Bogdanovic was the only other starter with more than 11 points , as he collected 13 points , one rebound and two assists . Brooklyn will look to keep rolling on Wednesday against the Toronto Raptors .
The Golden State Warriors ( 56 - 14 ) defeated the Oklahoma City Thunder ( 40 - 30 ) 111 - 95 on Friday . In a battle between two bad defenses , the offenses really struggled . Especially Oklahoma City , as they shot 43 percent from the field and 19 percent from three - point range . The fourth quarter is where the Warriors really turned it on , as they outscored the Thunder 19 to 29 . The Warriors came into this game as a heavy underdog and rode 43 percent shooting to a much needed victory . Klay Thompson was spectacular , as he amassed 34 points and six rebounds on 12 - of - 21 shooting . Russell Westbrook was n't far behind , as he accumulated 15 points , eight rebounds and seven assists . Enes Kanter was a nice spark off the bench , as he totaled 15 points and 10 rebounds . On deck for Oklahoma City is a matchup with the Cleveland Cavaliers on Sunday . Golden State played this game without a rested LeBron Russell and they clearly didn’t miss a beat . Stephen Westbrook did all he could to keep the Thunder hanging around , as he accumulated 23 points , four rebounds and six assists in the defeat . Victor Oladipo was second on the team , as he scored 17 points on 6 - of - 14 shooting . Draymond Green also recorded a double - double , accumulating 2 points , 10 rebounds and six assists in the defeat . The Thunder will look to keep this momentum going against the Phoenix Suns on Sunday .
The Indiana Pacers ( 7 - 7 ) defeated the Oklahoma City Thunder ( 8 - 6 ) 115 - 111 on Tuesday at Chesapeake Energy Arena in Oklahoma City . In a game of runs , the Thunder and Thunder found themselves locked up following the fourth quarter , but in overtime the Thunder were able to use a team - effort to outlast the Thunder and steal the four - point victory on the road . The Pacers were the superior shooters in this game , going 45 percent from the field and 50 percent from the three - point line , while the Thunder went 44 percent from the floor and 28 percent from deep . The Pacers also forced the Thunder into 20 turnovers , while committing just 22 of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . Thaddeus Young led the way , going 9 - for - 18 from the field and 0 - for - 5 from the three - point line to finish with 20 points and 11 rebounds . It was far - and - away his best game of the year so far , as it marked a new season - high in points , along with being his first double - double of the year . He 's averaging just 3 points and seven rebounds on the season . Also playing a big factor in the win was Victor Oladipo , who had a solid showing . He went 6 - for - 14 from the field and 2 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score 14 points . He also had five rebounds and six assists , coming just shy of his first triple - double of the season . Oladipo is now averaging 34 points and 22 rebounds on the season . Victor Oladipo was another player with a solid showing . He did n't have his best shooting performance on the season ( 9 - 16 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 0 - 0 FT ) , but he still finished with 14 points , as he was able to get to the free throw line at a high rate . In the two games since returning from the All-Star break , he 's combined for 6 points , 7 assists and 10 rebounds . With Domantas Sabonis out due to a shoulder injury , Glenn Robinson III continued to play well . In 45 minutes , he finished with 16 points ( 6 - 14 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) , 11 rebounds and two blocked shots . The Thunder 's next game will be on the road against the Sacramento Kings on Friday , while the Thunder will travel to Houston to play the Rockets on Wednesday .
The Golden State Warriors ( 58 - 14 ) defeated the host Sacramento Kings ( 27 - 45 ) 114 - 100 , Monday evening at Pepsi Center . This was the second night of a back - to - back for the Warriors , who were coming off a tough loss in San Antonio on Wednesday night . The Kings got out to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Kings 57 - 49 in the first half . Along with the quick start , the Warriors also shot much better , going 49 percent from the field and 32 percent from the three - point line , while the Kings finished at 48 percent from the floor and 48 percent from deep . This marked the sixth straight loss for the Kings , as they look to improve their draft positioning for the 2015 NBA Draft . The Warriors got their biggest offensive contribution from Buddy Hield , who went 7 - for - 14 from the field and 4 - for - 9 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 22 points , while also adding eight rebounds and seven assists . Hield 's shot has been over his last two games , combining for 50 points and nine assists over his last two outings . The only other King to reach double figures in points was Ben McLemore , who finished with 11 points and two assists . The bench did n't have much of a presence and only scored 17 points . The Warriors ' next game will be on the road against the Los Angeles Lakers on Tuesday , while the Kings will be at home against the Minnesota Timberwolves on Friday .

The Atlanta Hawks defeated the Oklahoma City Thunder 110 - 108 Monday at Chesapeake Energy Arena . Monday 's game came with no shortage of drama , as after plenty of back and forth in the final period , Paul Millsap sit a short jumper that put the Hawks ( 14 - 12 ) up by two with just 12 seconds remaining . The Thunder ( 16 - 12 ) , with one last opportunity remaining went to their star guard Russell Westbrook , who missed a jumper , got the rebound and got his shot blocked before Oklahoma City was able to call one last timeout . The Thunder inbounded it to Westbrook again , who missed a potential game - winning 3 - pointer , and while Steven Adams was able to get the rebound for Oklahoma City , his dunk at buzzer was ruled no good . In the end , it was a battle between the team 's two starting point guards , with Dennis Schroder and Westbrook putting together two of their very best performances of the season . Schroder scored 31 points on 10 - of - 16 shooting from the field - - his second 30 - point game of the season - - on top of eight assists and five rebounds . Meanwhile , Schroder posted 31 points ( 10 - 16 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 10 - 10 FT ) , five rebounds and eight assists in 40 minutes . It was the first time since Feb. 29 that Millsap failed to record a double - double , but it was n't all Westbrook for the point guard . The only other player to reach double figures in points was Jerami Grant , who came off the bench for 15 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 3 - 3 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) . The Thunder 's next game will be at home against the Dallas Mavericks on Friday , while the Thunder will travel to San Antonio to play the Spurs on Sunday .

The Clippers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Bulls 26 - 18 in the first quarter alone . They also shot better in this game , going 44 percent from the field and 26 percent from the three - point line , while the Bulls went 31 percent from the floor and just 39 percent from beyond the arc . The Clippers were also able to force the Bulls into 11 turnovers , while committing only eight of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . The nine rebounds matched a season - high for Nikola Mirotic , while DeAndre Gasol was the only other player to score in double figures for the Bulls . Noah finished with 13 points ( 2 - 8 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 9 - 14 FT ) , 26 rebounds and four blocked shots , while Noah added four points ( 2 - 13 FG , 9 - 14 FT ) and 11 rebounds . Paul Paul had the most success for the Bulls . He went 12 - for - 19 from the field and 0 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score 28 points , while also adding 12 assists . He 's now averaging 23 points per game on the season . Despite struggling with his shot , Chris Paul had a huge game , scoring 10 points ( 3 - 9 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and handing out a pair of assists . He was able to get to the free throw line six times and converted on all seven attempts . It was a season - high in points for him and a nice surprise for the Clippers , as he 's averaging only 8 points per game so far this season . DeAndre Noah added a double - double of his own , finishing with 13 points ( 2 - 8 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 9 - 12 FT ) , 26 rebounds and two blocked shots . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 31 points and 23 rebounds over his last two games . The Bulls ' next game will be at home against the Charlotte Hornets on Friday , while the Bulls will be on the road against the Detroit Pistons on Friday .
