The Houston Rockets defeated the Dallas Mavericks 93 - 92 at Toyota Center on Sunday . The Rockets ( 2 - 1 ) maintained a lead throughout most of the Western Conference clash with the Mavericks ( 0 - 3 ) , which included a 10 point lead at the half . Drama ensued down the stretch , started by Wesley Matthews , who was able to cap of a 70 run with back - to - back baskets , which cut the Rockets ' lead to two points with 3:2 remaining in the fourth quarter . Matthews ' heads up defense forced a turnover on Harden and transitioned the impressive scoring effort to give Dallas a chance to grab its first win of the season . Matthews continued to put the team on his shoulders after draining a 27 - foot three pointer to tie the game at 92 with four seconds left in the game , but he also committed a shooting foul on James Harden’s ensuing drive to the hoop with just one - tenth of a second left to play . Harden missed the first free throw but sank the second and that was all that needed to ice the game for Houston . Harden went on to put up star numbers again , scoring 28 points to go along with seven rebounds and seven assists . Eric Gordon and Ryan Anderson joined Harden in double figures with 14 points each , while Clint Capela was strong on the glass , totaling 10 rebounds . Wes Matthews struggled from behind - the - arc , but not when it mattered most for Dallas . Matthews finished with 25 points , five boards and three assists on 9 - of - 25 shooting ( 3 - of - 15 from three ) . Harrison Barnes started 3 - of - 5 from the field but ended up missing his next six attempts on his way to a lowly 10 points in 38 minutes of action . The Mavericks will head to Cleveland to visit the reigning champion Cavaliers on Tuesday , while the Rockets will visit the Utah Jazz on Wednesday .

The New Orleans Pelicans ( 16 - 27 ) defeated the Milwaukee Bucks ( 19 - 27 ) 116 - 99 on Saturday . The recent form of these teams would have indicated a different result , but the Pelicans got a much needed win to keep slim hopes alive for the playoffs . The Pelicans outscored the Bucks 32 - 23 in the fourth quarter for a comeback win . The turnovers were the key difference , as Milwaukee committed 18 turnovers to the Bucks 18 . That 's a recipe for disaster , especially when you 're not shooting the three - ball well . In any case , they still pulled out a win in impressive comeback fashion and got back to .500 . Greg Monroe had a renaissance game , as he totaled 22 points and 11 rebounds . Jrue Holiday had a nice all - around game as well , as he accumulated 13 points , four rebounds , nine assists and three steals in the victory . Greg Monroe also had a nice game off the bench , as he totaled 12 points , six rebounds and three assists in the defeat . The Bucks came into this game as a huge underdog , but held their own to keep it close throughout . This was one of their best offensive games of the season , as six players scored a combined 87 points . Khris Middleton led the team with 22 points and also hit four three - pointers in the victory . Michael Carter-Williams also played well , as he tallied 19 points , five assists and four rebounds . Alonzo Gee was the only other starter in double figures , as he scored 10 points . Milwaukee will look to bounce back on Sunday against the Minnesota Timberwolves in their next game .

Mike Conley managed nine points , four assists and two rebounds , while Marc Gasol rounded out a forgettable night for the starting five with seven points , six rebounds , two assists , a steal and a block . The Trail Blazers fell to 15 - 22 and remain in fourth place in the Western Conference 's Pacific Division . They now head to Minnesota for a Saturday showdown versus the Timberwolves . Portland 's starting five enjoyed a highly productive night , and were encouragingly led by a resurgent effort from All-Star Zach Randolph , who 'd been struggling considerably with his shot in recent games . The small forward exploded for 26 points on the strength of 11 of 18 shooting from the field , including a pair of three - pointers . He also posted a stellar 18 rebounds , along with three assists , a steal and a block . McCollum was next in line with 16 points , three rebounds , four assists and a steal . Courtney Lee was the fourth member of the starting five to hit double digits in the scoring column , posting nine points , two rebounds and four assists . Portland remains in third place in the Western Conference 's Southwest Division , and is currently three games back of the eighth - seeded Detroit Pistons . They head to Portland to take on the Trail Blazers on Sunday .
The San Antonio Spurs ( 50 - 13 ) defeated the Sacramento Kings ( 25 - 39 ) 114 - 104 on Monday at Energy Solutions Arena in Salt Lake City . The Spurs got out to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Kings 15 - 37 in the first quarter alone . The Spurs were the superior shooters in this game , going 50 percent from the field and 48 percent from the three - point line , while the Kings went 49 percent from the floor and just 37 percent from deep . After going on record saying he 'd come out much more agressive in this outing , Tyreke Evans also put up a vintage performance . He finished with 26 points ( 9 - 13 FG , 3 - 4 3Pt , 5 - 7 FT ) , four assists and two steals , while Lee had 19 points ( 6 - 9 FG , 4 - 6 3Pt ) of his own . David Lee and David Labissiere were the only other players in double figures for the Kings . Green finished with 14 points ( 5 - 13 FG , 4 - 8 3Pt ) and two assists , while Koufos had 15 points ( 7 - 10 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 1 - 1 FT ) and six rebounds of his own . The Spurs ' next game will be at home against the Los Angeles Clippers on Wednesday , while the Kings will be at home against the Los Angeles Lakers on Wednesday after the All-Star break as well .
The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 22 - 9 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 19 - 15 ) 104 - 79 on Saturday at the Amway Center in Orlando . The Cavaliers got off to a really quick start in this game , out - scoring the Magic 79 - 45 in the first half alone . The Cavaliers were the superior shooters in this game , going 42 percent from the field and 32 percent from the three - point line , while the Magic went 38 percent from the floor and just 24 percent from deep . After going on record saying he 'd come out much more agressive in this outing , LeBron James backed those words up , as he finished with a game - high of 29 points ( 11 - 18 FG , 4 - 7 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) , to go along with five rebounds , three assists and two steals . James did n't even hit a three - pointer , but he was still able to get to the hoop and score as he pleased . It was clear he planned on taking over from the start and if he can continue to have this type of impact , the Cavaliers should be very tough defeat , even without Kevin Love . Kyrie Irving had a relatively quiet night . He went 4 - for - 10 from the field and 0 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score 13 points , while also adding five assists . He 's had a nice stretch of three games where he 's averaging 29 points , 4 rebounds and five assists . The only other Hornet to reach double figures in points was Kevin Love , who recorded 10 points ( 2 - 5 FG , 5 - 8 FT ) and 13 rebounds . J.R. Hezonja came off the bench to score 10 points ( 3 - 11 FG , 1 - 6 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) in 13 minutes . Shabazz Napier had one of the better games of the season as well , going 5 - for - 10 from the field and 1 - for - 2 from the three - point line to score 11 points in 13 minutes . It was a new season - high in points for him , while also marking his first double - double since his first game of the season back in November . Kevin Love was able to contribute 10 points and 13 rebounds , giving him his fourth double - double of the year . The only other Magic to reach double figures in points was Aaron Gordon , who came off the bench for 11 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt ) and seven rebounds . The Cavaliers ' next game will be at home against the Miami Heat on Wednesday , while the Magic will be at home against the Charlotte Hornets on Wednesday .
The Golden State Warriors ( 20 - 2 ) defeated the Dallas Mavericks ( 17 - 8 ) 105 - 98 on Wednesday at the American Airlines Center in Dallas . With a 74 - 68 lead at the end of the third quarter , the Warriors remained in control . They went on to out - score the Mavericks 30 - 30 in the fourth quarter , leading to a 13 - point victory on the road . The Warriors were the superior shooters in this one , going 45 percent from the field and 31 percent from the three - point line , while the Mavericks went 40 percent from the floor and 20 percent from beyond the arc . The Mavericks were also able to force the Mavericks into 15 turnovers , while committing only 13 of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . Dirk Nowitzki had a big game , as he went 11 - for - 20 from the field and 1 - for - 0 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 23 points , while also adding eight rebounds and a blocked shot . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 55 points and 11 assists over his last two games . He 's now averaging 23 points and 11 rebounds on the season . Monta Ellis had a really strong showing as well , going 8 - for - 22 from the field and 2 - for - 8 from the three - point line to score 24 points . It was his best offensive showing since back in mid - November , so it was good to see him get back on track . Tyson Chandler also had a double - double of his own , finishing with 20 points ( 5 - 8 FG , 8 - 10 FT ) and eight rebounds . The Mavericks ' next game will be on the road against the Sacramento Kings on Friday , while the Mavericks will be at home against the Minnesota Timberwolves on Friday .

The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves , 102 - 95 , at BMO Harris Bradley Center on Thursday . The Bucks ( 27 - 33 ) came in to Wednesday 's contest looking to right some of the ills that had plagued them over their previous seven games , a stretch in which they 'd suffered five defeats . The Bucks ( 27 - 38 ) may have initially looked like easy prey , considering their losing record and the fact that they 'd recently lost their second - best playmaker , Rudy Gay , for the season with an Achilles injury . However , the old adage of `` that 's why they play the games '' rang particularly true Wednesday , as Milwaukee forced the Nuggets to an uncharacteristic 12 turnovers and outscored them by a margin of 58 - 42 over the second and third quarters . However , Milwaukee 's vaunted defense asserted their dominance following their disastrous first 10 minutes , limiting Minnesota to just 65 points over the last three quarters . Towns led the way for the visitors with 35 points , 14 rebounds , one assist , two blocks and one steal . Greg Monroe led the second unit with 12 points , six rebounds and two assists , while Matthew Delladedova turned in 10 points , two assists , one rebound and one steal . Rashad Vaughn registered a bench - leading eight points , two rebounds , two assists , one steal and one block . Karl-Anthony Towns paced the T-Wolves with 35 points , 14 rebounds , one assist , two blocks and one steal . Ricky Rubio followed with 22 points , eight assists and one rebound . Matthew Delladedova led the bench with 16 points on 5 - of - 12 shooting .

They also shot better in this game , going 51 percent from the field and 25 percent from the three - point line , while the 76ers went 46 percent from the floor and just 43 percent from beyond the arc . The storyline for the Sixers in this game was the play of Darren Collison . Darren Collison and Darren Collison did everything they could to keep the 76ers in this game . Collison went 9 - for - 12 from the field and 2 - for - 2 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 25 points , while also adding three assists . After two straight games playing less than five minutes , he made a statement with the extra playing time he received . Rajon Rondo pitched in with 5 points ( 2 - 6 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 0 - 2 FT ) and 10 assists , marking a new season - high in points . He 's scored in double figures for three straight games now , after only doing it five times previously in the season . In his Sixers debut , Ish Smith did n't have the best night offensively , finishing with only five points ( 2 - 6 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) in 31 minutes . Coming off the bench , Nik Stauskas chipped in with 16 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 4 - 5 3Pt ) and two rebounds as well . The 76ers ' next game will be on the road against the Detroit Pistons on Friday , while the Sixers will be at home against the Indiana Pacers on Friday .
The Dallas Mavericks ( 47 - 31 ) defeated the Phoenix Suns ( 39 - 40 ) 107 - 104 on Wednesday in Dallas . A big fourth quarter gave the Mavericks a shot in the closing minutes , but the Mavericks proved to be just too much for them . Gerald Green led the way for the Mavericks , scoring a game - high 30 points on 10 - of - 19 shooting in 30 minutes . Markieff Morris added 19 points of his own , while Eric Bledsoe chipped in 14 points , a career - high seven rebounds and seven assists . The Mavericks were led by starting center Tyson Chandler , who recorded 12 points , 23 rebounds and two blocks in 34 minutes . Tyson Chandler also corralled a double - double , posting 12 points and 23 rebounds in 34 minutes . Marcus Morris scored 12 points in 34 minutes , while Devin Harris posted 12 points and two steals in 18 minutes . As a team , the Mavericks shot 48 percent from the field and knocked down 9 - of - 14 three - point attempts . The Mavericks , meanwhile , shot just 49 percent from the floor and knocked down 12 three - pointers . They were led by a near triple - double from Tyson Chandler , who had 19 points ( 7 - 15 FG , 4 - 2 FT ) and four rebounds in 31 minutes . Markieff Morris added 19 points ( 7 - 16 FG , 0 - 3 3Pt , 5 - 5 FT ) , four rebounds and seven assists , and Marcus Morris , who had a solid outing with 12 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 1 - 0 3Pt , 1 - 1 FT ) , 10 rebounds and four assists , in 34 minutes off the bench . The Mavericks will continue their road trip by traveling to Detroit to take on the Pistons on Friday , while Phoenix will head to Los Angeles to go up against the Clippers on Wednesday .
The Memphis Grizzlies ( 31 - 22 ) defeated the Brooklyn Nets ( 14 - 40 ) 109 - 90 on Monday at the Barclays Center in Brooklyn . The Grizzlies got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Nets 22 - 27 in the first quarter alone . They also shot better in this game , going 52 percent from the field and 45 percent from the three - point line , while the Nets went 47 percent from the floor and a meager 50 percent from beyond the arc . To put the icing on the cake , the Grizzlies forced the Nets into 20 turnovers , while committing just 10 of their own . Continuing his dominance of late , Brook Lopez had another very impressive performance , finishing with 20 points ( 8 - 14 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) , 4 rebounds and four assists . It was far - and - away his best game of the year so far , as it marked a new season - high in points , along with being his first double - double of the year . He 's averaging just 3 points and seven rebounds on the season . Also playing a big factor in the win was Mike Conley , who came off the bench for 18 points ( 7 - 14 FG , 3 - 7 3Pt , 1 - 1 FT ) , four rebounds and two assists in 29 minutes . Surprisingly it was his first double - double since the end of January , but it was good to see him get things turned back around . Coming off the bench , Wayne Ellington chipped in with 18 points ( 6 - 8 FG , 2 - 3 FT ) and two rebounds over 25 minutes as well . The Grizzlies ' next game will be on the road against the Detroit Pistons on Tuesday , while the Nets will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Wednesday .
The Washington Wizards ( 11 - 5 ) defeated the Miami Heat ( 9 - 8 ) 107 - 86 on Tuesday . The Wizards were unsuccessful in their bid to garner a playoff spot , but entered Sunday trying to finish the season off on a positive note . With the postseason out of reach , John Wall sat out a third consecutive game with his knee injury . Dwyane Wade was the high point man for the Wizards on Friday , pouring in 23 points on 8 - of - 14 shooting , to go along with three rebounds and three assists . Dwyane Wade contributed 20 points , three rebounds and one block , and Dwyane Wade had 20 points on 9 - of - 13 shooting . The lack of bench contributions ultimately spelled the difference , as the Heat only had 12 points from their reserves compared to the Cavs’ 32 . The Heat will return home Sunday to play their next game against the Houston Rockets . Washington , meanwhile will head to Philadelphia for a tilt with the 76ers on Monday . The Heat had control for most of the game , but fell short once again , thanks to some great offensive performances . The Wizards shot 54 percent from the field and just 53 percent from three - point range , shooting 46 percent from the field and committed 11 turnovers . Rasual Butler led the Heat with 23 points , and Marcin Gortat finished with 15 points and 10 rebounds . The Heat will look to extend their winning streak to nine on Friday against the Grizzlies .
The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the Oklahoma City Thunder , 114 - 80 , at FedEx Forum on Thursday . The Grizzlies ( 21 - 14 ) have a well - earned defensive reputation , but their thorough domination of the Thunder ( 20 - 13 ) was significantly helped by the ejection of Russell Westbrook for back - to - back technical fouls after 23 minutes for arguing a referee 's call . However , Memphis did earn the victory through their own strong offensive play as well , as they tallied superb 52 and 59 percent success rates from the field and three - point range , respectively . Meanwhile , without their MVP , the Thunder 's offense was largely neutered , as only two reserves , Enes Kanter and Alex Abrines , managed to get into double digits in the scoring column . Westbrook led OKC in scoring despite the early exit , supplying 21 points to go along with five rebounds and two steals , although he notably did not record any assists . Kanter totaled 19 points and five rebounds , while Abrines managed 10 points and three boards . Steven Adams mustered only six points but did haul in 15 rebounds and added two assists and two blocks . However , Chandler Parsons ( two points , two rebounds , three assists ) and Chandler Parsons ( two points , four rebounds , an assist ) were n't able to provide much on the scoreboard . Randolph led the way for the Thunder with 21 points , eight rebounds and two assists . Westbrook was right behind him with 21 points , which he complemented with five boards , two assists and two steals . JaMychal Green posted a 17 - point , 4 - rebound double - double that also included two assists , a steal and a block . Andrew Harrison provided 10 points , two rebounds , three assists and a block . Daniels and Jerami Grant led the bench with nine - point efforts .
The Houston Pacers ( 39 - 34 ) defeated the Houston Rockets ( 36 - 38 ) 104 - 101 on Friday . A game that was expected to be a grind - it - out defensive battle largely fulfilled that prophecy , with Indiana finally able to pull away on the strength of a pair of standout efforts from their two best players , and an injury to one of their opponent 's key pieces . James Harden led the way with a game - high 34 points , which he supplemented with eight rebounds , eight assists and a steal . However , he also committed a game - high seven turnovers . Monta Ellis followed with 23 points , seven assists , six rebounds , three steals and a block . Trevor Ariza followed with 19 points , four assists , two rebounds and a block . Dwight Howard chipped in with a 11 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included four blocks . C.J . Miles ( 10 points , a rebound , two assists ) and CJ Miles ( 10 points , three rebounds , two assists ) were productive in reserve roles as well . James Harden led the Rockets with 34 points , eight assists , eight rebounds and a steal . Ian Mahinmi was right behind him with a third straight strong performance , compiling 14 points , two rebounds , two assists and a steal . C.J . Miles led the bench with 10 points , two assists and a rebound . The Rockets remain in fourth place in the Western Conference 's Southwest Division , and are currently slotted in the seventh seed in the conference as well . They 're home again on Wednesday versus the Charlotte Hornets .
The Orlando Magic ( 26 - 45 ) defeated the Philadelphia 76ers ( 26 - 44 ) 112 - 109 on Wednesday at the Amway Center in Orlando . The Magic got off to a quick start in this game and took an early lead , finishing the first half up 55 - 47 . Despite shooting better from the field , the Magic did n't have as much success from the three - point line , where they went a meager 27 percent compared to the Sixers , who went 27 percent . Making up for their poor three - point shooting , the Magic did it on the defensive side of the ball and forced the Sixers into 16 turnovers , while committing just 18 of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . Nikola Vucevic had his way with the Sixers ' bigs . He went 11 - of - 19 from the field to score a game - high of 24 points , while also adding 14 rebounds in 37 minutes . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 16 points and 15 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 23 points and 6 rebounds on the year . T.J. Saric was the only other player to score in double figures for the Sixers . He finished with 17 points ( 4 - 7 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 9 - 11 FT ) and three rebounds in 26 minutes . He 's now averaging 19 points and 6 rebounds on the year . Coming off the bench , Nik Stauskas chipped in with 20 points ( 6 - 17 FG , 3 - 9 3Pt , 5 - 6 FT ) and five rebounds in 39 minutes as a starter . The 76ers ' next game will be at home against the Miami Heat on Wednesday , while the Sixers will travel to Miami to play the Heat on Wednesday .
The Portland Trail Blazers ( 2 - 2 ) defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves ( 2 - 1 ) 106 - 101 on Friday . Portland was able to secure a win for the 16th time in the last 23 games on the strength of a typically stellar effort from offensive linchpin Damian Lillard , along with strong performances from two of their best bench players . After a dead - even first period , Portland forged ahead in the second quarter to build a 16 - point lead by halftime . Both teams played relatively mistake - free basketball , with only 16 turnovers between them , but the Timberwolves managed to stay a step ahead of the Timberwolves on the night to secure the relatively comfortable victory . Lillard 's 34 points paced Minnesota , and he added two rebounds , seven assists , two steals and a block . Aminu was next in line with 16 points , nine rebounds and an assist . Gorgui Dieng contributed a 12 - point 12 - rebound double - double , and added an assist and a block . Ricky Rubio rounded things out for the starting five with 12 points , nine assists , nine rebounds and three steals . C.J . McCollum paced the reserves with 18 points , six rebounds , four assists , a steal and a block . The Timberwolves remain in last place in the Western Conference 's Northwest Division . They 're home against the Rockets on Monday . Minnesota was spearheaded by Lillard 's 34 - point , seven - assist , two - rebound effort that also included a pair of steals and a block . Andrew Wiggins was right behind him with 16 points , six rebounds , three assists and a steal . Ricky Rubio rounded out the starting five 's productive night with 12 points , nine assists and nine rebounds . Zach LaVine paced the Minnesota bench with 10 points . The Timberwolves fell to 2 - 1 and reside in second place in the Eastern Conference’s Central Division . They remain home for a date with the Timberwolves on Saturday .
The Sacramento Kings ( 1 - 0 ) defeated the Phoenix Suns ( 0 - 1 ) 113 - 94 on Wednesday at the US Airways Center in Phoenix . Despite being down 51 - 51 at half , the Kings came out strong in the third quarter and out - scored the Suns 59 - 42 to finish the second half and steal the victory on the road . The Kings were able to out - rebound the Suns 41 - 41 , giving them just enough of an advantage to coast to the victory . The Kings were led by Rudy Gay , who went 9 - for - 15 from the field and 1 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score 22 points , while also grabbing three rebounds . The three blocked shots were a season - high for him , while it was also his third double - double in his last four games . Rudy Gay notched a double - double of his own , finishing with 22 points ( 9 - 15 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) and three rebounds . He 's now averaging 33 points and 13 rebounds per game on the season . Eric Bledsoe stuffed the stat sheet again , scoring 16 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) , while also contributing six rebounds and five assists . He 's now averaging 18 points and 5 rebounds on the year . The Kings ' next game will be at home against the Charlotte Hornets on Friday , while the Suns will be at home against the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday .

The Clippers shot 52 percent from the field as a team , while the Clippers shot 52 percent as a team . Jared Sullinger scored a game - high 21 points and grabbed 11 rebounds in 30 minutes . Up next , the Clippers will head home Saturday to take on the Grizzlies , while the Celtics will stay home to take on the red - hot Cavaliers on Friday .
The San Antonio Spurs ( 25 - 16 ) defeated the Portland Trail Blazers ( 30 - 10 ) 110 - 96 on Wednesday . The Blazers have now lost four straight games , with the last pair of defeats coming with Damian Lillard sidelined with plantar fasciitis . Backcourt mate C.J . McCollum valiantly returned from his own ailment ( two sprained ankles ) on Wednesday to attempt to provide some offensive punch in the All-Star point guard 's absence , but Portland fell woefully short overall , despite facing a Spurs defense that came in yielding a league - worst 108 points per game . The Blazers have now failed to hit the century mark scoring - wise in both contests that Lillard has missed , underscoring how much the offensively - challenged team misses his 17 points and 9 assists per game . Lillard 's 23 points paced the Spurs , and he added five assists and a pair of rebounds . Aldridge managed a 24 - point , 8 - rebound double - double that also included three assists , a steal and a block . Tony Parker provided 17 points , seven assists and two rebounds . Tim Duncan was next with a solid line of 11 points , 12 rebounds , six assists , two blocks and a steal . Meyers Leonard led the bench with 12 points , three rebounds , an assist and a block . The Blazers are currently in fourth place in the Western Conference 's Southwest Division , and they retain a rather tenuous hold on the eighth seed in the conference by one - and - one - half games over the Utah Jazz . They now head to Philadelphia to face off against the Blazers on Wednesday night .
The Chicago Bulls ( 21 - 12 ) defeated the Milwaukee Bucks ( 14 - 23 ) 117 - 106 on Monday at the BMO Harris Bradley Center in Chicago . The Bulls were the superior shooters in this game , going 55 percent from the field and 26 percent from the three - point line , while the Bucks went 45 percent from the floor and just 38 percent from beyond the arc . The Bulls had seven players reach double figures in points . Pau Gasol led the way , going 10 - for - 14 from the field and 4 - for - 4 from the free throw line to score 26 points , while also adding 11 rebounds and three blocked shots . It was a season - high in points for Gasol , who was also able to convert 10 - of - 4 attempts at the free throw line . Giannis Antetokounmpo continued his strong start to the season , recording a team - high of 18 points ( 8 - 17 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt , 2 - 5 FT ) , to go along with 11 rebounds and three blocked shots . It marked his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's combined for 37 points and 42 rebounds . He 's now pushed his season averages to 17 points and 3 assists per game . Michael Antetokounmpo was the other big contributor in the starting lineup . He went 8 - for - 17 from the field and 2 - for - 2 from the three - point line to score 18 points , while also adding seven rebounds and four blocked shots . The 18 points were a new season - high for him , while the double - double was his first since the end of January . The Bucks ' next game will be at home against the Boston Celtics on Friday , while the Bucks will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Wednesday .
The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the Charlotte Hornets in overtime , 125 - 120 , at Spectrum Center on Saturday . The Timberwolves ( 6 - 14 ) may have looked like somewhat easy prey to the hometown Hornets , considering they came in with a 5 - 14 record despite their solid talent . The first quarter did nothing to dissuade those beliefs , as Charlotte ( 11 - 9 ) jumped out to a 29 - 19 lead after the first 12 minutes . However , Minnesota clawed back to trail by only three , 52 - 49 by intermission . The second half was a continuous see - saw battle that appeared like it might go the Hornets ' way in the closing seconds , until an Andrew Wiggins 31 - foot three - point jumper with eight seconds remaining knotted the score at 106 . He then sunk a pair of clutch free throws with 11 seconds remaining in overtime to give Minnesota some crucial breathing room at 123 - 118 . That five - point margin was the final separation between the two teams , as the Timberwolves secured only their third road win of the season . Wiggins totaled 29 points overall while leading the visitors , and he added four assists , a rebound and three steals . Karl-Anthony Towns was right behind him with 27 points , 15 rebounds , an assist , two blocks and a steal . Zach LaVine supplied 17 points , three assists , two rebounds , two steals and a block . Ricky Rubio managed a modest nine points but did dish out 12 assists . Nemanja Bjelica and Shabazz Muhammad led the bench with a pair of 12 - point efforts , and also totaled eight rebounds between them . The Timberwolves were paced by Kemba Walker , who posted 22 points , eight assists and four rebounds . Frank Kaminsky III got another start at power forward in place of Marvin Williams and tallied 21 points , nine rebounds , five assists , a steal and a block . Zach LaVine followed with 17 points , three rebounds , three assists , two steals and a block . Ricky Rubio rounded things out for the starting five with nine points , 12 assists , seven rebounds , a steal and a block . Shabazz Muhammad paced the reserves with 12 points , six boards and an assist . Charlotte remains in third place in the Eastern Conference 's Southeast Division , and is slotted in the sixth seed as well . They head to New Orleans to face the Pelicans on Friday night .

The Hawks were also able to force the Lakers into 16 turnovers , while committing only 17 of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . Al Horford had his way with the Lakers . He went 6 - for - 11 from the field and 3 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score 16 points , while also adding nine rebounds and a blocked shot . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 37 points and 16 rebounds over his last two games . He 's now averaging 15 points and 12 rebounds on the season . Jeff Teague recorded a double - double of his own , as he finished with 13 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) , five assists and two steals . The Lakers ' next game will be on the road against the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday , while the Lakers will be at home against the Minnesota Timberwolves on Friday .

The Chicago Bulls ( 11 - 6 ) defeated the Brooklyn Nets ( 6 - 9 ) 102 - 84 on Friday . Chicago has won four straight and seven of their last eight . Everything is looking good for the Bulls right now . They 're winning , and they were finally able to play back - to - back games with a fully healthy roster after struggling to have everyone available on the same night most of this season . Derrick Rose returned to action Monday against the Raptors , and in his two games back , he 's put up 27 points and 25 points . The early - season rust seems to be breaking off , and if Rose can stay healthy , a great performance on Christmas Day could be on tap for Thursday 's game against the Lakers . Brooklyn has lost five straight games , and while their prospects this season look dire at the moment , the team has faced off against plenty of formidable teams in the early part of their schedule , leaving the door open to hope for more wins going forward . Just as a team like the Cleveland Cavaliers is sturggling to find consistency due to having so many new additions , the roster turnover for the Nets can be pointed to as the source of their struggles thus far . Jarrett Rose scored a team - high 14 points in 20 minutes . The Nets will go on the road to face the Milwaukee Bucks on Saturday , while the Nets will stay home and play the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday .

The Suns have now won five - straight games , as they are reeling headed into the All-Star break . This was a wire - to - wire win for the Rockets , as they held a double - digit lead for the final 35 minutes . The Rockets were unconscious from deep , as they hit 49 percent of their shots from the field , 80 percent from the free - throw line and 36 percent from three - point range . The bench was huge as well , with the Rockets bench outscoring the Suns bench , 60 - 26 . The Suns will look to build off this win when they take on the Memphis Grizzlies on Tuesday . Sam Dekker and Leandro Barbosa each scored 12 points a piece .

The Phoenix Suns defeated the Los Angeles Lakers 137 - 101 Wednesday at Talking Stick Resort Arena . It did n't take long for the Suns to grab ahold of this game , as they managed to open the game on a 27 - 8 run and never looked back . After winning the opening quarter by 17 points , Phoenix continued to pile it on and effectively ended the game by halftime . The Suns ' backcourt was efficient and dominant offensively in the victory , with Eric Bledsoe leading the way with a triple - double of 25 points , 13 assists and 10 rebounds . Devin Booker added 23 points of his own on 9 - of - 14 shooting from the field and 4 - of - 7 shooting from behind the arc . In the end , all 13 Phoenix players managed to score against a struggling Lakers ( 19 - 39 ) defense . Those Lakers have now dropped two games in a row and three of their last four following Wednesday 's embarrassing defeat that ended with the team shooting just 38 percent from the field . Lou Williams was one of the lone bright spots for Los Angeles , as he increased his trade value yet again with 21 points off the bench on 7 - of - 13 shooting from the field . D'Angelo Russell added 21 points of his own , but he shot a subpar 7 - of - 20 from the field Wednesday . With the loss , the Lakers sit just a half - game behind the Suns for the worst record in the West but remain nine games behind the Nets for the worst record in the NBA . The teams will now both head into the All-Star break , with both resuming play on Friday , Feb. 24 .

The Celtics got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Suns 36 - 29 in the first quarter alone . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 32 points and 12 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 27 points and 11 rebounds on the season . Isaiah Thomas also had a solid showing of his own , scoring 19 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 1 - 5 3Pt , 2 - 4 FT ) and handing out five assists . The Celtics ' next game will be at home against the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday , while the Suns will be at home against the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday .

Even though Miami trailed by 19 at times in the second quarter , they rallied to pull out a much needed win . The third and fourth quarters is when Miami did their damage , as they outscored Los Angeles . 62 - 47 in that stretch . The Heat 's offense was efficient as ever , as they shot 54 percent from the field and 50 percent from three - point range . Rebounding and assists were lopsided as well , as Miami won the rebounding , 47 - 40 and the assist differential , 25 - 18 . The Heat 's first lead did not come until there was a minute left in the third quarter . Los Angeles ( 11 - 21 ) is in their worst stretch of the season right now and they continue to falter against bad teams . Lou Williams was once again the best player for the Lakers , as he dropped 27 points off the bench . Nick Young led the starters in scoring , as he scored 20 points on 7 - of - 14 shooting . D'Angelo Russell had his bets game in weeks , accumulating 17 points , four rebounds and seven assists . On deck for Los Angeles is a road matchup against the Orlando Magic on Friday . Miami ( 10 - 20 ) have been playing better than results would show , so a win here is just what the doctor ordered . Hassan Whiteside matched Winslow , as he provided 23 points and 13 rebounds of his own . Goran Dragic was the only other starter in double figures , as he collected 21 points and seven assists . Nick Young led all bench scorers with 20 points .
The Washington Wizards defeated the Indiana Pacers , 111 - 105 , at Verizon Center on Monday . The two teams engaged in a true see - saw battle , with each club dominating in alternate quarters . It was the Wizards ( 15 - 16 ) who got hot at the right time , however , as they outscored the Pacers ( 15 - 18 ) by a 26 - 31 margin in the final period . The Pacers were led by a pair of 22 - point efforts from Jeff Teague and Otto Porter , with the former adding two rebounds , one assist , and one block , and the latter providing two boards , two assists and a steal . Bradley Beal was right behind with 19 points , 11 assists , two rebounds and one steal . Myles Turner posted a 15 - point , 8 - rebound double - double that also included four assists and one steal . C.J . Miles ( 15 points , three rebounds ) and Markieff Morris ( 10 points , seven rebounds ) rounded out the bench 's stellar night . The Pacers ( 15 - 18 ) were led by John Wall , who went for 19 points , two assists , two rebounds and two steals . Myles Turner posted a 15 - point , eight - rebound double - double that also included two blocks and three blocks . Bradley Teague tallied 12 points , two assists , one rebound and two steals . C.J . Miles led the second unit with 15 points , three rebounds and one assist . The Pacers head back home to tangle with the Detroit Pistons on Friday night , while the Wizards remain home to face off with the Boston Celtics on Friday evening as well .
The Chicago Bulls ( 9 - 5 ) defeated the Los Angeles Lakers ( 7 - 7 ) 118 - 110 on Friday . Chicago has won four straight games and seven of their last eight . Everything is looking good for the Bulls right now . They 're winning , and they were finally able to play back - to - back games with a fully healthy roster after struggling to have everyone available on the same night most of this season . Lou Williams paced the Lakers on Friday , putting up a game - high 25 points to go with three assists and two steals . The Bulls will try to extend their winning streak when they host the Phoenix Suns on Sunday . Los Angeles has lost four of their last five games as they struggle to overcome the absence of Dwyane Bosh . Bosh has missed the last eight games with a calf strain . He was targeting a return for this game but was not ready to go . Timofey Mozgov got the start at center , putting up 15 points and seven rebounds in 32 minutes . Nick Young scored a team - high 18 points in 26 minutes . The Lakers will go on the road to face the Denver Nuggets on Friday . The Lakers will finish up their four - game road trip against the Detroit Pistons on Sunday . Los Angeles has lost two of their last three games as they continue to experiment with their latest starting lineup that includes Rajon Rondo at point guard . Rajon Rondo sat out a second straight game with an ankle bruise . They had just one starter finish in double digits , but four bench players were able to crack the threshold . They 'll return home to host the Orlando Magic on Sunday .

The Hawks ( 10 - 8 ) checked in to Wednesday 's contest having experienced their share of shooting struggles this season , although they 'd shown signs of improvement in having won three of the prior four games . They heated up significantly from the field against the Hawks ( 10 - 8 ) , managing a 44 percent success rate from the floor and 24 percent from three - point range . They also forced 18 turnovers from the Hawks , and held them to a 42 percent success rate from the field and 34 percent from three - point range . Tim Hardaway , Jr. paced the bench with 10 points .
The Detroit Pistons ( 3 - 6 ) defeated the Oklahoma City Thunder ( 3 - 7 ) 96 - 89 on Wednesday at the Palace of Auburn Hills . Collectively as a team , the Thunder shot just 40 percent from the field and 36 percent from the three - point line . The Pistons shot 43 percent from the field and 36 percent from beyond the arc compared to the Thunder , who only shot 40 percent from the field and 33 percent from beyond the arc . Serge Ibaka finished with a game - high 19 points ( 8 - 20 FG , 0 - 9 3Pt ) , to go along with 10 rebounds and two blocked shots . It marked his second double - double over his last three games , a stretch where he 's averaging 23 points and 10 rebounds . Jackson came one assist shy of a double - double , as he posted 20 points ( 9 - 17 FG , 2 - 6 3Pt , 0 - 2 FT ) , 12 assists and four steals . While he did n't reach his season average of 21 points per game , it was still a very positive all - around effort . They only other player to score in double figures was Greg Monroe , who came off the bench to score 12 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt ) in 34 minutes . The Pistons ' next game will be at home against the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday , while the Thunder will travel to Washington to play the Wizards on Saturday .
The Los Angeles Clippers ( 10 - 1 ) defeated the Brooklyn Nets ( 4 - 6 ) 127 - 95 on Saturday . LA has won three straight games , and the deeper they get into the season , the more believable the Clippers ' turnaround under coach Jason Kidd appears to be a sustainable change . The Clippers gave all five of the bench players they used at least 18 minutes . Blake Griffin led all scorers with 21 points to go along with six rebounds , nine assists and five steals . J.J. Redick scored a team - high 18 points and grabbed four assists in 25 minutes . Jamal Crawford ( 17 ) was the only other starter to score in double figures . The Nets were led by Bojan Bogdanovic , who scored 18 points in 25 minutes off the bench . The Nets will go on the road to face the Los Angeles Lakers on Sunday . Brooklyn was playing the second night of a back - to - back set . They beat the Phoenix Suns 103 - 95 on Friday , and with the way the Suns run , it 's no surprise the Nets did n't have enough in the tank to take on a rested Clippers squad . Brooklyn shot just 44 percent from the field and 30 percent from beyond the arc , but they simply didn’t do enough to win the road . They shot 53 percent from the field and outrebounded the Nets 50 - 37 in the win . Brooklyn has now won seven of its last eight games and are steadily moving up the Eastern Conference standings . They 'll have their biggest test of the season in their next game , when they take on the undefeated Golden State Warriors on Wednesday .
The Milwaukee Bucks ( 41 - 40 ) defeated the Philadelphia 76ers ( 18 - 63 ) 107 - 97 on Sunday at the BMO Harris Bradley Center in Milwaukee . The Bucks were the superior shooters in this game , going 49 percent from the field and 44 percent from the three - point line , while the Sixers went just 40 percent from the floor and a meager 21 percent from beyond the arc . The Bucks also out - rebounded the 76ers 39 - 40 , giving them even more of an advantage . In just his third game of the season , Michael Carter-Williams went off for 30 points ( 11 - 17 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 8 - 13 FT ) , while also adding five rebounds and five assists . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 28 points and 9 rebounds . Notching a double - double of his own , Antetokounmpo posted 12 points ( 3 - 9 FG , 6 - 10 FT ) and seven rebounds , while Antetokounmpo had 12 points ( 3 - 9 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 6 - 10 FT ) and seven rebounds . Robinson has been on a tear of late , averaging 50 points over his last four games . The Sixers ' next game will be on the road against the Atlanta Hawks on Friday , while the 76ers will travel to Sacramento to play the Kings on Friday .

Zach Randolph ( knee ) was still out , but the Grizzlies used their depth to get out to a comfortable lead early . Six players scored in double figures with Mike Conley scoring a team - high 18 points . Miami had a 12 - point lead at the half , but could n't hold off a late Grizzlies run . The Heat committed 11 turnovers in the loss while the Heat were held to just 49 percent shooting from the field and 31 percent from beyond the arc . The Orlando Magic defeated the San Antonio Spurs , 95 - 83 , at Amway Center on Wednesday evening . The Magic ( 7 - 11 ) embarked on their current road trip as losers of four in a row , and appeared like a team in disarray all the way around . However , they 've found a way to turn things around away from the confines of Amway Center , as they 've now managed to rattle off victories in four of their last five games , including three straight . Serge Ibaka played a pivotal role in Sunday 's win , as he posted a team - high 18 points and added seven rebounds , two assists , two steals and a block . With the win , Orlando shot an impressive 45 percent from the field , while limiting San Antonio to just 37 percent from the field and 25 percent from three - point range . San Antonio was led by Kawhi Leonard , who managed 16 points , six rebounds , three assists and a block . Evan Fournier was next with 13 points , seven assists , three rebounds and two steals . Augustin led the bench with seven points , five assists , four rebounds and two steals . Kawhi Leonard led the way for the Magic with 21 points , which he supplemented with two rebounds , two blocks and one steal . Evan Fournier was next with 13 points , seven assists , three rebounds and two steals . Nikola Vucevic posted a 12 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included a block . Elfrid Parker tallied 10 points , seven assists , two rebounds and a pair of steals . D.J . Augustin managed a bench - leading 13 points , along with six rebounds , three assists and two steals . San Antonio remains in third place in the Western Conference 's Pacific Division . They head to Detroit to take on the Pistons on Monday night .

The Memphis Grizzlies ( 20 - 18 ) defeated the Denver Nuggets ( 13 - 24 ) 91 - 84 on Sunday at Fed Ex Forum Arena in Denver . The Grizzlies got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Nuggets 29 - 30 in the first quarter alone . They also shot better in this game , going 37 percent from the field , while the Nuggets went just 37 percent . The Grizzlies also out - rebounded the Nuggets 43 - 59 , giving them just enough of an advantage to coast to the victory . The Grizzlies were led by Zach Randolph , who went 9 - for - 19 from the field and 6 - for - 8 from the free throw line to score 24 points , while also grabbing six rebounds . It was a season - high in points for Randolph , who also posted his second double - double in as many games . Jeff Green was the only other Grizzlies ' player to reach double figures in points . He finished with 16 points ( 4 - 13 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt , 5 - 8 FT ) , nine rebounds and two assists in 35 minutes . He 's really stepped up his game in the absence of Jamal Crawford , as Conley is averaging 18 points and 3 assists over his last five games . Matt Barnes did his best to keep up with the Grizzlies , as he shot 4 - for - 7 from the field and 3 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score 15 points , while adding seven rebounds in 33 minutes . It was his second game in a row with 10 points , after not reaching it once previously in the season . Coming off the bench , Matt Barnes shot well , going 4 - for - 7 from the field and 3 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score 15 points . He added seven rebounds , two assists and one steal , while Darrell Arthur chipped in a double - double of his own with 12 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt ) and nine rebounds . The Grizzlies ' next game will be on the road against the Milwaukee Bucks on Wednesday , while the Nuggets will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Wednesday .
The Brooklyn Nets ( 11 - 28 ) defeated the New York Knicks ( 20 - 21 ) 110 - 104 on Monday at Madison Square Garden in New York . The Nets got out to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Knicks 29 - 20 in the first quarter alone . The Knicks were the superior shooters in this game , going 52 percent from the field and 53 percent from the three - point line , while the Knicks went 45 percent from the floor and 32 percent from beyond the arc . The Nets were also able to force the Knicks into 13 turnovers , while committing only 15 of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . Derrick Williams led the way , going 11 - for - 17 from the field and 0 - for - 3 from the three - point line to finish with a game - high of 31 points , while also adding seven rebounds and two steals . He 's combined for 59 points over his last two games , as he continues to have the hot hand . Calderon on the other hand went 6 - for - 12 from the field and 4 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score 16 points , while also adding seven rebounds and four assists . He 's now averaging 13 points and 5 rebounds on the year . The other starter to reach double figures in points was Kristaps Porzingis , who posted 12 points ( 5 - 17 FG , 0 - 3 3Pt ) and 10 rebounds . The Nets ' next game will be on the road against the Detroit Pistons on Friday , while the Knicks will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Wednesday .
The Boston Celtics ( 33 - 18 ) defeated the Los Angeles Clippers ( 31 - 20 ) 107 - 102 at Staples Center on Saturday . On the second game of a back - to - back , the Celtics bounced back following a big fourth quarter effort . They jumped out to a 29 - 19 lead and never looked back , as the lead reached as many as 25 points in the third quarter . The Clippers mounted a mini - comeback midway through the fourth , cutting the lead to 13 at one point , but a pair of Al Jordan free throws trimmed the deficit to just nine with six seconds to play . With a chance to re - take the lead , Jamal Crawford hit a 18 - foot three - point shot with four seconds left to give the Clippers a one point lead . The Celtics were never able to come away with the victory in the first minute of the game , maintaining a double - digit lead over the final six minutes of the fourth quarter . Blake Griffin added 23 points ( 9 - 19 FG , 5 - 6 FT ) and eight rebounds and added four assists , four blocks and one steal . Raymond Felton played well off the bench , scoring 16 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 3 - 5 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) , along with five rebounds and four assists , in 25 minutes off the bench . The only other player to score in double figures for the Celtics was Amir Crowder , who chipped in 11 points and six rebounds . The Celtics shot 42 percent from the field , while assisting on 22 - of - 25 field goals . Next , the Clippers will head to Atlanta to take on the Hawks on Saturday . The Clippers have a couple of days off before hosting the Clippers on Wednesday .

Jefferson had shot less than 38 percent in two out of his last three games , so it was good to see him get dialed in on Monday . They capped off the first half with a 48 - 39 point lead , giving them enough of an advantage to coast to a victory on the road . The Jazz were led by the duo of Derrick Favors and Klay Thompson . The Cavaliers got off to a really strong start , out - scoring the Cavaliers 22 - 29 right away in the first quarter . The Cavaliers did n't let off the gas either , as they never trailed in this game . Along with the quick start , the Cavaliers were also the superior shooters . They finished at 46 percent from the field and 35 percent from the three - point line , while the Cavaliers went 46 percent from the floor and just 28 percent from deep . James went 12 - for - 22 from the field and 0 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score 29 points , while also adding 14 rebounds over 39 minutes . The 15 rebounds were a new season - high , while the double - double was his first since the end of January . The Cavaliers ' next game will be at home against the Atlanta Hawks on Friday , while the Cavaliers will travel to Miami to play the Heat on Wednesday .

The Utah Jazz defeated the New York Knicks , 114 - 109 , at Madison Square Garden on Sunday . The Jazz ( 4 - 3 ) braced themselves for an offensive void when they lost Gordon Hayward to a finger injury in preseason , as he was slated to miss a minimum of six weeks . However , the standout forward beat the recovery timetable by at least two weeks , starting at the three on Sunday for Utah . He looked as if he had n't missed a beat , rattling off a team - high 28 points , along with five rebounds . While he only found the net on six of his 17 field - goal attempts , he impressively drained all 14 of his shots from the free - throw line . His effort spearheaded a highly productive day for the Jazz offense that saw all five members of the first unit hit double - digit scoring and Utah produce a collective 51 percent success rate from the field . George Hill , who 's helped pick up a good bit of the offensive slack in Hayward 's absence , continued to thrive despite the latter 's return to the court , totaling 23 points , six rebounds , four assists and a steal . Rodney Hood was right behind with 18 points , six rebounds , five assists and a steal . Rudy Gobert and Derrick Favors turned in a pair of 13 - point efforts from the frontcourt , with the former also contributing eight rebounds , an assist , three blocks and a steal , and the latter supplying six boards . Joe Johnson , who headed to the bench with Hayward 's return , tallied 10 points to pace the bench . The Knicks ( 2 - 4 ) were co - led by a pair of 28 - point outputs for Carmelo Anthony and Kristaps Porzingis . Anthony also registered nine rebounds and three assists , while Porzingis supplied eight boards , an assist and two blocks . Derrick Rose continued his strong stretch of play to open his tenure in the Big Apple , totaling 18 points , eight assists , four rebounds and a steal . Courtney Lee was the fourth member of the starting five to hit double digits in the scoring column , posting 10 points , six boards and three steals . The Knicks head back home to face off with the Denver Nuggets on Monday night , while the Knicks remain home to face the Denver Nuggets on Monday evening as well .
The Golden State Warriors defeated the Detroit Pistons , 127 - 107 , at Oracle Arena on Thursday . The Warriors were heavy favorites headed into this matchup and they left no doubt who the better team was . It was n't lopsided throughout though , as there were 11 ties and 21 lead changes in the first half . That 's when Golden State turned it on though , outscoring Detroit , 67 - 49 , in the second half . The Warriors offense was on point , shooting 56 percent from the field , 51 percent from three - point range and recording 39 assists . Three-point shooting really killed Detroit , as they went just 6 - of - 28 from long distance . The Pistons ( 18 - 23 ) have struggled on the road all season and a matchup against Golden State is the last thing they wanted to see . Marcus Morris was Detroit 's best player , as he tallied 21 points , five rebounds and three assists . Andre Drummond recorded another double - double , totaling 12 points and 10 rebounds . Tobias Harris got the start and amassed 18 points and four rebounds . Boban Marjanovic was the only bench player in double figures , amassing 13 points and 11 rebounds on 5 - of - 7 from the field . The Warriors ( 34 - 6 ) have been taking it to teams all season and this blowout win was no different . Kevin Durant led the team in scoring , accruing 25 points , six rebounds and nine assists on 10 - of - 15 shooting . Steph Curry was just as good , collecting 24 points , six assists and five steals . Klay Thompson dropped 23 points of his own . Draymond Green failed to hit a shot , but he provided nine rebounds and 13 assists . Ian Clark and Shaun Livingston each scored in double figures off the bench .

However , that phrase seems to be carrying a little more weight these days , as Philadelphia , behind emerging star Joel Embiid , is starting to make some noise around the league . The latest team to get an up - close look at their improving squad was the 76ers ( 7 - 19 ) , which suffered their eighth road loss of the season while seeing Embiid tally 33 points , nine rebounds , an assist , three steals and three blocks . It was the first time since Feb. 35 that he failed to record a double - double , and it was the first time since Jan. 22 where he failed to record at least six rebounds . The New Orleans Pelicans defeated the Dallas Mavericks , 121 - 118 , at Smoothie King Center on Wednesday . These are two of the hottest teams in the Western Conference right now and New Orleans showed that their season is still alive with this crucial win . It was a tale of two halves , as Dallas took a six - point lead into the locker room , while New Orleans responded by winning the second half , 61 - 37 . Rebounding was key for the Pelicans , as they won that battle , 44 - 23 . The big men of New Orleans dominated in the paint , outscoring the Pelicans , 46 - 26 . The Pelicans ( 32 - 43 ) had a tough task here against one of the best home teams in the league and they fell just shy in this close loss . Anthony Davis carried the load , as he tallied 30 points and 13 rebounds on 11 - of - 21 shooting . Harrison Barnes also had one of his best games of the season , totaling 19 points and eight rebounds . That 's evident by the first quarter , in which Toronto outscored Dallas , 30 - 22 . Despite all the statistics being close , the Raptors won nearly every one , as they led in shooting , rebounding , assisting , steals , blocks and turnover differentials . The Raptors defense was huge , as they held the Mavericks to 38 percent from the field and 25 percent from three - point range . Harrison Barnes led Dallas in scoring , as he dropped 23 points on 8 - of - 17 shooting . Harrison Barnes was the only other Maverick in double figures , as he totaled 23 points and seven rebounds . Harrison Barnes led Toronto in scoring , as he accrued 23 points , seven rebounds and three steals . Serge Ibaka totaled 18 points , eight rebounds and four assists . Serge Ibaka was second on the team , providing 18 points and eight rebounds off the bench . Dirk Nowitzki was the only other Dallas player in double figures , as he scored 18 points on 8 - of - 16 shooting . Toronto will look to play better on Sunday in a road matchup against the Oklahoma City Thunder .
The Oklahoma City Thunder ( 42 - 19 ) defeated the Los Angeles Clippers ( 40 - 20 ) 98 - 103 on Friday . The Clippers found out earlier in the day that superstar forward Blake Griffin will be sidelined for much longer than originally anticipated , but his problematic quadriceps tendon is n't the cause . Instead , it 's a broken right hand allegedly suffered during an altercation with a team employee in Toronto that will apparently keep him out 1 - 12 additional weeks . His continued absence keeps the spotlight squarely on Chris Paul , who has more often than not already served as the team 's scoring leader during the time Griffin has already missed . The All-Star point guard did not disappoint in that role Thursday , scoring a team - high 21 points and adding a season - high 12 assists , four rebounds , a steal and a block . DeAndre Jordan was right behind him with 20 points , 18 boards and a steal . J.J. Redick was next with 16 points , three assists , a rebound and a steal . Oklahoma City was led by Russell Westbrook , who posted a 24 - point , 12 - assist double - double that also included six rebounds and a steal . DeAndre Jordan posted a 20 - point , 18 - rebound double - double that also included two assists , a steal and a block . Serge Ibaka pitched in with 11 points , 11 rebounds , two assists and a steal . Jamal Crawford paced the second unit with 12 points , two rebounds and two assists . The Clippers remain in second place in the Western Conference 's Northwest Division , and are currently slotted in the seventh seed in the conference as well . They head to Los Angeles to face the Lakers on Friday night . The Clippers were spearheaded by Durant 's 24 points , six rebounds , five assists , a block and a pair of steals . DeAndre Jordan was right behind with 20 points , 18 rebounds and a steal . JJ Redick was next with 16 points , three rebounds , three assists and a steal . JJ Redick was next with 16 points , three assists , a rebound and a steal . Serge Ibaka was productive in a reserve role as well , amassing 11 points , 11 rebounds and a pair of assists . The Clippers remain in fourth place in the Western Conference 's Northwest Division , and are 4 games behind the eighth - seeded Dallas Mavericks . They head to Sacramento to take on the Kings on Sunday night .
The Charlotte Hornets defeated the Miami Heat , 91 - 82 , at Spectrum Center on Thursday . The refrain is a familiar one for the Hornets ( 19 - 14 ) , but does n't seem to get old : The dynamic duo of Kemba Walker and Nicolas Batum supply a significant portion of the offense , and the complementary pieces around them step up in support as needed . That formula equaled another home victory for Charlotte on Thursday , their 11th of the season in 17 home games . Walker scored a game - high 22 points , while Batum provided 16 . The hosts also played superior team defense , holding the Heat ( 10 - 23 ) to 40 percent shooting overall and inducing 16 turnovers . Miami was paced by Josh Richardson , who followed up a 22 - point outing against the Thunder on Tuesday with another 20 points on Thursday , along with four rebounds , two assists , a block and a steal . Tyler Johnson came off the bench to supply 18 points , seven rebounds , five assists , two steals and a block . Wayne Ellington provided 12 points , two boards and an assist in a reserve role as well . The returning Goran Dragic could only muster five points on 2 - of - 11 shooting , although he did add eight assists , three rebounds and a steal . Hassan Whiteside went for eight points , 10 rebounds and two blocks , notably taking only seven shots on the night . Walker complemented his aforementioned scoring total with seven rebounds , four assists and a steal . Batum filled out the stat sheet with 13 rebounds , eight assists , three steals and a block . Marvin Williams registered 13 points , two assists , a rebound and a steal . Cody Zeller offered nine points , seven rebounds , two assists , a steal and a block , while Jeremy Lamb led the second unit with 10 points , nine rebounds and a block . The Heat next head to Boston for a Friday night battle with the Celtics , while the Hornets host the Cleveland Cavaliers for a New Year 's Eve showdown on Friday night .

The Thunder got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the 76ers 29 - 22 right away in the first quarter . Along with the quick start , the Thunder also shot much better than the 76ers , going 55 percent from the field , while 32 percent from the three - point line and 32 percent from the three - point line , while the 76ers finished at 43 percent from the floor and just 32 percent from deep . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 100 points and 26 rebounds over his last two games . He 's now averaging 18 points and 12 rebounds on the season . Victor Oladipo was another player with a solid showing . He did n't have his best shooting performance on the season ( 6 - 13 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 3 - 3 FT ) , but he still finished with 18 points , as he was able to get to the free throw line at a high rate . In the two games since returning from the All-Star break , he 's combined for 45 points and nine assists . He 's now averaging 16 points and 14 rebounds on the year . The Utah Jazz ( 24 - 16 ) defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers ( 28 - 9 ) 100 - 92 on Sunday at Quicken Loans Arena in Utah . The Jazz got out to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Cavaliers 57 - 49 in the first half . Along with the quick start , the Jazz also used their superior shooting to grab an advantage , going 48 percent from the field and 38 percent from the three - point line , while the Cavaliers went 37 percent from the floor and just 29 percent from deep . After going on record saying he 'd come out much more agressive in this outing , LeBron James backed those words up , as he finished with a game - high of 29 points ( 10 - 20 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt , 6 - 7 FT ) , to go along with five assists , four rebounds and four steals . James did n't even hit a three - pointer , but he was still able to get to the hoop and score as he pleased . It was clear he planned on taking over from the start and if he can continue to have this type of impact , the Jazz should be very tough defeat , even without Kevin Love . Kyrie Irving had a relatively quiet night . He went 5 - for - 11 from the field and 0 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score 20 points , while also adding four assists . After taking double - digit shot attempts in all five of his previous playoff games coming into this one , Irving had just nine field goal attempts Wednesday , although he was able to consistently force his way to the free throw line . Irving was able to take a backseat to James , who readily took this game over from the start . So far this postseason , Irving is averaging 24 points and 2 assists over six games . Tristan Thompson added 12 points ( 5 - 8 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 2 - 5 FT ) , 12 rebounds and three blocked shots as well . The Cavaliers ' next game will be at home against the Denver Nuggets on Thursday , while the Cavaliers will travel to Denver to play the Nuggets on Friday .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the Chicago Bulls , 116 - 96 , at United Center on Wednesday . The dynamic duo of Giannis Antetokounmpo and Jabari Parker were at it again for the Bucks ( 16 - 16 ) , as they posted over half of the team 's scoring total while each played at least 40 minutes . Their combined 23 - of - 34 effort from the field spearheaded a red - hot Milwaukee offense that drained their buckets at a 57 percent clip , and that also was successful on 60 percent of their 15 attempts from behind the arc . Meanwhile , the Bulls ( 16 - 18 ) could only get one such standout effort , which came from Jimmy Butler . The offensive imbalance ultimately left them unable to keep pace as the game wore on , and accordingly , the Bucks outscored their hosts by a 67 - 45 margin in the second half . Antetokounmpo tallied a game - high 35 points , and added nine rebounds , eight assists , seven blocks and two steals in a remarkable performance . Parker followed with 27 points , five rebounds , three assists , a steal and a block . Malcolm Brogdon continued his rapid development , as he managed 15 points , 12 assists and 11 rebounds , his first career triple - double . Greg Monroe led the bench with 15 points , 12 rebounds , two assists and a pair of steals . Butler 's 26 points paved the way for Chicago , and he complemented them with eight assists , seven boards and two steals . Robin Lopez provided a 12 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included an assist and a block . Taj Gibson contributed 11 points , five rebounds , an assist and a block . Michael Carter-Williams , who drew the start for the struggling Rajon Rondo , and Dwyane Wade both struggled , as they only turned in eight apiece .
The Miami Heat defeated the Phoenix Suns , 108 - 92 , at Talking Stick Resort Arena on Sunday . Hassan Whiteside has been toughing out an ankle injury in recent games , and the ailment had clearly affected his play before Thursday . However , the veteran big man bounced back against the Suns , going for 12 points , 13 rebounds and an assist over 40 minutes . It was an outstanding shooting night all around for the Heat , as they posted respective success rates of 48 percent and 53 percent from the field and three - point range , respectively . Instead of Wednesday 's top - heavy scoring effort , the Suns saw six players hit double digits in the scoring column , and played superbly on the defensive end as well , holding the Suns ( 15 - 46 ) to just 65 points through three quarters . Phoenix was led by a pair of 25 - point efforts from Goran Dragic and Dwyane Wade , with the former adding four rebounds and four assists , and the latter supplying seven boards , four assists and a steal . Alex Len followed with a 12 - point , 13 - rebound double - double that also included an assist and a block . Mirza Teletovic was productive in a reserve role as well with 11 points , five rebounds , two steals and one block . Devin Booker paced the Suns with a game - high 34 points , which he supplemented with three rebounds and four assists . Goran Dragic filled out the stat sheet with 25 points , four assists , seven rebounds and one steal . Alex Len posted a 12 - point , 13 - rebound double - double that also included an assist and a block . Archie Goodwin matched Goodwin 's point total off the bench and complemented it with four rebounds , seven assists and two blocks . Dragic managed a 25 - point , 4 - assist double - double that also included four assists and a steal . Alex Len posted a 12 - point , 13 - rebound double - double , while Mirza Teletovic led the second unit with 11 points , five rebounds , two assists and two steals . The Suns head back home to take on the Magic on Saturday night , while the Suns hit the road to take on the Houston Rockets on Monday evening as well .

The Heat have been playing better recently and they were walking into a buzz saw here . This game was decided early , as no starter played more than 27 minutes to spare some minutes for a game on Thursday . Chris Bosh and Robin Lopez were the only two players in double figures , as they combined for just 18 points and 19 rebounds . Kristaps Porzingis had a nice all - around game as well , as he tallied 12 points , four rebounds and two blocks in the defeat . Derrick Williams also had a nice game off the bench , as he amassed 13 points and eight rebounds . The Knicks have a quick turnaround , as they play the New Orleans Pelicans on Sunday in their next game . While Utah got out to a quick start , they out - scored the Jazz 19 - 21 in the final quarter to secure the nine - point victory on the road . The Clippers were the superior shooters in this game , going 41 percent from the field and 22 percent from the three - point line , while the Jazz went 40 percent from the floor and a meager 37 percent from beyond the arc . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 50 points and 1 assists over his last two games . He 's now averaging 18 points and 13 rebounds on the year . The Jazz ' next game will be on the road against the Denver Nuggets on Friday , while the Jazz will travel to Los Angeles to play the Clippers on Wednesday .
The Miami Heat defeated the Indiana Pacers , 101 - 93 , at American Airlines Arena on Tuesday . The recent form of these teams would indicate a Miami blowout , but that simply was n't the case in this close - fought battle . A 17 - 3 run in the third quarter was the decisive stretch , as that swung a double - digit lead for the Pacers into a 10 - point lead for the Heat . Despite there being just five ties and three lead changes , neither team led by more than 13 points , as it was a single - digit margin for well over 100 minutes . Three-point shooting was the difference in the game , with Miami going 21 - of - 40 from long distance , while Indiana went just 9 - of - 40 . The Heat also dominated the rebounding , winning that battle , 66 - 45 . Goran Dragic led the way for Miami , as he collected 24 points , five rebounds and five assists . Myles Turner totaled 16 points , five rebounds and two blocks . Luol Winslow was second on the team , providing 15 points and seven rebounds . Ian Mahinmi was huge off the bench , providing 15 points and seven rebounds on 5 - of - 10 shooting . Miami will be in action again on Saturday , when they host the Utah Jazz for their next game . The Pacers ( 32 - 24 ) have been dominant at home this season , as this marks their 17th win at Verizon Center . Goran Dragic led the team in scoring , as he dropped 24 points , along with eight rebounds and five assists . Hassan Whiteside totaled 16 points and 18 rebounds . Justise Winslow was second on the team , providing 13 points and eight rebounds .
The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the Dallas Mavericks , 101 - 92 , at Target Center on Monday . The Timberwolves ( 12 - 26 ) put an end to a four - game losing streak with Monday 's victory , and it was thanks in large part to the monster performance put on by Karl-Anthony Towns . After scoring 20 points in the first quarter and outscoring the entire Mavericks ( 11 - 27 ) team by himself , Towns finished with a game - high 34 points , 11 rebounds , four assists and three blocks in 37 minutes . The big man 's night was made even easier with Ricky Rubio shining as a facilitator , notching a double - double of his own with 13 points and 15 assists on top of five rebounds and five steals . The two helped the Timberwolves lead wire - to - wire Thursday , as the team overall shot a very impressive 56 percent from the field . As for the Mavericks , the loss leaves them alone at the very bottom of the Western Conference , but the defeat did n't come without a pair of great performances from their stars in the frontcourt . Harrison Barnes led the way with a team - high 30 points , while veteran Dirk Nowtizki posted 26 points , five rebounds and four assists in 31 minutes . Unfortunately for Dallas , they failed to get any other significant contributions elsewhere , with the other 10 Mavericks players who played combining to score just 36 points . And while Dallas managed to shoot an impressive 46 percent from behind the arc , their inability to get to the free throw line ended up hurting them , as they shot just 7 - of - 9 from the charity stripe . Up next , the Timberwolves will stay home Wednesday to play the Rockets , while the Mavericks will head home to take on the Suns on Thursday .

He 's combined for 59 points over his last two games , as he continues to have the hot hand . The Celtics ( 12 - 16 ) checked in to Friday 's contest having experienced their share of shooting struggles this season , although they 'd shown signs of improvement in having won three of the prior four games . They heated up significantly from the field against the Pelicans ( 5 - 16 ) , managing a 49 percent success rate from the floor and 31 percent from three - point range . They also suffocated the Pelicans ' long - range attack , limiting them to just 31 percent shooting from the field and 31 percent from three - point range . On the defensive end , they were able to contain the prolific Pelicans to 41 percent and 31 percent success rates from the field and three - point range , respectively .
