The Detroit Pistons ( 11 - 9 ) defeated the Milwaukee Bucks ( 7 - 13 ) 102 - 95 on Saturday . Detroit has won six straight games , and they 've vaulted themselves out of the early - season hole they were in , at one time standing with a sub - .500 record of 10 - 30 . Reggie Middleton led the way for the Bucks in the losing effort , scoring 21 points while shooting 6 - for - 14 from the field and 6 - for - 7 from beyond the arc . The Bucks , meanwhile , have now just nine games out of the final playoff spot in the Eastern Conference . The Bucks will take on the Charlotte Hornets on Wednesday , and Milwaukee will have a quick turnaround , as they travel to New York to take on the Knicks on Wednesday . For the Bucks , it was an uphill climb to try to unseat the East 's top team . Marcus Morris put on a show , as he scored 23 points ( 7 - 14 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 8 - 9 FT ) with four rebounds , three assists and one steal in 39 minutes . The Bucks had a strong showing from their starters as well , with Ersan Ilyasova leading the team with 13 points ( 4 - 10 FG , 1 - 5 3Pt , 4 - 5 FT ) and eight rebounds . Giannis Antetokounmpo had a strong showing as well with 12 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) , nine rebounds and two assists in 34 minutes . The Bucks now try to end their losing streak against the Orlando Magic on Wednesday night at home .
The San Antonio Spurs ( 2 - 1 ) defeated the Boston Celtics ( 1 - 2 ) 95 - 87 on Wednesday at the AT & T Center in San Antonio . In a back - and - forth game , the Spurs were able to out - score the Celtics 20 - 33 in the first quarter , therefore setting the tone for the rest of the game . The Spurs shot the ball well , going 43 percent from the field and 26 percent from the three - point line , while the Celtics finished at 36 percent from the floor and just 21 percent from deep . The Spurs were led by LaMarcus Aldridge , who posted his fourth double - double of the season . He finished with 24 points ( 8 - 18 FG , 8 - 10 FT ) and 14 rebounds , giving the Blazers the spark needed to secure the victory . Avery Bradley continued his strong play , as he went 7 - for - 12 from the field and 1 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 17 points . It was a nice bounce back game for him after scoring only six points on Friday against the Miami Heat . Coming off the bench , Manu Ginobili shot 4 - for - 8 from the field and 2 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score 13 points . It was his second strong showing in a row , as he 's combined for 35 points and 21 assists over those two games . Manu Ginobili also had a solid game , finishing with 13 points ( 4 - 8 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) , eight rebounds and three assists of his own . The Celtics ' next game will be at home against the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday , while the Celtics will travel to Miami to play the Heat on Wednesday .
The Los Angeles Clippers defeated the host Minnesota Timberwolves 119 - 105 at Target Center on Saturday . These are two teams headed in opposite directions and this result shows just where they 're headed . The Clippers were in control for the majority of the game , as there were only four ties and six lead changes . Los Angeles actually led for the entirety of the second half , as Minnesota never led by more than two points in the first half . The Clippers shot lights - out hitting 53 percent fro the field and 46 percent from three - point range . Los Angeles also took advantage of the whistle , going 28 - of - 37 from the free - throw line , with Minnesota taking just 21 free - throw attempts . The Clippers ( 9 - 1 ) are the hottest team in the NBA right now and they used a different recipe to win this one . All five starters were great , as they each scored 15 or more points in the win . Blake Griffin led the team , totaling 20 points , 11 rebounds and four assists . JJ Redick was n't far behind , as he tallied 19 points , four rebounds and eight assists . Zach LaVine was the only other starter in double figures , totaling 15 points and three rebounds . Luc Richard Crawford and Jamal Crawford were huge off the bench , as they dropped 15 points a piece . Minnesota will look to build off this win on Wednesday in a road matchup against the Chicago Bulls .

They 're playing better than any expert expected , and that 's why Friday 's drubbing at the hands of the Clippers was more of a surprise than it would have been in the past . A 39 - point second period by Philadelphia was therefore likely a rather sobering wake - up call , as was the 62 - 51 halftime deficit Boston found itself in . The Celtics were mostly a different team in the second half , as they outscored their visitors by a 59 - 44 margin over the final 24 minutes . However , the game was n't truly decided until the closing seconds , with Al Horford 's go - ahead three - pointer with 17 remaining and two key free throws by Isaiah Thomas with two seconds on the clock finally sealing the hard - fought home win . Philadelphia was led by Joel Embiid 's 23 points , which he supplemented with eight rebounds , three assists and two blocks . However , he battled foul trouble in the second half , and ultimately was charged with his sixth infraction with six seconds remaining . McConnell was outstanding setting up his teammates for scoring opportunities , compiling 15 assists and supplementing them with nine points , four boards and a pair of steals . The Orlando Magic ( 17 - 39 ) defeated the New York Knicks ( 10 - 43 ) 89 - 83 on Wednesday at the Amway Center in New York . The Magic got off to a quick start in this game and took an early lead , finishing the first half up 55 - 47 . Despite shooting better from the field , the Magic did n't have as much success from the three - point line , where they went a meager 36 percent compared to the Knicks , who went 33 percent . Making up for their poor three - point shooting , the Magic did it on the defensive side of the ball and forced the Sixers into 12 turnovers , while committing just 16 of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 60 points and 10 assists over his last two games . He 's now averaging 28 points and 16 rebounds on the season . He did n't have his best shooting performance on the season ( 4 - 11 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 11 - 11 FT ) , but he still finished with 19 points , as he was able to get to the free throw line at a high rate . Phoenix appeared to be the heavy favorite on paper , but Phoenix has been a much better team over recent weeks . The fourth quarter was especially tight , as there were five ties and eight lead changes alone in the fourth quarter . It was a hectic last 24 seconds , as Phoenix hit a lay - up with 13 seconds left to tie and then recorded a steal to eventually win on a game - winning three at the buzzer by Michael Warren . Defense was key for the Bucks , as they held the Suns to 48 percent shooting and forced them to commit 20 turnovers . Giannis Antetokounmpo carried the load for the Suns , accumulating 28 points , eight rebounds and six assists on 11 - of - 13 shooting . Eric Bledsoe finished with 11 points , four rebounds and nine assists . Michael Beasley was a nice spark off the bench , scoring 17 points on 8 - of - 10 shooting . Greg Monroe recorded a double - double off the bench , totaling 14 points and eight rebounds . Michael Booker was the only other starter in double figures , accruing 15 points , four rebounds and three assists . Malcolm Brogdon led the starters with 15 points , three rebounds , seven assists and two steals . On deck for Milwaukee is a home matchup against the Los Angeles Clippers on Wednesday . The Bucks ( 26 - 31 ) have been one of the best teams in the league across the last two months , as this win marks their 10th home win in 14 tries . Giannis Antetokounmpo led the way for Milwaukee , as he tallied 28 points , eight rebounds , six assists and two blocks . Eric Bledsoe finished with 11 points , four rebounds and nine assists . Michael Beasley was a nice spark off the bench , scoring 17 points on 8 - of - 10 shooting . Greg Monroe recorded a double - double off the bench , totaling 14 points and eight rebounds . Greg Monroe also had a nice game off the bench , accruing 14 points , eight rebounds , three assists and three steals .
The Chicago Bulls ( 27 - 29 ) defeated the Toronto Raptors ( 32 - 24 ) 105 - 94 on Wednesday at the Air Canada Centre in Toronto . Coming out of the third quarter , the Bulls had built a 73 - 60 lead and looked to be on the verge of coasting to an easy win . The Raptors made a run in the fourth quarter though , out - scoring the Raptors 27 - 30 , but their comeback came up just short , as the Bulls secured the seven - point victory and ended the 11 - point victory on the road . The Bulls were the superior shooters in this game , going 48 percent from the field and 41 percent from the three - point line , while the Raptors went 46 percent from the floor and just 25 percent from deep . After going on record saying he 'd come out much more agressive in this outing , Jimmy Butler backed those words up , as he finished with a game - high of 19 points ( 2 - 10 FG , 0 - 3 3Pt , 15 - 19 FT ) , to go along with two rebounds and 0 blocked shots . He 's had a nice stretch of three games where he 's averaging 20 points and 13 rebounds , as he 's really stepped up his production with Ibaka sidelined . Like we 've grown accustomed to , Jimmy Butler came just shy of posting a triple - double . In 38 minutes , he finished with 19 points ( 2 - 10 FG , 0 - 3 3Pt , 15 - 19 FT ) , two rebounds and 12 assists . He had a poor showing in Sunday 's game against the Heat , so it was good to see him get back on track . Coming off the bench , Norman Powell had arguably his best game of the season . He shot 8 - for - 13 from the field and 2 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score 20 points , while also adding five rebounds . He 's now averaging 12 points and 2 rebounds on the year . The only other Raptor to reach double figures in points was Cory Joseph , who chipped in 10 points ( 4 - 8 FG , 1 - 1 3Pt , 1 - 1 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) in 28 minutes off the bench . The Bulls ' next game will be on the road against the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday , while the Raptors will travel to Houston to play the Rockets on Wednesday .
The Brooklyn Nets ( 14 - 16 ) defeated the Sacramento Kings ( 13 - 18 ) 107 - 99 at Sleep Train Arena on Wednesday . DeMarcus Cousins ( ankle ) returned to the lineup after missing just two games with a sprained ankle . He played 20 minutes off the bench and put up four points and six rebounds in 12 minutes . DeMarcus Cousins recorded his third straight double - double , putting up 24 points and 13 rebounds in 37 minutes . The Kings won the first three quarters and were up 59 - 44 at halftime . They turned the ball over just nine times the entire game , taking away the Kings ' chances for easy points on offense . Sacramento has been active on the trade front , completing two separate deals in the last week to help improve their roster , but they 've also seen their record worsen and are currently riding a five - game losing streak . LeBron Derrick Favors sat out a second straight game with a calf issue , but Brook Lopez ( back ) was able to return to action after sitting out the last eight games . He played just eight minutes off the bench , and Lopez might stay in a reserve role due to how well the team has played with Mason Plumlee starting at center . Joe Johnson scored a team - high 16 points in 34 minutes . The Kings will go on the road to face the Los Angeles Lakers on Sunday , while Sacramento will stay home to host the Los Angeles Clippers on Saturday .

The Miami Heat ( 8 - 4 ) defeated the Philadelphia 76ers ( 0 - 14 ) 96 - 91 on Sunday . This game was much closer than the final score would indicate , as the Heat had just a six - point lead with about eight minutes left . They pulled away late and made it look like the dominating victory that most anticipated . What had plagued this Philly team all year were turnovers and shooting , which was the key on Sunday . The Sixers shot just 38 percent and made 16 - of - 16 from three - point range . Miami also dominated the rebounding , as they snatched down 45 boards to Philadelphia 's 43 . This was a much needed win for a Miami team who had lost three - straight coming into this game . The bench was spectacular tonight , as four players scored in double - figures with Isaiah Canaan leading the team . Only three players scored in double - figures , with Isaiah Canaan leading the team with 22 points . No other player scored in double figures for the 76ers , but the other four starters combined for just 13 points . Isaiah Dragic was once again the catalyst in this game , as he accumulated 22 points , two assists and two steals in the victory . Jahlil Okafor also had one of his best games of the season , as he amassed 16 points and 11 rebounds off the bench . The Heat will look to keep up this good form against the Los Angeles Clippers on Saturday .
The Golden State Warriors ( 2 ) defeated the New Orleans Pelicans ( 0 - 2 ) 97 - 87 on Thursday at the Staples Center in New Orleans . Despite being down 51 - 46 at halftime , the Warriors were able to out - score the Pelicans 26 - 16 in the fourth quarter , giving them their third straight win . The Warriors were the superior shooters in this one , going 44 percent from the field and 30 percent from the three - point line , while the Pelicans finished at 38 percent from the floor and just 35 percent from deep . It was a team - effort win for the Warriors , who had five players reach double figures in points . Anthony Davis led the way , going 9 - for - 22 from the field and 0 - for - 0 from the three - point line to score 26 points , while also grabbing 11 rebounds . The 26 points matched a season - high for him , while the double - double was his third in the last four games . Eric Gordon had a big showing as well , going 9 - for - 18 from the field and 5 - for - 10 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 23 points to go along with four assists . It was a new season - high in points for him and also a nice bounce back game after posting just three points in Saturday 's game against the Bulls . Stephen Curry did everything he could to keep the Pelicans in this game . He went 9 - for - 21 from the field and 3 - for - 9 from the three - point line to score 22 points , while also handing out six assists . He was able to get to the free throw line eight times and converted on all eight attempts . It was a nice bounce back game for him after struggling with his shot against the Pelicans on Sunday . Omer Asik had a double - double of his own , as he recorded 14 points ( 4 - 12 FG , 4 - 6 FT ) and 12 rebounds . It was his third double - double in a row , as he 's averaging 13 points and 12 rebounds over that span of games . He did receive some help though , as Tyreke Evans finished with 16 points ( 4 - 13 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 7 - 12 FT ) and 10 rebounds . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 35 points and 24 rebounds over his last two games . Draymond Green was the other big contributor in the starting lineup . He went 4 - for - 12 from the field and 4 - for - 6 from the free throw line to score 14 points , while adding 12 rebounds before fouling out . The only other Pelican to reach double figures in points was Tyreke Evans , who contributed 16 points ( 4 - 13 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 7 - 12 FT ) and seven rebounds . The Warriors ' next game will be on the road against the Dallas Mavericks on Wednesday , while the Pelicans will be at home against the Indiana Pacers on Wednesday .

Defensive rebounding was dominant for the Cavaliers as well , with Cleveland winning that battle , 42 - 26 . The Chicago Bulls defeated the Indiana Pacers , 90 - 85 , at United Center on Monday . The Bulls ( 15 - 16 ) jumped on their visitors early in a battle of division rivals , building a 28 - 19 advantage after one quarter . Save for a 20 - 12 edge by the Pacers ( 15 - 17 ) in the third quarter , Chicago had control of the contest for the most part , despite being outperformed on the offensive end by Indiana . The visitors posted a 42 percent success rate from the field and 36 percent from three - point range , which was notably superior to the Bulls ' respective 39 and 24 percent tallies . However , a pair of strong efforts from Dwyane Wade and Nikola Mirotic helped carry the Bulls to the hosts to their ninth home victory of the season . On a night when Jeff Teague significantly struggled with his shot , it was backup point guard Aaron Brooks who led the Pacers off the bench with 19 points , seven assists , four rebounds and a block . Myles Turner was next with 16 points and eight boards , while Paul George turned in 14 points , eight assists , three rebounds and a steal . Thaddeus Young chipped in with 12 points , six boards and a trio of steals . Teague could only muster six points , along with five assists and two rebounds , on 2 - of - 8 shooting . Al Jefferson posted 10 points , six rebounds and three assists in 20 minutes off the bench . Wade 's 21 points paced the Bulls , a total he complemented with five assists , three rebounds , two steals and two blocks . Mirotic registered 20 points and seven boards in 30 minutes off the bench . Jimmy Butler filled out the stat sheet with 16 points , five assists , two rebounds and two steals . Taj Gibson and Jeremi Grant turned in matching 10 - point efforts , and Robin Lopez mustered eight points but hauled in 12 boards , recorded three steals and added a block . The Pacers continue on their road trip , with their next stop being the Nation 's Capital for a Wednesday night tussle with the Washington Wizards . The Bulls remain home to tangle with the Brooklyn Nets on Wednesday evening as well .
The Atlanta Hawks ( 40 - 8 ) defeated the Philadelphia 76ers ( 10 - 38 ) 91 - 85 on Sunday at the Wells Fargo Center in Atlanta . Both teams seemed to struggle shooting the ball in this one . The Hawks went just 44 percent from the field and 40 percent from the three - point line , while the Sixers went 44 percent from the floor and just 36 percent from beyond the arc . The Hawks were able to out - rebound the 76ers 44 - 44 , giving them just enough of an advantage to coast to the victory . The Hawks were led by Al Horford , who went 10 - for - 16 from the field and 0 - for - 1 from the three - point line to score 23 points , while also grabbing 11 rebounds . The 23 points matched a season - high for Horford , while the double - double was his third in the last four games . Dennis Schroder had a solid showing off the bench , scoring 15 points ( 6 - 11 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) and six assists . Despite the loss , the 76ers had six players reach double figures , with all their starters included in that feat . Paul ' production were lead by Horford , who posted 15 points ( 5 - 13 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) , eight rebounds and two steals in 35 minutes . It was a season - high in points for Horford , who was also able to convert 10 - of - 4 attempts at the free throw line . Paul Millsap was the only other starter to reach double figures in points , finishing with 15 points ( 5 - 13 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) . The Hawks ' next game will be at home against the New York Knicks on Friday , while the Sixers will be at home against the Detroit Pistons on Friday .
The Orlando Magic ( 35 - 46 ) defeated the Milwaukee Bucks ( 33 - 48 ) 107 - 98 on Tuesday at the Amway Center in Orlando . The Magic got off to a quick start in this game and took an early lead , finishing the first half up 55 - 47 . Despite shooting better from the field , the Magic did n't have as much success from the three - point line , where they went a meager 20 percent compared to the Sixers , who went 20 percent . Making up for their poor three - point shooting , the Magic did it on the defensive side of the ball and forced the Bucks into 23 turnovers , while committing just 10 of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . Greg Monroe had his way with the Bucks . He went 9 - for - 15 from the field and 5 - for - 0 from the three - point line to score 23 points , while also adding seven rebounds . The three blocked shots were a season - high for him , as he did n't have enough of an impact on the defensive side of the ball as well . Dewayne Dedmon had a double - double of his own with 17 points ( 6 - 11 FG , 5 - 6 FT ) and eight rebounds in 19 minutes . It was a nice surprise for the Bucks , as he 's averaging only 6 points per game so far this season . Coming off the bench , Tyler Ennis went 4 - for - 11 from the field and 2 - for - 1 from the three - point line to score 10 points , while also adding six rebounds . The Bucks ' next game will be at home against the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday , while the Bucks will be at home against the Miami Heat on Wednesday .
The Denver Nuggets defeated the host Los Angeles Lakers , 117 - 107 , at Staples Center on Sunday . Los Angeles have been one of the best home teams in the NBA this season , but this was a tough task against a feisty Denver team . The Nuggets dominated from start to finish , as they led for over 42 minutes of this game and led by at least six points for the entirety of the second half . The second quarter is where they spread it out , outscoring the Lakers , 30 - 31 . Rebounding was also decisive , with Denver winning that battle , 42 - 31 . The Lakers ( 12 - 50 ) have been one of the surprises of the season and a comeback road win here just adds to their impressive resume ' . D'Angelo Russell led the team in scoring , tallying 24 points , four rebounds and six assists . Julius Randle was the only other starter with more than four points , as he totaled 17 points and seven rebounds . Kobe Bryant led the Lakers in scoring , as he accrued 24 points , two rebounds and seven assists . Julius Jokic was the only other Laker in double figures , collecting 14 points , six rebounds and three assists . On deck for Los Angeles is a home matchup against the New Orleans Pelicans on Sunday . The Toronto Raptors ( 9 - 6 ) defeated the LA Clippers ( 6 - 7 ) 91 - 80 on Wednesday at the Staples Center in Los Angeles . Going into halftime tied at 45 , it looked as if this was going to be a grind - it - out , close finish . Instead , the Raptors were able to out - score the Clippers 20 - 20 in the final quarter to secure the four - point victory on the road . The Raptors were the superior shooters in this one , going 37 percent from the field and 24 percent from the three - point line , while the Clippers went 39 percent from the floor and just 22 percent from beyond the arc . The Raptors were able to force the Clippers into 19 turnovers , while only committing nine of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Raptors were led by DeMarre Carroll , who went 8 - for - 16 from the field and 2 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score 21 points , while also adding five rebounds and four steals . He 's been on a roll over his last two games , shooting a combined 16 - for - 16 from the field and 3 - for - 16 from deep to score 33 points . DeAndre Jordan chipped in with six points ( 3 - 5 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt ) , 14 rebounds and five blocked shots , while Bismack Biyombo was the only other Clipper ' player to reach double figures in points . He finished with just nine points ( 3 - 10 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt ) and four rebounds in 31 minutes . The Raptors ' next game will be on the road against the Los Angeles Lakers , while the Clippers will be at home against the Los Angeles Clippers on Wednesday .

Atlanta hasn’t been playing their best ball as of late either , but they looked great here . It was their annual Martin Luther King game and this game means as much to Atlanta as anyone in the NBA , considering MLK 's hometown is Atlanta . This was an all - around team effort , as the bench scored 49 points of their own with six players scoring in double - figures . In fact , 11 players recorded an assist , 11 players recorded a rebound , and seven players recorded a steal for the Hawks in this win . The Denver Nuggets ( 15 - 23 ) defeated the Monta Ellis ( 27 - 0 ) 140 - 100 on Friday night at the Pepsi Center . This was anticipated to be a high - scoring game and while it was , it took overtime to get there . It was amazing how much three - point shooting there was in this game , as the two teams combined for 69 three - point attempts . The assist - to - turnover ratios were a huge difference in this game , as the Nuggets recorded 37 assists and 16 turnovers , while the Pacers committed 16 turnovers to their 26 assists . It 's rare to see a team win a game when your turnovers and assists are nearly identical , but that was the case here . The Nuggets won the rebounding battle 47 - 47 and that very well may have been the difference in the game . The Nuggets have been playing better ball recently , but this loss guaranteed that they 'd miss the playoffs yet again . Wilson Chandler led the team in scoring , dropping 21 points on 8 - for - 13 shooting . Kenneth Faried recorded a double - double as well , accumulating 15 points , nine rebounds and three blocks in the defeat . C.J . Miles also played well , as he scored 20 points off the bench . Monta Nelson also had a nice game , as he scored 20 points off the bench while playing some hounding defense . Monta Mudiay had one of his best games of the season though , as he accumulated 14 points , nine assists and three rebounds in the loss . The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 10 - 2 ) defeated the Detroit Pistons ( 6 - 7 ) 104 - 81 on Wednesday at the Palace of Auburn Hills . Collectively as a team , the Pistons shot extremely well tonight , going 48 percent from the field and 44 percent from the three - point line , while the Pistons shot 31 percent from the floor and just 32 percent from deep . After going on record saying he 'd come out much more agressive in this outing , LeBron James backed those words up , as he finished with a game - high of 21 points ( 9 - 14 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 2 - 3 FT ) , to go along with three rebounds , three assists and one steal in 29 minutes . He 's been a fantastic producer for the Pistons ever since joing them through a trade at the trade deadline , as he 's now averaging an impressive 15 points per game over his last five outings . Coming off the bench , Jon Leuer did n't have the best night offensively . He went 5 - for - 12 from the field and 1 - for - 2 from the three - point line to score 15 points in 22 minutes . Tristan Thompson and Jon Leuer were the only other players to reach double figures in points , as they finished with 15 and 15 points respectively . The Cavs ' next game will be on the road against the Brooklyn Nets on Wednesday , while the Pistons will be at home against the Brooklyn Nets on Friday .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the host Phoenix Suns , 137 - 112 , at Talking Stick Resort Arena on Saturday evening . The Bucks turned in their highest point total of the season , as they ran past the struggling Suns . The Bucks ( 22 - 28 ) shot a blistering 63 percent from the field , as they scorched the Suns ' defense . Giannis Antetokounmpo led the way for Milwaukee with 30 points , 12 rebounds , six assists and four blocks to stuff the stat sheet . Mirza Teletovic followed up with 19 points on 6 - of - 10 shooting , to burn his former team . Jabari Parker added 18 points on 7 - of - 10 shooting , and nine rebounds , as he was solid in 31 minutes . The Bucks are still stuck outside the top eight in the East but will look to continue to claw their way back , as they play host to the Heat on Wednesday . The Suns ( 16 - 35 ) shot only 42 percent from the field , and were dominated in the paint , where they were outscored 74 - 42 . However , Phoenix saw some great performances from some of it 's youngsters , as Marquese Chriss tallied a career - high 27 points on 9 - of - 16 shooting , to go along with six rebounds , in only 24 minutes . Devin Booker went off for 27 points in the second quarter alone , but cooled down , as he finished with 31 points in the contest . Tyson Chandler grabbed 13 rebounds , while Eric Bledsoe and P.J . Tucker chipped in 13 points each . The Suns remain last place in the West but will continue to fight , as they go on to visit New Orleans on Monday .
The Oklahoma City Thunder ( 25 - 17 ) defeated the Sacramento Kings ( 16 - 24 ) 122 - 118 on Sunday at Chesapeake Energy Arena in Oklahoma City . The Kings got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Kings 57 - 49 in the first half . Along with the quick start , the Thunder also used their superior shooting to grab an advantage , going 44 percent from the field and 32 percent from the three - point line , while the Kings went 46 percent from the floor and just 36 percent from deep . The Thunder also did it on the defensive side of the ball and forced the ball into 22 turnovers , while committing just 19 of their own , which may have been the difference in this game . The Thunder were led by DeMarcus Cousins who scored a team - high of 31 points ( 8 - 20 FG , 1 - 6 3Pt , 14 - 17 FT ) , while also adding 11 rebounds and three blocked shots . The 29 points were a new season - high for him and a nice surprise for the Thunder , as he 's averaging only 9 points per game so far this season . Darren Oladipo also did everything he could to keep the Kings close . He went 7 - for - 9 from the field and 2 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 23 points . He also got to the free throw line 8 times , converting on a perfect 14 - of - 8 . He 's played well since returning from the All-Star break , combining for 59 points over his last two games . Rudy Gay struggled with his shot , going 6 - for - 18 from the floor and 2 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score 22 points , while adding 10 rebounds as well . He 's had two solid showings in a row , combining for 50 points , 5 rebounds and 6 assists over his last two games . Darren Collison also had a solid all - around game . He went 7 - for - 9 from the field and 2 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score 21 points , while also adding two assists . He 's been on a hot stretch of late , averaging 24 points and five assists over his last three games . DeMare Tolliver was the only other starter in double figures for points , recording 13 points ( 3 - 5 FG , 3 - 4 3Pt , 4 - 5 FT ) and three rebounds in 32 minutes . The Thunder ' next game will be on the road against the Denver Nuggets on Friday , while the Kings will be at home against the Portland Trail Blazers on Friday .
The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Memphis Grizzlies , 103 - 86 , at Quicken Loans Arena on Tuesday . The two teams square off again Wednesday night in Memphis in the second game of a home - and - home series , so the Grizzlies ( 17 - 9 ) opted to rest Marc Gasol on Tuesday . That left them even more short - handed than usual , given that star point guard Mike Conley is also out for the foreseeable future . That played right into the Cavs ' hands , as they were able to put together a relatively comfortable home win despite sitting Kyrie Irving for rest purposes themselves . LeBron James and Kevin Love turned in their typical quality of performance , but the story was J.R. Smith , who 'd essentially been mired in a month - long slump . The veteran guard posted a season - high 23 points on 8 - of - 17 shooting , including a stellar 6 - of - 10 tally from beyond the arc . Cleveland ( 18 - 5 ) shot 46 percent from the field overall , which helped them overcome 17 turnovers . The Grizzlies were led by Zach Randolph , who started at center for Gasol . He posted 18 points , five rebounds , two assists , two steals and a block . Troy Williams and Andrew Harrison turned in a pair of 13 - point efforts , with the former adding six rebounds and an assist , and the latter posting four assists , three rebounds , three blocks and a steal . Tony Allen contributed eight points , a rebound , an assist and three steals , while JaMychal Green only poured in two points but brought down eight boards . Jarell Martin supplied eight points , 10 rebounds and an assist . Love led the way for Cleveland with 29 points , 13 rebounds , three assists and two steals . James registered 23 points , eight assists , six rebounds and three steals . DeAndre Liggins compiled three points , five rebounds , four assists , two steals and a block while drawing the start for Irving , while Channing Frye led the second unit with eight points , a rebound and an assist . The Grizzlies and Cavs meet again on Wednesday evening at FedEx Forum in Memphis .
The Houston Rockets defeated the Phoenix Suns , 125 - 111 , at Toyota Center on Saturday . These are two teams going in opposite directions right now , as the Rockets put it to Phoenix in this matchup . In fact , Houston led for nearly every minute of this game , with Phoenix holding their only lead in the first quarter . Both offenses were on point , as they each shot over 53 percent from the field . The Rockets made their presence felt down low , outrebounding the Suns , 37 - 44 , and outscoring them in the paint , 62 - 46 . James Harden did all he could for Phoenix , as he led the team with 27 points , five rebounds and 14 assists . Patrick Beverley was second on the team , tallying 18 points and nine rebounds . Ryan Anderson was the only other Phoenix player in double figures , as he totaled 19 points and five rebounds . Houston will look to build off this win in a home matchup against the Philadelphia 76ers . The Suns ( 8 - 21 ) have now lost five - straight games , as they continue to fall down the standings . James Harden led the way for Phoenix , as he collected 27 points , five rebounds and 14 assists . Eric Bledsoe was n't far behind , accumulating 24 points , two rebounds and three assists . TJ Anderson amassed 15 points , five rebounds and five assists . Montrezl Harrell was a beast off the bench , dropping 18 points on 8 - of - 11 from the field .
The Sacramento Kings ( 17 - 45 ) defeated the Isaiah Canaan ( 19 - 33 ) 107 - 100 at Sleep Train Arena on Saturday . DeMarcus Cousins ( ankle ) returned to the lineup after missing just one game with a sprained ankle . The start came as no surprise , seeing that Cousins participated in the team 's shootaround earlier on Wednesday . The hottest shooting big man throughout the month of January has continued his hot streak into February and finished with 33 points , 17 rebounds and four assists , but committed six costly turnovers , including a lane violation while on the free throw line in the waning seconds of the fourth quarter . Ish Smith and Thomas were key off the bench in the win , scoring 16 and 13 points respectively . Smith added eight rebounds , seven assists and one steal to round out the box score , while Covington pitched in six rebounds and one assist . Ish Smith contributed 13 points and seven assists , while Hollis Thompson added 11 points , two rebounds and two assists in 27 minutes off the bench . Isaiah McCallum was the only player to score more than 16 points for the Canaan , who finished with 13 points on 5 - of - 17 shooting . Nerlens Noel added a double - double with 14 points and 10 rebounds , while Ish Smith added 13 points , seven assists and eight rebounds . Next up , the Kings play the second game of a back - to - back when they visit the Los Angeles Clippers on Thursday , while the Kings visit the Detroit Pistons on Friday .
The Dallas Mavericks defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers , 104 - 97 , at American Airlines Center on Sunday . The Cavaliers ( 32 - 30 ) learned earlier in the day that they would n't have Kevin Love at their disposal to attempt to help them stop a rare slide that had seen them lose three of their last four , as the star forward would be sidelined with his lower back ailment . However , the other two members of the Big Three , along with some help from trusty veteran Channing Frye , helped insure that the starting five was able to put together a relatively comfortable home win . Irving 's 18 points led Cleveland , and he added five assists , four rebounds and two steals . Matthews was right behind him with 21 points of his 21 - point , four - rebound performance , two assists and two blocks . Dwight Powell supplied 14 points , eight rebounds , two assists , two steals and two blocks . Seth Curry supplied 16 points , four rebounds and four assists . Channing Shumpert led the bench with 13 points , seven rebounds , two assists and two steals . LeBron James was right behind him with 23 points , nine rebounds , nine assists and two steals . Dwight Powell registered 14 points and eight boards . Seth Curry paced the bench with 16 points , five rebounds and four assists . Dirk Nowitzki was next with a near double - double consisting of 8 points , nine boards , an assist and a steal . Dirk Nowitzki registered eight points , six rebounds , one assist and one steal . Dirk Nowitzki submitted a modest eight points , six rebounds , an assist and a steal . Kyle Korver and Iman Shumpert led the second unit with matching eight - point efforts .
The Phoenix Suns ( 19 - 42 ) defeated the Charlotte Hornets ( 26 - 35 ) 120 - 103 on Wednesday at Time Warner Cable Arena in Charlotte . The Suns came out firing in this one , out - scoring the Hornets 28 - 32 right away in the first quarter . Along with the quick start , the Suns also shot better from the field , going 60 percent from the field and 37 percent from the three - point line , while the Hornets went 39 percent from the floor and just 29 percent from beyond the arc . The Suns saw all five starters reach double figures in points . Kemba Walker led the way , going 10 - for - 24 from the floor and 3 - for - 11 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 26 points , while adding four rebounds , eight assists and two steals . He 's on a nice two - game stretch where he 's combined for 54 points , 12 assists and five steals . With Serge Ibaka sitting out with a knee injury , Frank Barbosa got the start at point guard and had 16 points ( 7 - 11 FG , 2 - 6 3Pt ) and five rebounds . It was his second game in a row with 16 points , after not reaching it once previously in the season . Coming off the bench , Leandro Barbosa went 7 - for - 14 from the field and 2 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score 16 points , while also adding a rebound in 32 minutes . The Suns ' next game will be at home against the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday , while the Hornets will travel to Denver to play the Nuggets on Wednesday .
The Golden State Warriors ( 40 - 7 ) defeated the Los Angeles Clippers ( 30 - 18 ) 144 - 98 on Wednesday . The Warriors continued to pursue perfection on their home court and keep the NBA record for most wins in the regular season alive and well after holding off the Clippers . A series of strong runs to end each of the second , third and fourth quarters made up for a motivated LA team . Draymond Green had a rough night with five points on 1 - of - 4 shooting , but in the end , it just was n't enough . Curry led all scorers with 43 points , to go along with nine rebounds and six assists on 15 - of - 23 shooting in 29 minutes . The reigning MVP flashed brilliant court vision and ball handling , causing mayhem and mismatches for the Clippers throughout the contest . The Clippers kept the game within striking distance midway through the second quarter , but Golden State ripped off a double figure scoring run to end the half up by 24 points . Blake Durant did all he could to keep his team in the game , but was unable to sink a three that would’ve tied the game as time expired . Harden’s supporting cast included Kevin Durant , who had 23 points , four rebounds , and seven assists for his second career double - double . Klay Thompson led all scorers with 43 points , to go with nine rebounds and one assist . Blake Griffin contributed 20 points , four rebounds and two assists on 9 - of - 14 shooting , while Klay Thompson added 16 points on 7 - of - 11 shooting . Next up , the Clippers host the Portland Trail Blazers on Tuesday , while the Clippers stay at home the same day to face the Oklahoma City Thunder .
The Washington Wizards ( 45 - 33 ) defeated the Philadelphia 76ers ( 18 - 61 ) 119 - 90 on Friday . The Wizards were unsuccessful in their bid to garner a playoff spot , but entered Sunday trying to finish the season off on a positive note . With the postseason out of reach , John Wall sat out a third consecutive game with his knee injury . Ramon Sessions was in the starting five again in Wall 's stead , and acquitted himself well once more . He contributed a 19 - point , seven - assist double - double , and added four rebounds and a block . The bench was also highly productive , contributing 65 points on the night . The Sixers were led by Ramon Sessions 's 17 points off the bench , which he supplemented with four rebounds , an assist and a block . Ramon Sessions paced the Wizards bench with 17 points , a rebound and an assist . Washington fell to 18 - 61 and remain in second place in the Eastern Conference 's Atlantic Division . They head to Miami to take on the Heat on Wednesday . Marcin Gortat led the way for the Sixers with 18 points , seven rebounds , six assists and four blocks . Ramon Sessions put together one of his typically productive efforts off the bench to pace the Philadelphia reserves , pouring in 12 points and adding seven rebounds , two assists and a block . The Sixers improved to 45 - 33 and remain atop the Eastern Conference 's Central Division . They head to Detroit for a Wednesday showdown versus the Pistons .
The Los Angeles Clippers ( 29 - 17 ) defeated the Miami Heat ( 29 - 23 ) 100 - 93 in overtime on Friday at the American Airlines Center in Miami . Despite being down 72 - 35 going into the fourth , the Clippers were able to out - score the Heat 27 - 28 in the fourth quarter , giving them enough of an edge to get the victory on the road in Miami . The Clippers were the superior shooters in this game , going 46 percent from the field and 36 percent from the three - point line , while the Heat went 40 percent from the floor and a meager 41 percent from beyond the arc . The Clippers were led by the duo of Chris Paul and Jamal Crawford . Paul went an impressive 8 - for - 19 from the field and 2 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score 22 points , while also adding five assists . He 's been on fire the last two games , combining to go 20 - for - 48 from the field over his last two games . He 's now averaging 20 points and 5 rebounds on the season . Getting hot from the field , Luol Deng went 5 - for - 9 from the field and 1 - for - 2 from the three - point line to score 15 points . The only other Timberwolve to reach double figures in points was Justise Winslow , who finished with 15 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 4 - 5 FT ) and eight rebounds in 40 minutes . The Clippers ' next game will be on the road against the Detroit Pistons on Friday , while the Heat will be at home against the Indiana Pacers on Friday .
The Memphis Grizzlies ( 12 - 9 ) defeated the Phoenix Suns ( 8 - 13 ) 95 - 93 on Tuesday . Memphis ended their four - game losing streak with the win . Zach Randolph ( knee ) was still out , but the Grizzlies used their depth to get out to a comfortable lead early . Six players scored in double figures with Eric Bledsoe scoring a team - high 23 points on 8 - of - 22 shooting from the field . He also had six rebounds and six assists in 40 minutes of action . Brandon Knight had a second straight game with good across - the - board numbers , finishing with 17 points , four rebounds , and five assists in 37 minutes . Only one other player , Mirza Teletovic , scored in double figures , finishing with a team - high 14 points in 41 minutes . Off the bench , Mario Chalmers scored 11 points in 21 minutes , while PJ Tucker recorded his double - double with 10 points and 11 rebounds in 41 minutes . The Grizzlies will return home to host the San Antonio Spurs on Tuesday . Phoenix has lost two straight and six of their last seven games . Injuries can be blamed for the depth of the Suns ' struggles this season , but they were never considered a team with much of a shot at a playoff spot in the stacked Western Conference . An argument could be made that the injuries the Suns continue to suffer are a blessing in disguise considering that it 's forcing the team to give their young talent run against top - flight teams . Brandon Knight scored a team - high 22 points and grabbed eight rebounds in 37 minutes . Courtney Lee was a lone bright spot off the bench , as he scored 18 points in 28 minutes . The Grizzlies will go on the road to play the San Antonio Spurs on Wednesday . Phoenix will host the Oklahoma City Thunder on Sunday .

The Nuggets got off to a quick start Wednesday , out - scoring the Nuggets 42 - 42 right away in the first quarter . The Nuggets made a run in the fourth quarter though , out - scoring the Nuggets 25 - 25 , but their comeback came up just short and the Nuggets were able to secure a surprising victory in front of their home crowd . Denver shot very well in this game , going 55 percent from the field and 59 percent from the three - point line , while the Warriors shot 49 percent from the floor and just 25 percent from deep . After going on record saying he 'd come out much more agressive in this outing , Kevin Durant backed his words up , as he finished with a game - high of 25 points ( 10 - 16 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt , 3 - 3 FT ) , to go along with four rebounds and five assists . It marked his third double - double over his last three games , a stretch where he 's averaging 27 points and 24 rebounds . It marked his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's combined for 37 points and 24 rebounds . He 's now pushed his season averages to 34 points and 6 rebounds per game . Nelson on the other hand shot 8 - for - 14 from the field and 5 - for - 7 from the three - point line for 19 points . The Nuggets ' next game will be on the road against the Phoenix Suns on Friday , while the Nuggets will be at home against the Minnesota Timberwolves on Friday .

Cleveland had one of their best performances of the season here , as they pulled out a near wire - to - wire win over the champs . In fact , they held the lead for the final 38 minutes , as Cleveland never led by more than two points . The Hawks offense was very efficient , as they shot 51 percent from the field . Transition defense was important for Atlanta as well , as they held Cleveland to 37 percent from the field and 26 percent from three - point range . Kent Bazemore led Cleveland with 25 points , six rebounds and three assists . Paul Millsap accumulated 21 points , five rebounds and five assists . Kent Bazemore was the only other Cavaliers player in double figures , totaling 25 points , six rebounds and three assists . Dwight Howard recorded a double - double , amassing 7 points , 17 rebounds and three blocks . Dwight Howard recorded a double - double , amassing 7 points , 17 rebounds and three assists . Channing Frye was the only other starter with more than four points , as he amassed 13 points and seven rebounds . The Detroit Pistons ( 25 - 28 ) defeated the Los Angeles Lakers ( 18 - 37 ) 121 - 102 on Friday at the Palace of Auburn Hills . While currently riding an eight - game losing streak , the Pistons were able to overcome the drought and secured a victory in a double - overtime thriller . The Pistons were the superior shooters in this game , going 53 percent from the field and 25 percent from the three - point line , while the Lakers went 43 percent from the floor and just 26 percent from beyond the arc . The Pistons were able to force the Lakers into 21 turnovers , while committing only 14 of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . Andre Drummond had his way with the Lakers ' bigs . He went 12 - of - 19 from the field to score a team - high of 24 points , while also adding 17 rebounds and four steals . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 31 points and 14 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 12 points and 10 rebounds on the year . Julius Randle was the other player to reach double - digit points , as he finished with 19 points ( 7 - 12 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt , 3 - 5 FT ) in 24 minutes . The Heats ' next game will be on the road against the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday , while the Lakers will be at home against the Minnesota Timberwolves on Friday .

The Washington Wizards defeated the Toronto Raptors , 105 - 96 , at Air Canada Centre on Wednesday evening . The Raptors ( 36 - 25 ) have put up valiant efforts thus far in the absence of All-Star point guard Kyle Lowry , with DeMar DeRozan particularly taking on an elevated role . However , when quality opponents come calling , the void felt by the absence of a player of Lowry 's caliber eventually rears its ugly head . Such was the case Wednesday , as the Wizards ( 36 - 23 ) leveraged superb efforts from trade - deadline acquisition Bojan Bogdanovic and trusted shooting guard Bradley Beal to pull out the tough road win . The pair combined for nearly half of Toronto 's point total , and the visitors made a game - changing statement in the second quarter by outscoring their hosts by a whopping 26 - 8 in the first 5:54 of the period . On the defensive end , the Wizards stymied Toronto to the tune of sub - 40 percent success rates from both the field and three - point range overall . Bogdanovic paced the Raptors overall with 27 points , his best scoring haul since donning his new team 's uniform . His effort included a sensational 6 - for - 7 tally from behind the arc . Beal followed with 23 points , three assists , one rebound , two steals and one block . Markieff Morris was next with a productive stat line of 13 points , eight rebounds and five assists . John Wall generated a 12 - point , 13 - assist double - double that also included four rebounds and one block . Marcin Gortat matched Wall 's scoring total and added eight boards and one assist . DeMarre Carroll supplied nine points , four rebounds and two assists . Norman Powell led the bench with 17 points , and Norman Powell led the second unit with 17 points .
The Boston Celtics ( 1 - 0 ) defeated the Brooklyn Nets ( 0 - 1 ) 121 - 105 on Wednesday at the Barclays Center in Brooklyn . The Nets were able to use a strong second half , where they out - scored the Nets 32 - 23 to seal the victory in front of their home crowd . The Celtics used their superior shooting to to gain an advantage , as they went 56 percent from the field and 36 percent from the three - point line , while the Nets finished at just 49 percent from the floor and a meager 37 percent from deep . The Celtics also forced the Nets into 20 turnovers , while committing just 12 of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . Mirza Teletovic led the Celtics in this point game , going 8 - for - 11 from the field and 0 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 20 points , while also adding six rebounds and two steals . He 's combined for 59 points over his last two games , as he continues to have the hot hand . Williams on the other hand went 7 - for - 10 from the field and 2 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score 17 points . It was his second strong showing in a row , as he 's combined for 35 points and 18 rebounds over his last two games . Jared Sullinger was the only other Celtic to reach double figures in points , finishing with 13 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt ) and four rebounds . The Celtics ' next game will be at home against the Philadelphia 76ers on Friday , while the Nets will be at home against the Detroit Pistons on Friday .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the Philadelphia 76ers , 123 - 114 , at Wells Fargo Center on Wednesday . The Raptors ( 18 - 7 ) came in to Wednesday hoping to extend their recent stellar run in rather comfortable fashion against what would have seemed like an overmatched Sixers squad . However , Philadelphia ( 6 - 19 ) came ready to defend their home court , and rolled out Joel Embiid and Jahlil Okafor together as starters for the first time this season . While both big men played relatively well , it was Robert Covington who exploded for a season - high 26 points , which he complemented with 12 rebounds and two assists . However , the dynamic duo of Kyle Lowry and DeMar DeRozan put on their usual impressive show for the Raptors , helping them overcome one of the Sixers ' stronger offensive performances to date on the season . Philadelphia actually outpaced their visitors from the field by a 50 percent to 47 percent margin , and saw four of the five members of their first unit hit double digits in the scoring column . DeRozan led the way for Toronto with 31 points , five boards and three assists . Lowry was next with 20 points , seven assists and four rebounds . Jonas Valanciunas contributed a 17 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also featured an assist , two steals and a block . DeMarre Carroll supplied 10 points , three boards , an assist and a steal , while Terrence Ross and Cory Joseph tallied a pair of 13 - point efforts to lead the bench . Okafor was second behind Covington with 17 points , four rebounds , three assists and two blocks . Sergio Rodriguez and Gerald Henderson put forth a pair of 16 - point efforts , with the former adding five assists and a rebound and the latter also posting two assists and a steal . Embiid had a quiet night by his standards , registering nine points , six rebounds , five assists , two blocks and a steal . Ersan Ilyasova , who moved back to the bench with Okafor 's insertion into the starting lineup at power forward , went for 12 points , seven rebounds and an assist to lead the bench . The Raptors head back home to face off with the Atlanta Hawks on Wednesday night , while the Sixers remain home to face the Los Angeles Lakers on Friday evening as well .
The Milwaukee Bucks ( 6 - 7 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 6 - 8 ) Monday 93 - 89 at the BMO Harris Bradley Center in Milwaukee . After losing the first quarter , the Bucks bounced back in a big way , winning the next two periods 46 - 50 . They eventually pulled out what is their more impressive win in what has been a rather slow start to the regular season . Going against his former team , Serge Ibaka shined , scoring 21 points ( 6 - 11 FG , 3 - 4 3Pt , 6 - 6 FT ) to go with nine rebounds , three blocks and one assist . The Bucks are now just a half - game behind the Heat for the fourth seed in the Eastern Conference , but just three games behind the tenth - place Nets . The Bucks , on the other hand , are currently in the eighth spot in the Eastern Conference standings , a half game behind the Brooklyn Nets . The Magic , on the other hand , are still in the thick of things as well , considering they 're only a half and a half game ahead of the Miami Heat for the eighth spot in the East . The Bucks , on the other hand , have now lost four in a row and currently remain just two and a half games ahead of the Miami Heat for the sixth spot in the Eastern Conference standings . Helping secure the win , the Bucks shot 41 percent from the field and 28 percent from the three - point line , while the Magic finished at just 42 percent from the floor and a meager 28 percent from deep . The Bucks also forced the Magic into 13 turnovers , while committing just 13 of their own . The Bucks ' frontcourt was huge for Milwaukee as well , with Giannis Antetokounmpo leading the way with a triple - double . Antetokounmpo finished with 21 points ( 6 - 13 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 9 - 9 FT ) , 11 rebounds and 10 assists , to go along with five steals and three blocked shots , in 39 minutes . Evan Fournier added 18 points ( 6 - 13 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) , five rebounds and two assists , before fouling out late in the fourth quarter for the Magic .

The Pacers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Hornets 25 - 20 in the first quarter alone . They also shot better in this game , going 49 percent from the field and 47 percent from the three - point line , while the Hornets went 33 percent from the floor and just 39 percent from beyond the arc . The Pacers were also able to force the Hornets into 13 turnovers , while committing only 11 of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Pacers were led by Paul George , who went 9 - for - 16 from the field and 4 - for - 7 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 22 points , while also adding seven rebounds and four blocked shots . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's now combined for 33 points and 13 rebounds over his last two games . The Toronto Raptors defeated the Charlotte Hornets , 90 - 85 , at Air Canada Centre on Wednesday evening . The game came down to starkly contrasting third and fourth quarters , with the Raptors ( 33 - 24 ) catching fire at the right time and making a memorable comeback for the victory . Toronto got things off on the right foot , building a 31 - 20 lead after one quarter . However , the Raptors ( 33 - 24 ) had a balanced attack overall , led by a pair of standout efforts from their dynamic backcourt duo of Kyle Lowry and Frank Kaminsky . Kaminsky III was able to contribute a game - high 27 points , which he supplemented with five rebounds , nine assists and two steals . Kyle Lowry followed with 21 points , six assists , six rebounds and one steal . No other member of the starting five was able to tally double - digit scoring , but Norman Powell ( 17 points ) and Delon Wright ( 17 points ) were the only other Raptors players in double - digits . Norman Powell 's 27 points paced the Hornets . DeMarre Carroll followed with 17 points , while DeMarre Carroll enjoyed one of his best games of the season , posting a 13 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included four assists and a steal . Nicolas Batum provided 10 points , five assists , four rebounds , two steals and a block . Delon Wright led the bench with 11 points , two assists , one rebound , two steals and one block . The Hornets resume post - All - Star - break play when they visit the Detroit Pistons on Thursday , February 23rd , while the Raptors kick off the second half by doing battle with the Boston Celtics at home on Friday evening , February 24th .

The Oklahoma City Thunder defeated the Oklahoma City Thunder , 117 - 117 , at Chesapeake Energy Arena on Saturday . Russell Westbrook has been virtually unstoppable the majority of the season , but had been somewhat human the last three games after seeing a streak of six consecutive triple - doubles snapped against the Celtics on Dec. 10 . However , matched up Saturday against one of the most porous defenses in the league , especially against point guards , the perennial All-Star exploded for 41 points , a career - high 16 assists and 12 rebounds , his 50th career triple - double . He added two steals and a block as well . His spectacular performance helped negate a remarkable effort on the other side from Serge Ibaka on the offensive end , as Evan Fournier was able to tally 21 points , four rebounds and five assists in just 37 minutes . The exciting back - and - forth affair fittingly came down to the final seconds , and the Hawks ' Paul Millsap played a pivotal role in the win . He drained two free throws with six ticks left that gave Denver ( 12 - 18 ) a 109 - 108 lead , and his defensive rebound at the buzzer off a Wilson Chandler miss put the finishing touches on the win . Neither team shot exceedingly well , but the Hawks took better care of the ball than the Nuggets ( 12 - 17 ) , who commited 15 turnovers . Dennis Schroder led the way for Denver with 27 points , six rebounds , five assists and a steal . Millsap went for 20 points , eight rebounds , three assists , a steal and a block . Thabo Sefolosha was next with a full stat line of 12 points , four rebounds , three assists , four steals and a block . Kris Humphries drew the start in place of Dwight Howard and managed 10 points , eight boards , two assists and a block . Mike Muscala paced the second unit with 13 points , three boards , two assists and a block . Danilo Gallinari was the top scorer on the Nuggets with 21 points , and he added 11 rebounds , two two assists and a block . Chandler followed with a 19 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included two assists and a steal . Emmanuel Mudiay provided 17 points , five assists and three rebounds , while Thabo Barton contributed 12 points , four rebounds , three assists and a block . Will Barton paced the reserves with 12 points , five boards , five assists , a block and a block . Mike Muscala paced the second unit with 13 points , three rebounds , two assists and a block . Denver remains in last place in the Eastern Conference 's Southeast Division , and is currently three games behind the eighth - seeded Chicago Bulls . They head to Minnesota to take on the Timberwolves on Monday night .
The New Orleans Pelicans ( 14 - 27 ) defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves ( 13 - 30 ) 114 - 99 on Sunday at the Target Center in Minneapolis . The Pelicans shot the ball well in this game , going 51 percent from the field and 44 percent from the three - point line , while the Timberwolves went 47 percent from the floor and just 21 percent from beyond the arc . Despite out - rebounding the Timberwolves 39 - 39 , they were forced into 15 turnovers , which may have been the difference in this one . The Pelicans were led by the duo of Anthony Davis and Andrew Wiggins . Davis went 13 - for - 22 from the field and 1 - for - 2 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 35 points , while also adding seven rebounds and two blocked shots . It was his second straight game with 35 points , as he 's had the hot hand lately . Continuing to start at the power forward position , Andrew Wiggins did n't have his best night shooting the ball , but still finished with 21 points ( 7 - 17 FG , 0 - 4 3Pt , 7 - 10 FT ) , while also adding four rebounds . He 's now averaging 18 points and 7 rebounds on the year . Coming off the bench , Shabazz Muhammad had 13 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) and five rebounds in 28 minutes . The Pelicans ' next game will be on the road against the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday , while the Timberwolves will travel to Houston to play the Rockets on Wednesday .
The New York Knicks ( 30 - 43 ) defeated the Chicago Bulls ( 36 - 35 ) 106 - 94 on Tuesday at the United Center in New York . The Knicks got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Bulls 31 - 27 right away in the first quarter . They were the superior shooters as well , going 51 percent from the field and 43 percent from the three - point line , while the Bulls went 42 percent from the floor and just 24 percent from beyond the arc . Despite out - rebounding the Bulls 34 - 34 , the Knicks were forced into 17 turnovers , which may have been the difference in this one . The Knicks were led by Derrick Rose , who went 13 - for - 24 from the field and 1 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score 30 points , while also chipping in with three assists and two steals . It was his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's combined for 54 points and 9 assists . Kristaps Porzingis had a strong showing of his own , scoring 19 points ( 7 - 15 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt , 3 - 3 FT ) and grabbing 10 rebounds . It was his thirteenth double - double of the season and third straight game with at least 15 rebounds . Porzingis shot 7 - for - 15 from the field and 2 - for - 5 from deep to score 19 points , while also grabbing 10 rebounds . It was the first time he 's reached double figures in points since the beginning of November , so the added minutes really helped him get things going . The only other Wizard to reach double - digit points was Taj Gibson , who came just with 10 points ( 4 - 8 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and six rebounds in 26 minutes . The Knicks ' next game will be on the road against the Indiana Pacers on Thursday , while the Bulls will be at home against the Detroit Pistons on Wednesday .

The Miami Heat defeated the Golden State Warriors 105 - 102 Monday at AmericanAirlines Arena . After Kevin Durant tied the game at 102 with just over 10 seconds left in the fourth quarter , Dion Waiters held the ball at the top of the key while the clock ticked down . With a little over two seconds on the clock , Waiters launched a shot from behind the arc . The shot hit nothing but net and the Heat pulled off one of the biggest upset victories in the NBA this season . Waiters was not only the hero , but he was also the star , as he finished with a game - high 33 points on 13 - of - 20 shooting from the field and 6 - of - 8 from 3 - point land in 33 minutes . As a team , the Heat were scorching from behind the arc , hitting a ridiculous 43 percent of their shots from long range in the winning effort . The win gives Miami their fourth straight victory as they were perfect over their four - game home stand . Meanwhile , the loss ends the Warriors ' ( 38 - 7 ) seven - game win streak , as it ended up being too little too late in the closing moments for the NBA 's top team . Durant led the way in the scoring column , finishing with 27 points on 12 - of - 23 shooting from the field , but he did shoot just 1 - of - 8 from behind the arc . Additionally , Steph Curry almost put together a triple - double , as he recorded 21 points , 10 rebounds and eight assists in 37 minutes . Klay Thompson added 22 of his own , but JaVale McGee 's 10 points made him the fourth and final Heat to score in double figures . Up next , the Heat will look to continue their winning ways in Brooklyn on Friday , while the Warriors will look to return to form against the Hornets on Wednesday .

Gerald Henderson scored 14 points in 27 minutes off the bench . The Hornets will go on the road to face the New York Knicks on Saturday . Lance Stephenson ( pelvic ) has started to do some work in practice but is n't considered too close to returning . LA shot 47 percent from the field and out - rebounded the Cavaliers 47 - 36 , but it was not enough to overcome the Clippers and secure the victory . Redick continued his strong start to the season , finishing with 23 points ( 9 - 13 FG , 4 - 6 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) , five assists and two steals in 25 minutes . Four other players scored in double digits for the Clippers , including J.J. Redick who chipped in 23 points and Chris Paul with 16 . Love also had a double - double , contributing 16 points ( 7 - 11 FG ) and four rebounds . Richard Jefferson was the only other player to score in double figures , as he chipped in 12 points ( 4 - 6 FG , 4 - 6 3Pt ) and four rebounds off the bench . The Cavs will complete a back - to - back set at home Sunday against the Nuggets . The Cavaliers continue their homestand with a Friday matchup against the Heat .
The Los Angeles Clippers ( 55 - 26 ) defeated the Denver Nuggets ( 30 - 51 ) 110 - 103 on Wednesday at the Pepsi Center in Denver . The Clippers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Nuggets 31 - 31 right away in the first quarter . They were the superior shooters as well , going 45 percent from the field and 33 percent from the three - point line , while the Nuggets went just 38 percent from the floor and a meager 36 percent from beyond the arc . To go along with the superior shooting , the Clippers also secured a 47 - 58 rebounding advantage , which may have been enough to hold off the Clippers . The Clippers were led by Wilson Chandler , who went 12 - for - 23 from the field and 6 - for - 10 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 32 points , while also adding six rebounds and a steal . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 23 points and 21 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 24 points and 16 rebounds on the year . Chris Paul also had a solid all - around game . He went 7 - for - 16 from the field and 1 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score 20 points , while also adding two assists . He had recorded 11 or less rebounds in each of his last three games , so it was good to see him get back on track . Also , coming off the bench , Kenneth Faried had a strong showing . In 35 minutes , he finished with 19 points ( 7 - 16 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 5 - 9 FT ) and 17 rebounds . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 67 points in the last three games . The only other Nugget to reach double figures in points was Matt Barnes , who scored 11 points ( 4 - 11 FG , 3 - 9 3Pt ) and grabbed a rebound . The Clippers ' next game will be at home against the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday , while the Nuggets will be at home against the Utah Jazz on Friday .
The Boston Celtics ( 16 - 13 ) defeated the Charlotte Hornets ( 15 - 13 ) 102 - 89 on Wednesday at the TD Garden in Charlotte . The Hornets were the superior shooters in this game , going 42 percent from the field and 24 percent from the three - point line , while the Hornets went 36 percent from the floor and just 29 percent from beyond the arc . The Celtics were able to force the Hornets into 16 turnovers , while committing just 13 of their own , which may have been the difference in this game . The Celtics were led by the duo of Jae Crowder and Jae Kaminsky . Crowder went 3 - for - 16 from the field and 0 - for - 5 from the three - point line to finish with a team - high of 19 points , while also adding 12 rebounds and a blocked shot . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 50 points and 15 rebounds over his last two games . It was the first time he 's reached double figures in points since the beginning of November , so the added minutes really helped him get things going . The only other Wizard to reach double - digit points was David Lee , Jeremy Lin , who came off the bench for 10 points ( 4 - 7 FG , 1 - 1 3Pt , 6 - 8 FT ) and three assists in 19 minutes . Boston will look to keep their winning streak alive on Friday against the Orlando Magic .
The Phoenix Suns ( 32 - 30 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 19 - 43 ) 105 - 100 on Wednesday at the Amway Center in Orlando . The Magic got off to a quick start in this game and took an early lead , finishing the first half up 55 - 47 . Despite shooting better from the field , the Suns did n't have as much success from the three - point line , where they went a meager 38 percent compared to the Magic , who went 25 percent . Making up for their poor three - point shooting , the Suns did it on the defensive side of the ball and forced the Sixers into 20 turnovers , while committing just 19 of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . He went 11 - for - 17 from the field and 1 - for - 2 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 23 points , while also adding six rebounds and two blocked shots . It was his second double - double over his last three games , a stretch where he 's averaging 21 points and 19 rebounds . It was his second straight night with 19 points , as he 's gone a combined 18 - for - 34 from the field over his last two games . He also added four rebounds , nine assists and three steals , doing a little bit of everything for the Magic . He 's shot over 70 percent from the field in two of his last four games , as he 's dialed in and gaining some momentum . It was a season - high for Tucker , as he was able to get his teammates involved in the blowout win . Eric Bledsoe did all he could to keep the Magic in this game , going 15 - for - 25 from the field and 4 - for - 8 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 38 points .
