The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Denver Nuggets , 125 - 109 , at Quicken Loans Arena on Thursday . The Cleveland-Golden State matchup is always one of the showcase games of the year and that ended up being the case in this Christmas Day classic . Despite Denver leading for well over 40 minutes of this game , it was close throughout the first three quarters . In fact , there were eight ties and 4 lead changes , as the Cavs led by double - digits for the entirety of the second half . Defense was key , as they held Denver to 40 percent from the field and 50 percent from three - point range , while the Nuggets went just 40 percent from the field and 32 percent from three - point range . Cleveland also dominated down low , as they won the rebounding battle 49 - 45 and the points in the paint differential 56 - 45 . The Nuggets ( 37 - 30 ) have now won three - straight games , as they continue to show how dangerous they can be . Kyrie Irving was the player of the game , as he tallied 27 points , four rebounds and five assists on 10 - of - 24 shooting . Kevin Love was n't far behind , as he accumulated 27 points , 13 rebounds and four assists . Kevin Love was the only other starter in double figures , as he totaled 16 points and nine rebounds . Jamal Murray led the bench with 16 points and three steals . Denver will be in action again on Monday in a road matchup against the Toronto Raptors . Cleveland ( 37 - 16 ) have really struggled on the offensive end this season , but they had one of their best games here against a stifling Nuggets defense . Nikola Jokic had one of the best games of his career , as he led the Cavaliers with 27 points , 13 rebounds and four assists on 9 - of - 18 shooting . Kyle Korver was second on the team , as he accrued 14 points and five rebounds off the bench . Tristan Thompson also had a nice game off the bench , as he totaled 13 points and 13 rebounds in just 13 minutes of action . Cleveland 's next game is on Saturday , when they take on the Charlotte Hornets on the road .
The Chicago Bulls defeated the visiting Brooklyn Nets , 118 - 88 , at United Center on Saturday evening . The Nets led after one quarter but the Bulls surged back to make it a four - point game by halftime . Chicago came out strong in the second half , taking the lead three minutes into the third quarter . The game remained close until the final three minutes , where the Bulls closed the game on a 19 - 5 run . After losing two straight , Chicago ( 32 - 0 ) got a much - needed win , as Jimmy Butler led the way 22 points , nine assists and six rebounds , in 27 minutes . Bojan Bogdanovic added 15 points on 5 - of - 11 shooting , in 21 minutes off the bench , while the only other player to score in double digits for Brooklyn was Sean Kilpatrick , who finished with 12 points . The Nets shot a blistering 51 percent from the field , including 41 percent from long range , while assisting on 26 - of - 3 field goals from their free throw line . Jimmy Butler was the high - point man for Brooklyn , with 22 points , to go along with six rebounds and two assists , in 27 minutes . Nikola Mirotic added 16 points on 6 - of - 14 shooting , including 4 - of - 10 from long range , to go along with 11 rebounds , three blocks and three assists , in 25 minutes . The only other player to score in double digits for the Bulls was Taj Kilpatrick , who finished with 13 points and 2 - of - 13 shooting , in 25 minutes off the bench . Isaiah Butler led Brooklyn in scoring , with 22 points on 6 - of - 10 shooting , in 27 minutes . Nikola Mirotic came up big off the bench , with 14 points , 11 rebounds and one steal , in 25 minutes .
The Washington Wizards defeated the New Orleans Pelicans , 107 - 94 , at Smoothie King Center on Tuesday . The Wizards ( 27 - 20 ) learned earlier in the day that Anthony Davis would miss the contest with the hip injury that he suffered after a flagrant foul by the Knicks ' Kyle O'Quinn on Monday . However , that did n't deter them from notching their sixth road victory of the season on the strength of standout efforts from Davis ' replacement Anthony Davis and Anthony Morris . Davis was right behind him with a season - high 36 points , which he supplemented with 17 rebounds , three assists , three steals and two blocks . He made a driving layup with three seconds remaining in regulation to send the game into overtime , and then made another in the extra period to help the Wizards come back from a 111 - 106 deficit with 2:30 remaining . Bradley Beal followed Davis with 21 points , which he supplemented with eight rebounds , two assists and one steal . John Wall supplied a 18 - point , 19 - assist double - double that also included four rebounds , three steals and one block . Markieff Morris collected 21 points , eight rebounds and one assist . Marcin Gortat contributed a 17 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included two assists and one steal . Donatas Motiejunas was productive in a reserve role as well with 10 points and four rebounds . Davis led the way with a game - high 36 points , along with 17 rebounds , three assists , two steals and two blocks . Gortat was next with a 17 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included two assists and a steal . Otto Porter , Jr. provided a 13 - point , 6 - rebound double - double that also included two assists and four blocks . Donatas Motiejunas was productive in his own right , supplying 10 points , four rebounds and two assists . The Pelicans head back home to face the Phoenix Suns on Monday evening , while the Wizards remain home to tangle with the Cleveland Cavaliers on Monday night .
The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 3 - 0 ) defeated the Boston Celtics ( 0 - 3 ) 103 - 95 on Wednesday at the TD Garden in Boston . The Celtics built a strong lead early in this game , out - scoring the Celtics 31 - 25 in the first quarter alone . Along with the quick start , the Cavaliers were also the superior shooters . They finished at 45 percent from the field and 41 percent from the three - point line , while the Celtics went 44 percent from the floor and just 26 percent from deep . After going on record saying he 'd come out much more agressive in this outing , LeBron James backed those words up , as he finished with a game - high of 31 points ( 13 - 26 FG , 1 - 5 3Pt , 4 - 5 3Pt , 4 - 5 FT ) , to go along with 11 rebounds , four assists and two steals . James did n't even hit a three - pointer , but he was still able to get to the hoop and score as he pleased . It was clear he planned on taking over from the start and if he can continue to have this type of impact , the Cavaliers should be very tough defeat , even without Kevin Love . Kyrie Irving had a relatively quiet night . He went 7 - for - 15 from the field and 1 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score 18 points , while also adding six assists . He 's now averaging 15 points and 5 rebounds on the year . Jae Crowder was able to record a double - double of his own with 16 points ( 5 - 6 FG , 4 - 5 FT ) and seven rebounds . The Celtics ' next game will be at home against the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday , while the Celtics will travel to Brooklyn to play the Nets on Friday .
The Sacramento Kings ( 10 - 16 ) defeated the Memphis Grizzlies ( 18 - 10 ) 96 - 92 on Sunday at Fed Ex Forum Arena in Sacramento . The Kings got out to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Grizzlies 24 - 19 right away in the first quarter . Along with the quick start , the Kings also secured the Grizzlies advantage , going 39 percent from the field and 29 percent from the three - point line , while the Grizzlies went 38 percent from the floor and 20 percent from deep . The Kings also forced the Grizzlies into 13 turnovers , while committing just 11 of their own . DeMarcus Cousins led the charge , going 6 - for - 18 from the field and 8 - for - 8 from the free throw line to score 20 points , while also adding five rebounds and a blocked shot . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 35 points and 28 rebounds over his last two games . Kosta Koufos was also a big factor in the win , posting a season - high of 16 points ( 7 - 11 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 2 - 6 FT ) , while also adding 13 rebounds and three blocked shots in 30 minutes . It marked his second double - double over his last three games , a stretch where he 's averaging 18 points and 11 rebounds . Coming off the bench , Garrett Temple added 13 points ( 4 - 13 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and six assists . The Kings ' next game will be at home against the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday , while the Grizzlies will travel to Los Angeles to play the Clippers on Wednesday .
The Chicago Bulls ( 31 - 30 ) defeated the Golden State Warriors ( 50 - 11 ) 94 - 87 on Sunday at the United Center in Chicago . The Bulls got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Warriors 19 - 26 in the first quarter alone . They also shot better in this game , going 44 percent from the field and 26 percent from the three - point line , while the Warriors went 39 percent from the floor and 20 percent from beyond the arc . The Bulls were led by the duo of Stephen Curry and Stephen Curry . Curry went 10 - for - 27 from the field and 2 - for - 11 from the three - point line to score 23 points , while also adding five assists . The only other Rocket to reach double figures was Klay Thompson , who finished with 13 points ( 5 - 22 FG , 1 - 11 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and one rebound in 29 minutes . Coming off the bench , Bobby Portis chipped in with 17 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) and 13 rebounds as well . Jimmy Curry did everything he could to keep the Warriors in this game , going 10 - for - 27 from the field and 0 - for - 11 from the two - point line to score 23 points . He also had five rebounds and six assists , coming just shy of recording his first triple - double of the year . His double - double marked his first double - double since January sixteenth . The Bulls ' next game will be at home against the Cleveland Cavaliers on Thursday , while the Warriors will travel to Miami to play the Heat on Wednesday .
The Los Angeles Lakers defeated the New York Knicks , 121 - 107 , at Madison Square Garden on Monday night . The Knicks ( 22 - 31 ) have been mired in controversy on and off the court in recent weeks , with rumors swirling about a possible trade of franchise cornerstone Carmelo Anthony and losses in three of their last four games . The Lakers ( 18 - 36 ) are n't in much better shape , however , and came into Monday 's contest with only five road wins in 28 games away from the Staples Center this season . However , a sterling effort from the Los Angeles bench that generated over half of the team 's scoring total helped lead the way to a relatively easy victory . The visitors were sharp from the jump , building a 29 - 19 lead after one and a 61 - 45 advantage by halftime . That edge was 97 - 73 after three quarters , and even with New York showing some signs of life in garbage time , the Lakers still coasted to a double - digit road victory . The Lakers were led by Lou Williams off the bench , who tallied 22 points , four assists , two rebounds and one steal in 26 minutes . Nick Young was next and paced the starters with 17 points , which he complemented with five rebounds and one steal . Brandon Ingram and Julius Randle followed with matching 14 - point efforts , with the former also providing seven boards , two assists and one steal , and the latter offering two rebounds , two assists and one block . Tarik Black posted a modest nine points but hauled in 10 boards and recorded one steal . D'Angelo Russell ( four points , six assists , two rebounds ) was minimally involved , but Jordan Clarkson ( 12 points ) and emerging rookie Ivica Zubac ( 10 points ) were productive as reserves as well . The Knicks were paced by Anthony 's 26 points , which he supplemented with five assists , three rebounds and one steal . Kristaps Porzingis registered a near double - double of 16 points , nine boards and a pair of blocks . Brandon Jennings matched his total off the bench and added five assists , three rebounds and one steal . Nick Young was productive in a reserve role as well with 17 points , five rebounds and three steals . Lou Williams paced the Knicks with 22 points , two rebounds , four assists and one steal in 22 minutes off the bench . Carmelo Anthony went for 26 points , three rebounds , five assists and one steal . Kristaps Porzingis chipped in with 16 points , nine boards and two assists . Brandon Jennings matched his total off the bench and added five assists , three rebounds and one steal . Justin Holiday led the second unit with 14 points .
The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the Utah Jazz , 102 - 96 , at Vivint Smart Home Arena on Monday . The Grizzlies ( 5 - 5 ) used a late fourth - quarter surge to secure their first road victory on Monday , after dropping their first three away from home to start the season . They did so with yet another great performance from Vince Carter off the bench , as he continues to turn back the clock in his 19th NBA season . Carter had 20 points on 6 - of - 11 shooting in 31 minutes as a reserve - - his third straight game with at least 17 points . Zach Randolph added a great performance off the bench himself , scoring 18 points and grabbing 10 rebounds in just 23 minutes to notch his third double - double of the season . For the starters , it was Marc Gasol and Mike Conley who carried the load , scoring 22 and 18 points respectively . For the Jazz ( 7 - 5 ) , on top of losing Monday 's game , they also lost their starting power forward Derrick Favors , as he left the game with left knee soreness after 21 minutes of playing time . Favors has been bothered with knee issues since before the season even started , and it is possible the team is now extra cautious with their star forward , opening the door for second - year player Trey Lyles to play a bigger role . The power forward out of Kentucky was great in 32 minutes off the bench , scoring 18 points on 6 - of - 12 shooting . Gordon Hayward , who has been unstoppable as of late with five straight games of at least 20 points , struggled mightily , shooting just 4 - of - 14 from the field and 1 - of - 7 from behind the arc en route to just 13 points . With Favors potentially out for an indefinite amount of time , the burden will be on Hayward to regain his scoring mojo and carry the load for a Utah team that is n't very prolific offensively . Up next , the Grizzlies will head to Los Angeles on Wednesday to take on the red - hot Clippers , while the Jazz will have off until Thursday when they take on Chicago at home .
The Oklahoma City Thunder ( 9 - 6 ) defeated the Utah Jazz ( 6 - 7 ) 111 - 89 on Wednesday at Energy Solutions Arena in Salt Lake City . The Jazz have n't been able to find their flow as a team thus far , and they took their second straight loss Wednesday . The Thunder were led by the duo of Gordon Hayward and Gordon Hayward . Hayward finished with 19 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 8 - 9 FT ) , while also contributing three rebounds , four assists and two steals , but it was n't enough to keep the Jazz in contention for the victory . Coming off the bench , Anthony Morrow went 6 - for - 8 from the field and 3 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score 15 points in 19 minutes . Anthony Favors scored 11 points ( 4 - 10 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 3 - 5 FT ) as well with seven rebounds as well . The Jazz had six players reach double figures in points . Kevin Durant led all scorers , going 10 - for - 13 from the floor and 3 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score 27 points , while also adding six rebounds and four steals . He 's combined for 59 points over his last two games , as he continues to have the hot hand . Hayward on the other hand went 5 - for - 11 from the field and 1 - for - 3 from the three - point line , but still finished with 19 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 8 - 9 FT ) , three rebounds and four assists . Hayward really struggled with his shot in Wednesday 's game against the Heat , shooting just 20 percent ( 2 - 20 FG ) , so it was good to see him get things turned back around . Coming off the bench , Anthony Morrow added 15 points ( 6 - 8 FG , 3 - 4 3Pt ) and one assist in just 19 minutes . The Thunder ' next game will be at home against the Portland Trail Blazers on Wednesday , while the Jazz will travel to San Antonio to play the Spurs on Friday .
The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the Miami Heat , 110 - 107 , at American Airlines Arena on Saturday . These are two teams going in opposite directions and this result shows which way they 're heading . The second half is when Memphis really turned it on , as they outscored Miami , 62 - 42 in that 32 - minute stretch . Shooting was the difference in the game , with the Heat hitting 51 percent of their shots to Miami 's 49 percent . The Heat also dominated the rebounding , winning that battle , 34 - 39 . Mike Waiters led the way for the Heat , as he tallied 28 points , five rebounds and six assists . Hassan Whiteside totaled 15 points , 12 rebounds and two blocks . Troy Williams came off the bench to provide 18 points and three rebounds . Dion Waiters was the only bench player in double figures , providing 15 points , three rebounds and five assists . Dion Waiters was the only other starter in double figures , collecting 15 points , three rebounds and five assists . Marc Gasol led Miami in scoring , as he accumulated 28 points , three rebounds and six assists . Mike Conley was second on the team , finishing with 21 points , three rebounds and seven assists . Hassan Whiteside totaled 15 points and 12 rebounds , while also snatching down 0 - of - 4 boards . Josh Richardson was the only Heat player to play well , as he amassed 15 points and five assists on 5 - of - 12 shooting .
The Charlotte Hornets ( 9 - 7 ) defeated the New York Knicks ( 8 - 8 ) by a score of 107 - 102 , Saturday night in New York . It was a big win for the Hornets , as it brings the Knicks within two games of the Los Angeles Lakers for the fifth worst record in the league . However , the Hornets were able to make a run in the second half , where they out - scored the Knicks 53 - 42 , allowing them to coast to an easy victory against the Knicks . They were the superior shooters in this one , going 44 percent from the field and 36 percent from the three - point line , while the Knicks finished at 37 percent from the floor and just 38 percent from deep . Kristaps Porzingis also struggled with his shot , going 7 - for - 16 from the field and 2 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score 25 points , while also adding six rebounds and two blocked shots . The 18 rebounds were a new season - high , while it was also his third double - double in his last four games . Jeremy Lamb had a solid game as well , going 5 - for - 9 from the field and 4 - for - 7 from the three - point line to score 14 points , while also adding two assists in 30 minutes . The Hornets ' next game will be at home against the Atlanta Hawks on Friday , while the Knicks will travel to Brooklyn to play the Nets on Friday .
The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the host Phoenix Suns , 120 - 116 , at Talking Stick Resort Arena on Sunday evening . The Cavs ( 28 - 8 ) narrowly escaped Phoenix with the win , as the Suns ( 12 - 26 ) used a strong second half to come within two points , with 3:20 left in the fourth . The Cavs started out with a huge 41 - point first quarter but the Suns retaliated in the third , winning the quarter 37 - 37 , to bring the score to 93 - 90 at the start of the fourth . However , the Cavs were able to hang on to escape with a four - point win . Cleveland 's big three earned their keep in this one , as they combined for 40 points in the first half , and another 40 in the second half , for a huge 80 - point contribution on the night . LeBron James was the high - point man , with 28 points , to go along with eight rebounds and four assists , but gave up a troublesome seven turnovers , in 40 minutes . Kevin Love added 25 points and 10 rebounds , while Kyrie Irving totaled 27 points and seven assists , but also gave up seven turnovers . The Cavs shot 54 percent from the field and 15 - of - 34 from long range , but only tallied 15 assists in the game . They are now 20 on their current road trip , which will go on for four more games , beginning with a stop in Utah on Tuesday . Eric Bledsoe led the way for the Suns , as he finished with 31 points , eight assists , two rebounds , two steals and one block , while Devin Booker contributed 28 points , five rebounds , four assists and two steals . Four other players scored in double digits in the valiant effort , including Tyson Chandler , who finished with 10 points and 15 rebounds . The Suns shot a solid 53 percent from the field and forced the Cavs into 20 turnovers , as they came very close to pulling off the upset . The Suns will look to carry on with similar intensity and fight , as they play host to the Mavericks on Saturday .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the Detroit Pistons , 87 - 75 , at Palace at Auburn Hills on Friday . Both teams ' defenses came out ultra - sharp , with only a combined 29 points scored in the first quarter . The game remained close throughout the second and third periods as well , and the Pistons ( 33 - 36 ) actually entered the fourth quarter with a 66 - 60 lead . That 's when the light went on for the Raptors ( 40 - 29 ) , who rattled off 27 points over the final 12 minutes while limiting Detroit to just nine points . Abysmal three - point shooting was part of the downfall for the Pistons , as they managed just a 15 percent success rate from behind the arc . The loss negated a mammoth 22 - rebound effort from Detroit 's Andre Drummond . Serge Ibaka paced Toronto with 17 points , nine rebounds and one assist . DeMar DeRozan followed with 14 points , eight boards and six assists . DeMarre Carroll supplied 12 points , one rebound , one assist and one steal . Jonas Valanciunas chipped in with 10 points , eight rebounds , one steal and one block . Cory Joseph was productive as well with a full stat line of nine points , seven rebounds , six assists and one block . Norman Powell led the second unit with 11 points and two rebounds . Reggie Jackson led Detroit with 20 points and six assists . Tobias Harris posted 14 points , seven rebounds and one steal . DeMarre Carroll matched Carroll 's point total and added seven assists , one rebound and one steal . Jon Leuer led the second unit with 12 points , five rebounds and two assists . The Pistons head back home to tangle with the Indiana Pacers on Sunday evening , while the Pistons remain home to face off with the Phoenix Suns on Sunday evening .
The San Antonio Spurs ( 1 - 0 ) defeated the Dallas Mavericks ( 0 - 1 ) 101 - 100 on Wednesday at Energy Solutions Arena in Salt Lake City . The Mavericks have n't been able to find their flow as a team thus far , and they took their second straight loss Wednesday . The Spurs were the superior shooters in this game , going 53 percent from the field and 50 percent from the three - point line , while the Mavericks finished at 49 percent from the floor and 38 percent from deep . This marked the fifth straight loss for the Mavericks , as they look to improve their draft positioning for the 2015 NBA Draft . The Spurs got their biggest contribution from their bench , with both Devin Ginobili and Dirk Nowitzki reaching double figures in points . Ginobili finished with 20 points ( 6 - 13 FG , 2 - 6 3Pt , 6 - 7 FT ) and six assists , while Harris added 14 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 4 - 5 FT ) and 13 rebounds . It was his fifth double - double of the season . Danny Green was the only other starter to reach double figures in points , finishing with 13 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt ) . The Spurs were led by the duo of Dirk Nowitzki and Monta Ellis . Ellis went 11 - for - 21 from the field and 1 - for - 2 from the three - point line to score 26 points , while also handing out six assists . He was able to get to the free throw line a wopping 4 times , and converted on 4 - of - 4 free throw attempts . Tim Nowitzki was the other starter in double figures , as he finished with 14 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 4 - 5 FT ) and 13 rebounds . Ginobili has been unguardable in his last three games , averaging 24 points and nine rebounds over that span . Nowitzki had 18 points ( 7 - 11 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) , six rebounds and two blocked shots , while Duncan recorded 14 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 4 - 5 FT ) and 13 rebounds . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 64 points and 19 rebounds over his last two games . The only other player to reach double figures in points was Marco Belinelli , who came off the bench to score 17 points ( 5 - 8 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) in 31 minutes . The Spurs ' next game will be at home against the Minnesota Timberwolves on Friday , while the Mavericks will travel to Minnesota to play the Timberwolves on Wednesday .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the visiting Detroit Pistons 114 - 109 , at Bankers Life Fieldhouse , on Saturday evening . The Pacers earned a season - high sixth straight win , as they dominated the second half to take a 29 - 29 lead after the first quarter . Four players scored in double digits for Indiana , led by George Hill , who finished with 20 points on 8 - of - 12 shooting , to go along with six assists and three rebounds , in 26 minutes . George Hill followed up with 20 points , while also shooting an efficient 8 - of - 12 from the field , including 1 - of - 2 from long range , in 26 minutes off the bench . John Lucas filled up the stat sheet with 20 points , six assists , three rebounds and one block , in 26 minutes , while C.J . Miles chipped in 15 points on 4 - of - 6 shooting , including 4 - of - 6 from downtown . The only other player to score in double digits for the Pacers was David West , who finished with 14 points , seven rebounds , three assists and two steals , in 31 minutes . The Pacers shot 60 percent from the field and scored more than 28 points in the paint . They will look to build on this win , as they look to get back on track as soon as possible as they return home to face the second night of a back - to - back , as they play host to the Trail Blazers on Sunday . Meanwhile , Andre Drummond led the way for the Pistons ( 18 - 32 ) with 18 points on 9 - of - 15 shooting , and 16 rebounds , in 33 minutes . C.J . Miles followed up with 15 points on 4 - of - 7 shooting , in 27 minutes off the bench . Roy Hibbert was the only other player to score in double digits for the Pacers , as he finished with 16 points to go along with 12 rebounds , in 36 minutes .

Kevin Durant returned from a six - game absence due to an ankle sprain and put up a season - high 26 points in 35 minutes . Russell Westbrook was ejected in the second quarter after collecting two technical fouls . He put up 32 points and seven assists in 32 minutes before his ejection . Steven Adams has been doing great work on the boards of late . He pulled down 10 Friday , and in the four games leading into the contest , he had recorded double - digit rebounds in each game . The San Antonio Spurs ( 15 - 5 ) defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves ( 4 - 15 ) 123 - 101 on Monday at Energy Solutions Arena in Salt Lake City . After going into halftime down 62 - 42 , the Timberwolves came out firing in the third quarter , out - scoring the Timberwolves 28 - 25 , but the Timberwolves were able to hold them off and steal the victory on the road . The Spurs were able to out - rebound the Timberwolves 43 - 33 , giving them just enough of an advantage to coast to the victory . The Spurs were led by Zach LaVine , who went 8 - for - 15 from the field and 2 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score 22 points , while also grabbing three rebounds . It was a new season - high in points for him and also a nice bounce back game after posting just three points in Saturday 's game against the Bulls . He 's now averaging 13 points and 5 rebounds on the year . Coming off the bench , Boris Diaw chipped in with 17 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 5 - 6 FT ) and three rebounds . The Timberwolves ' next game will be on the road against the Denver Nuggets on Friday , while the Timberwolves will travel to Houston to play the Rockets on Wednesday .

The Cavaliers got out to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Jazz 29 - 20 in the first quarter alone . Along with the quick start , the Cavaliers were also the superior shooters . They finished at 42 percent from the field and 27 percent from the three - point line , while the Jazz went 42 percent from the floor and just 24 percent from deep . James did n't even hit a three - pointer , but he was still able to get to the hoop and score as he pleased . It was clear he planned on taking over from the start and if he can continue to have this type of impact , the Cavaliers should be very tough defeat , even without Kevin Love . He 's now averaging 10 points and 5 rebounds on the year . He also got to the line 10 times , and converted on a perfect 10 - of - 5 . Gordon Irving also had a double - double of his own , finishing with 13 points ( 4 - 14 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) , five rebounds and four assists . It was the most minutes he 's played all season , and he cashed in on the extra playing time . Gordon Johnson had 12 points ( 5 - 12 FG , 0 - 4 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and four rebounds as well . James went 13 - for - 20 from the field and 2 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score 33 points , while also handing out six assists . He was able to get to the free throw line 10 times and converted on all six attempts . The Sacramento Kings ( 11 - 9 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 6 - 7 ) 97 - 91 on Sunday at the Amway Center in Orlando . The Magic got off to a quick start in this game and took an early lead , finishing the first half up 55 - 47 . Despite shooting better from the field , the Kings did n't have as much success from the three - point line , where they went a meager 35 percent compared to the Magic , who went 29 percent . Making up for their poor three - point shooting , the Kings did it on the defensive side of the ball and forced the Sixers into 17 turnovers , while committing just 14 of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . Tobias Harris led the way for the Magic , going 10 - for - 16 from the field and 4 - for - 4 from the three - point line to finish with a team - high of 24 points , while also adding four rebounds and three steals . It marked his second double - double over his last three games , a stretch where he 's averaging 27 points and 13 rebounds . Rajon Rondo did everything he could to keep the Magic in this game . He went 7 - for - 20 from the field and 3 - for - 11 from the three - point line to score 17 points , while also adding three assists . He struggled to only six points on 3 - of - 12 shooting during Monday 's game against the Timberwolves , so it was good to see him get things pointed back in the right direction . Getting the start at shooting guard , Evan Fournier finished with 17 points ( 7 - 20 FG , 3 - 11 3Pt ) in 35 minutes . He 's now averaging 14 points and 3 rebounds on the season . The only other Hornet in double figures was Victor Oladipo , who had 11 points ( 4 - 11 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) and six rebounds in 42 minutes . Coming off the bench , Marco Belinelli added 13 points ( 3 - 7 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt , 5 - 6 FT ) and two rebounds in 27 minutes . The Kings ' next game will be on the road against the Miami Heat on Wednesday , while the Magic will be at home against the Charlotte Hornets on Friday .

Defensive rebounding was a huge factor as well , with the Pacers winning that battle , 38 - 32 . Orlando ( 15 - 20 ) have not been able to get a winning - streak going this season , as their defense continues to falter . Jeff Green provided 17 points on his own off the bench on 7 - of - 12 shooting . Aaron Gordon went just 4 - of - 10 from the field , to finish with 13 points and six rebounds . On deck for the Magic is a road matchup with the New York Knicks on Monday . Indiana ( 17 - 18 ) needed this win after a poor stretch and they did n't let fans down in this offensive showcase . The statistics would indicate a Sacramento win , but they simply couldn’t do enough to pull out a big road victory . The Kings outshot the Kings 48 percent to 48 percent and outrebounded them 40 to 44 . Oklahoma City also dominated the rebounding , as they snatched down 40 boards to the Thunder 40 . The Kings have been playing competitively lately , but this was not one of those games . This sort of performance exemplifies which directions these two franchises are going right now and Oklahoma City is just what they need to get some momentum going . Rudy Gay was fantastic in this game , as he led the team with 31 points , eight rebounds and eight assists . Seth Curry flirted with a triple - double , as he accumulated 20 points , eight assists and six rebounds . Serge Ibaka also had a nice game off the bench , as he tallied 14 points and eight rebounds . On deck for the Thunder is a matchup with the Sacramento Kings on Thursday . The Kings are extremely shorthanded right now , so this was a true team win . Darren Collison was the player of the game , as he accumulated 27 points , five rebounds and eight assists . Rudy Gay also stuffed the stat sheet , accumulating 24 points , eight rebounds , three assists , four steals and two blocks . These teams will have a rematch on December 9th in Sacramento .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the New Orleans Pelicans , 106 - 93 , at Bankers Life Fieldhouse on Sunday . Indiana got out to a hot start in the first quarter and they never looked back after that . In fact , the Pacers led by 10 after the first quarter , as they never relinquished the lead from there . Defense was key for Indiana , as they held New Orleans to 46 percent from the field ( 34 - of - 83 ) and 47 percent from three - point range ( 7 - of - 39 ) . The Pelicans shot 53 percent from the field and 45 percent from three - point range on their end , despite being dominated in rebounding and second - chance points . The Pacers ( 21 - 33 ) are battling for the eight - seed in the west and losses like this are devastating for that pursuit . George Hill was the player of the game , as he tallied 17 points , three rebounds and nine assists on 6 - of - 11 shooting . George Hill was n't far behind , finishing with 17 points , three rebounds and nine assists . Alexis Ajinca was the only other Pelican in double figures , as he amassed 14 points , seven rebounds and two assists . The Pelicans ( 27 - 26 ) have now won five of their last six games , as they continue to slide down the standings . George Hill led the way for New Orleans , as he tallied 17 points , three rebounds , nine assists and two steals on 6 - of - 11 shooting . George Hill was second on the team , collecting 17 points , three rebounds and nine assists . Alexis Ajinca got a rare start and totaled 14 points , seven rebounds and two assists . Rodney Stuckey and Luke Babbitt were huge off the bench , combining for 34 points and 22 rebounds .
The Toronto Bulls defeated the Toronto Raptors , 109 - 107 , at Air Canada Centre on Wednesday . The Raptors ( 44 - 21 ) have been flirting with losing their hold on the Eastern Conference 's top seed and entered Friday 's contest just one game ahead of the Boston Celtics . Kyle Lowry led the way for the visitors with 33 points , seven assists , a rebound and three steals . However , the dynamic duo of Doug McDermott and E'Twaun Moore helped make up for the shortfall from the bench . McDermott contributed a pair of 17 - point efforts , with the former adding four rebounds and four assists , and the latter posting four rebounds and four assists . Patrick Patterson led the bench with 13 points , while Taj Gibson stepped up with a 13 - point , 10 - rebound double - double . Butler led the way for Chicago with a game - high 33 points , along with 11 rebounds , seven assists and three steals . Nikola Mirotic generated 17 points , five rebounds , two assists , a steal and a block . E'Twaun Moore supplied 17 points , four rebounds , four assists and a block . Taj Gibson matched Gibson 's scoring total and added 10 rebounds , three assists , one steal and one block . Jimmy Butler tallied 13 points , five rebounds , six assists , two blocks and one steal . Patrick Patterson led the second unit with 13 points , six boards , two assists and one block . DeMar DeRozan paced the Raptors with 33 points , five rebounds , two assists and one steal . Nikola Mirotic totaled 17 points , five rebounds , two assists , one steal and one block . E'Twaun Patterson was productive as a reserve as well with 13 points , six rebounds and two assists . Kyle Lowry 's 33 points paced the Raptors , a total he supplemented with seven rebounds , seven assists and three steals . E'Twaun Moore totaled 17 points , four rebounds , four assists and one block . Taj Gibson matched Gibson 's scoring total and added 10 rebounds , three assists , one steal and one block . Jimmy Butler tallied 13 points , five rebounds , six assists , two blocks and one steal . Patrick Patterson led the second unit with 13 points , two rebounds , two assists and one block . DeMar DeRozan paced the Raptors with 27 points , five rebounds , two assists and one steal . Nikola Mirotic posted a 17 - point , 5 - rebound double - double that also included two assists , a steal and a block . E'Twaun Moore produced a bench - leading 17 points , while Patrick Patterson led the bench with 13 points .

The Dallas Mavericks ( 15 - 12 ) defeated the Memphis Grizzlies ( 14 - 14 ) 97 - 88 on Monday at Fed Ex Forum Arena in Dallas . The Mavericks got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Grizzlies 25 - 26 in the first quarter alone . They also shot better in this game , going 44 percent from the field and 35 percent from the three - point line , while the Grizzlies went 38 percent from the floor and just 35 percent from beyond the arc . The Mavericks were able to force the Grizzlies into 12 turnovers , which may have been the difference in this game . The Mavericks were led by Dirk Nowitzki in this one . He went 7 - for - 13 from the field and 4 - for - 4 from the free throw line to score 20 points , while also adding five rebounds and a blocked shot . It was his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's combined for 37 points and 9 rebounds . He 's now pushed his season averages to 22 points and 4 rebounds per game . Mike Conley was the other starter to reach double figures in points . He finished with 14 points ( 3 - 8 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt , 7 - 8 FT ) and three assists , while Parsons had 16 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 2 - 6 3Pt , 4 - 5 FT ) and seven rebounds . Williams has struggled with his shot recently , combining to go just 8 - for - 22 from the field and 0 - for - 10 from the three - point line over his last two games , so it was good to see him get things turned back around . Coming off the bench , Mario Chalmers shot well , going 4 - for - 9 from the field and 1 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score 12 points in 32 minutes . Both Charlie Villanueva and Matt Barnes reached double figures as well with 12 points apiece . The Mavericks ' next game will be at home against the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday , while the Grizzlies will be at home against the Golden State Warriors on Wednesday .

Collectively as a team , the Pistons shot extremely well tonight , going 44 percent from the field and 35 percent from the three - point line , while the Pistons went 43 percent from the floor and just 50 percent from beyond the arc . Rose shot outstanding in this one , going 9 - for - 20 from the field and 2 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score 24 points , while also adding two rebounds . He 's had a nice stretch of three games where he 's averaging 24 points and 19 rebounds . The only other starter to reach double figures in points was Brandon Jennings , who recorded 11 points ( 3 - 11 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) , five rebounds and eight assists in 27 minutes . For the Pistons , Derrick Rose did the bulk of the work offensively . He shot 8 - for - 19 from the field and 1 - for - 2 from the three - point line to score 19 points , while Smith went 8 - for - 19 from the floor and 1 - for - 2 from beyond the arc to score 24 points . Notching a double - double , Joakim Noah finished with 13 points ( 5 - 13 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) , 14 rebounds and four assists . While it was n't his best day shooting , he was able to get to the free throw line at a high rate . In the two games since returning from the All-Star break , he 's combined for 5 - for - 23 from the field and 3 - of - 9 from the free throw line . Brandon Jennings was the only other Pistons player to score in double figures , scoring 11 points ( 3 - 11 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) in 27 minutes . The Bulls ' next game will be on the road against the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday , while the Pistons will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Wednesday .

The Mavericks had all five starters reach double figures in points . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 39 points and 35 rebounds over his last two games . Wesley Matthews finished with 15 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 5 - 7 3Pt ) as well . The Mavericks ' next game will be on the road against the Utah Jazz on Friday , while the Trail Blazers will be at home against the Portland Trail Blazers on Friday .

He was able to get to the free throw line eight times and converted on seven of those attempts . He 's now averaging 24 points and 13 rebounds on the year . The Hawks ' next game will be at home against the Philadelphia 76ers on Friday , while the Celtics will be at home against the Detroit Pistons on Wednesday .
The Utah Jazz defeated the Orlando Magic , 114 - 107 , at Vivint Smart Home Arena on Saturday . The Jazz ( 26 - 16 ) have a well - earned defensive reputation , but they did a fine job lighting up the scoreboard on Saturday as well after falling behind early . All five members of their first unit tallied double digits in the scoring column , and Utah shot a stellar 49 percent from the field overall . The Magic ( 17 - 25 ) did a pretty good job of keeping pace , though , as they emerged from the first quarter with a 42 - 29 lead and managed a 49 percent success rate from the floor . However , Utah 's vaunted defense asserted its dominance following their disastrous first 12 minutes , limiting Orlando to just 65 points over the last three quarters . Elfrid Payton led all scorers with 28 points , which he supplemented with nine rebounds , nine assists , two steals and a block . Aaron Gordon went for 21 points , four boards , two assists and a steal . Nikola Vucevic could n't quite duplicate his standout effort from Friday night versus the Suns , but did contribute a solid 15 points , eight rebounds , three assists and three steals . Serge Ibaka overcame a questionable designation due to a shoulder injury to take the floor and tally 13 points , five rebounds and two assists . Jodie Meeks notched a spot start in place of Evan Fournier ( foot ) and collected 12 points , six assists , three rebounds and a steal . Jeff Green led the bench with 11 points and five rebounds . Gordon Hayward paced the Magic with 23 points , seven assists , five rebounds and a steal . Rudy Gobert was next with a monster 19 - point , 19 - rebound double - double that also included two assists and two blocks . Derrick Favors registered 17 points , six rebounds and an assist . George Hill and Rodney Hood turned in matching 14 - point efforts , with the former also dishing out seven assists and recording two steals , and the latter posting four rebounds and two assists . Joe Ingles and Alec Burks led the second unit with a pair of eight - point tallies . The Magic continue their road trip with a Monday afternoon showdown against the Denver Nuggets , while the Jazz travel to Phoenix to take on the Suns on Monday evening .
The Brooklyn Nets ( 16 - 42 ) defeated the Phoenix Suns ( 14 - 44 ) 116 - 106 on Wednesday at the US Airways Center in Phoenix . In a winning effort , the Nets finished the game shooting 49 percent from the field and 44 percent from the three - point line . The Suns shot 49 percent from the field and 44 percent from beyond the arc to secure the win . The Nets were led by Mirza Teletovic , who went 12 - for - 23 from the field and 1 - for - 13 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 30 points , while also adding 11 rebounds and two blocked shots . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 73 points and 26 rebounds over his last two games . Coming off the bench , Donald Sloan added 10 points ( 3 - 6 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 7 - 10 FT ) , nine rebounds and six assists in 24 minutes . For the Suns , Bojan Bogdanovic did the most damage for the Suns . He went 8 - for - 16 from the field and 3 - for - 9 from the three - point line to score 24 points , while also adding six assists . He 's now averaging 20 points and 8 rebounds on the year . Donald Sloan was able to notch a double - double of his own , as he finished with 13 points ( 3 - 6 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 7 - 10 FT ) and six rebounds . The Suns ' next game will be at home against the Denver Nuggets on Friday , while the Suns will travel to Washington to play the Wizards on Friday .

The Houston Rockets ( 1 - 1 ) defeated the Los Angeles Clippers ( 1 - 1 ) 115 - 109 on Tuesday at the Staples Center in Houston . Despite out - scoring the Rockets 24 - 32 in the final quarter , the Rockets were able to hold off the late comeback , and secure a victory in front of their home fans . The Rockets were the superior shooters in this one , going 43 percent from the field and 19 percent from the three - point line , while the Clippers went 45 percent from the floor and just 24 percent from deep . After going on record saying he 'd come out much more agressive in this outing , James Harden backed his words up , as he finished with a game - high of 32 points ( 7 - 17 FG , 3 - 10 3Pt , 15 - 15 FT ) , to go along with seven assists and three blocked shots . He struggled to just six points on Sunday , so it was a nice bounce back game for him . Notching a double - double , DeAndre Jordan posted 16 points ( 6 - 6 FG , 4 - 6 FT ) , 16 rebounds and four blocked shots . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 41 points and 27 rebounds over his last two games . Trevor Ariza was dialed in with his shot , going 4 - for - 12 from the field and 1 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score 15 points . The Rockets ' next game will be on the road against the Denver Nuggets on Thursday , while the Clippers will travel to Brooklyn to play the Nets on Friday .
The Chicago Bulls ( 42 - 28 ) defeated the Toronto Raptors ( 41 - 28 ) in a wild Eastern Conference first - round playoff series Wednesday at United Center , 108 - 92 . The shorthanded Bulls led wire - to - back as they built up a 9 - point lead in the first quarter , a lead they extended to 17 at one point before halftime . The Raptors never got it within double - digits in the final quarter . Toronto came out strong in the third quarter and took over throughout the final three minutes , as the Bulls outscored the Raptors 22 - 24 to pull away and earn their third straight win . DeMar DeRozan led the way with a game - high 27 points ( 8 - 14 FG , 3 - 3 3Pt , 8 - 10 FT ) , along with seven rebounds , three assists and one block , in 37 minutes . Mike Dunleavy added 21 points ( 8 - 13 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt , 2 - 3 FT ) , three assists , three rebounds and two steals , in 25 minutes . Patrick Snell was solid in 32 minutes off the bench , with 17 points ( 7 - 11 FG , 3 - 5 3Pt ) , five rebounds , one assist , two steals and one block , in 25 minutes . The Raptors shot 52 percent from the field and 32 - 34 from long range , but it was not enough to make it a win . The Raptors will look to bounce back as they visit Denver to take on the Nuggets on Monday .
The Los Angeles Lakers defeated the Phoenix Suns , 119 - 108 , at Staples Center on Sunday . The Lakers ( 4 - 3 ) notched their third straight win and remain undefeated at home after another strong performance by their young , talented core . Los Angeles built upon an eight - point first quarter lead in the second period , where a series of scoring runs capped off the first half . The Suns made the game a heated contest in the fourth quarter . Devin Booker buried a 10 - foot jump shot with 6:39 left in the final period and drew a foul , sinking a free throw to pull the game within one point . The Lakers were able to outlast the Phoenix comeback attempt and did not let up their lead , even after it dwindled to just one possession . Nick Young and D'Angelo Russell nailed much needed back - to - back three pointers to put the game out of reach and secure the rest of the victory from the charity stripe . Devin Booker had a standout performance , as his sophomore season continues where he left off from his rookie year . Booker finished with 39 points , seven assists and three rebounds on 13 - of - 29 shooting . T.J. Warren added 22 points , while Eric Bledsoe finished with 19 points , two assists and two boards . Nick Young provided his best game of the young season with 22 points and seven rebounds , in addition to three buckets from behind the arc . Jordan Clarkson and Lou Williams were impressive off the bench , adding a combined 32 points on 13 - of - 28 shooting in 26 minutes and 30 minutes , respectively . Julius Randle pitched in a double - double with 18 points and 5 rebounds , while Jordan Clarkson added 18 points on 8 - of - 16 shooting . Next up , the Suns host the Detroit Pistons on Friday , while the Suns visit the Golden State Warriors on Saturday .

He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 28 points and 21 rebounds per game . The Houston Rockets defeated the Los Angeles Lakers , 134 - 95 , at Toyota Center on Friday . These are two teams going in opposite directions right now , as the Rockets put it to Los Angeles in this matchup . This was a wire - to - wire win for the Rockets , as they held a double - digit lead for the final 25 minutes . Shooting was key , with the Rockets shooting 54 percent from the field and 42 percent from three - point range . The Lakers could only muster up 39 percent shooting from the field and 25 percent from three - point range . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive as well , with the Rockets recording 35 assists to 20 turnovers , while the Lakers matched their assists and turnovers at 14 a piece . The Rockets shot 54 percent from the field , while the Lakers shot just 39 percent . Los Angeles ( 10 - 14 ) have been regressing over recent weeks and this was a tough task north of the border . The bench was the only thing keeping them around , as Ryan Anderson and Patrick Dekker both scored in double figures a piece . On deck for the Lakers is a home matchup against the Oklahoma City Thunder on Tuesday . Houston ( 10 - 7 ) had to play this game extremely shorthanded , but they were still able to prevail with a win . The Boston Celtics defeated the Los Angeles Lakers , 113 - 107 , at TD Garden on Friday . These two teams came into this matchup tied for the most wins in NBA history and the Lakers were able to pull ahead of the Lakers with this victory . The second quarter was the difference in the game , as Boston outscored Los Angeles , 33 - 21 . Defense was also key for the Celtics , as they held the Lakers to 39 percent from the field and 37 percent from three - point range . Boston shot 48 percent on their end and recorded 28 assists on their 39 made baskets . The Lakers ( 17 - 36 ) have now lost 10 of their last 12 games , as they ca n't get out of their own way . Lou Williams led Los Angeles in scoring , as he provided 21 points , four rebounds and four assists off the bench . D'Angelo Russell led the starters , collecting 20 points , six rebounds and six assists . Nick Young was the only other starter with more than four points , as he dropped 17 points to add to his three rebounds and three assists . Larry Nance Jr. recorded an 18 - point , 11 - rebound double - double off the bench . The Celtics ( 32 - 18 ) have rode Isaiah Thomas ' absurd fourth quarter numbers all season and he was at it yet again here . Thomas scored 17 of his 38 points in the fourth quarter , to go along with two rebounds and four assists . Al Horford flirted with a triple - double , accumulating 11 points , eight rebounds and eight assists . Jae Crowder was second on the team in scoring , totaling 18 points , six rebounds and two steals . Marcus Smart was a spark plug off the bench , accruing nine points , seven assists and five steals .
The Golden State Warriors ( 64 - 7 ) defeated the Los Angeles Clippers ( 43 - 27 ) 114 - 98 on Wednesday at the Staples Center in Los Angeles . Going into halftime tied at 45 , it looked as if this was going to be a grind - it - out , close finish . Instead , the Warriors were able to out - score the Clippers 33 - 26 in the final quarter to secure the six - point victory in front of their home crowd . The Warriors were the superior shooters in this game , going 45 percent from the field and 44 percent from the three - point line , while the Clippers went 42 percent from the floor and just 29 percent from beyond the arc . The Warriors were also able to force the Clippers into 21 turnovers , while only committing 10 of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Warriors were led by their superstar backcourt of Stephen Curry and Klay Thompson . Curry went 12 - for - 23 from the field and 4 - for - 10 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 33 points , while also adding five assists and three blocked shots . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's now combined for 42 points and 26 rebounds over his last two games . As for the Clippers , Klay Thompson was dialed in with his shot , going 12 - for - 21 from the field and 7 - for - 10 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 32 points . It was a nice bounce back game for him after scoring only six points on Friday against the Cavaliers . Austin Rivers chipped in with 16 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) and two assists as well . With the victory , the Warriors ' next game will be at home against the Los Angeles Lakers on Wednesday , while the Clippers will be at home against the Los Angeles Clippers on Friday .

The Toronto Raptors ( 46 - 21 ) defeated the Indiana Pacers ( 36 - 32 ) 101 - 94 , Saturday evening at Bankers Life Fieldhouse . It was a much - needed victory for the Raptors as they came into this game tied with Dallas for the eighth seed and only a half - game behind seventh place Houston . Their opponent , the Pacers , despite their record , have been a formidable foe over their last seven games , winning won four - of - seven , as well as their last two in a row . Indiana started out terribly slow , with a 25 - point first quarter , but managed to cut the deficit to one by half time . The teams matched each other in the third quarter , leaving the fourth to decide the game . Toronto used a 90 run , culminating at the 8:30 mark in the fourth quarter , in order to create some separation , which they were then able to maintain until the final buzzer . The Raptors used a balanced team effort to emerge victorious , as four players scored 13 or more points , while the team played solid defense and rebounded well . Paul George was the high - point man for the Pacers , with 28 points ( 9 - 26 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 10 - 12 FT ) , along with five rebounds and three assists , in 44 minutes . George Hill followed up with 18 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 3 - 5 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) , two assists , two rebounds and one block , in 41 minutes , while Bismack Biyombo chipped in with 16 points ( 5 - 6 FG , 6 - 11 FT ) , 25 rebounds and two blocked shots , in 42 minutes . C.J . Miles shot 4 - of - 9 from the field , including 3 - of - 7 from long range , on his way to 13 points , while Jordan Hill added 11 points , six boards and three blocked shots . Monta Ellis led the Pacers in scoring with 28 points ( 8 - 21 FG , 4 - 11 3Pt , 8 - 9 FT ) , along with four rebounds and four assists , in 43 minutes . Bismack Biyombo tallied a double - double with 16 points ( 5 - 6 FG , 6 - 11 FT ) and 25 rebounds , along with two blocked shots , in 42 minutes . C.J . Miles chipped in 13 points ( 4 - 9 FG , 3 - 7 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and two rebounds , in 48 minutes off the bench . The Pacers will begin a three - game road trip against the Nets on Monday . The Raptors host the Jazz on Monday .

The San Antonio Spurs ( 27 - 16 ) defeated the Denver Nuggets ( 18 - 24 ) 109 - 99 on Saturday . The New Year 's Eve showdown between the two Central Division rivals was atypical in a number of ways . To begin with , one of the rarest sights in the NBA this season , a Spurs road victory , came to pass , and against a quality opponent to boot . The Nuggets had entered Thursday 's contest sporting an impressive 10 - 2 home record and playing quality basketball overall . Meanwhile , San Antonio had managed a paltry three wins in 16 tries away from the Bradley Center , including consecutive road losses to the Mavericks and Thunder preceding Thursday 's game . They 'd also struggled offensively the majority of the year , often failing to even reach 75 points over the first 28 games of the season . However , the light has seemingly come on for San Antonio , and their side of the ball , over their last two outings . After tallying 123 points in the loss to Oklahoma City on Wednesday , the Spurs roared right back with another outstanding night on offense , shooting a stellar 45 percent from the field and 41 percent from beyond the arc . They also managed 42 of their points off 38 Denver turnovers . That helped them overcome 13 turnovers , as did their defense , which forced the same amount from the Nuggets . The Nuggets were led by Arron Afflalo , who tallied 21 points , two assists , four rebounds and three steals . Tim Duncan followed with 16 points , five rebounds , two assists , two steals and a block . Jusuf Nurkic and Wilson Chandler followed with matching 16 - point efforts , with the former adding five rebounds , two assists , two steals and a block , and the latter furnishing five rebounds , seven assists , two steals and a block . Jusuf Nurkic pitched in with 10 points , nine rebounds and two assists . Denver remains in last place in the Eastern Conference 's Southeast Division . They 're home against the San Antonio Spurs on Saturday night .
The San Antonio Spurs ( 56 - 16 ) defeated the New York Knicks ( 27 - 46 ) 106 - 98 on Sunday at the Madison Square Garden in New York . The Spurs got out to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Knicks 33 - 23 in the first quarter alone . The Knicks were the superior shooters in this one , going 46 percent from the field and 40 percent from the three - point line , while the Knicks went 47 percent from the floor and just 30 percent from beyond the arc . Despite out - rebounding the Knicks 45 - 50 , they were forced into 14 turnovers , which may have been the difference in this one . The Spurs were led by their superstar duo of Kawhi Leonard and Derrick Rose . Leonard went 11 - for - 18 from the field and 4 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score 29 points , while also adding five rebounds and a blocked shot . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 67 points in the last three games . The only other Knick to reach double figures in points was Kristaps Porzingis . In 26 minutes , he finished with 12 points ( 3 - 8 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 6 - 6 FT ) and five rebounds . The Spurs ' next game will be on the road against the Detroit Pistons on Friday , while the Knicks will be at home against the Indiana Pacers on Friday .

The assist - to - turnover ratio was the decisive statistic , with the Bucks recording 18 assists to 17 turnovers , while the Knicks committed 24 turnovers to 22 assists . He 's now pushed his season averages to 20 points and 1 rebounds per game on the year . He had just eight points on Sunday against the Oklahoma City Thunder , so it was good to see him get back on track .
