The Indiana Pacers defeated the Denver Nuggets 126 - 129 at Bankers Life Fieldhouse on Wednesday . The Pacers ( 22 - 19 ) came in to Wednesday 's contest looking to right some of the ills that had plagued them over their previous seven games , a stretch in which they 'd suffered five defeats . The Pacers ( 22 - 19 ) may have initially looked like easy prey , considering their losing record and the fact that they 'd recently lost their second - best playmaker , Rudy Gay , for the season with an Achilles injury . However , the old adage of `` that 's why they play the games '' rang particularly true Wednesday , as Indiana forced the Pacers into 17 turnovers , while committing just 17 of their own . The offensive proficiency led to a 59 percent success rate from the field , and their defense managed to elicit 17 turnovers from the Nuggets . Danilo Gallinari led the Pacers with 23 points , four rebounds , two assists and two steals . Gary Harris went for 20 points , four boards and two assists . Nikola Jokic had a near double - double with 18 points , nine rebounds , three assists and four steals . Emmanuel Mudiay and Emmanuel Mudiay supplied matching 10 - point efforts , with the former adding four rebounds , six assists , three steals and one block , and the latter providing four assists and three rebounds . Joe Foye led the bench with 12 points , three rebounds , six assists and one block . Paul George led the way for the Pacers with 19 points , five assists , three rebounds and three steals . Nikola Jokic posted a 18 - point , 2 - rebound double - double that also included three assists and four steals . Emmanuel Mudiay provided 10 points , six assists , four rebounds , three steals and one block . Myles Turner managed 18 points , two rebounds , three assists , four steals and two blocks . Barton led the Pacers ' reserves with 21 points , six boards and three assists . Monta Ellis led the way with 24 points , five assists , two rebounds and one steal . Nikola Jokic was right behind him with a 18 - point , 2 - rebound double - double that also included three assists and four steals . Emmanuel Mudiay provided 10 points , six assists , four rebounds , three steals and one block . Kenneth Faried managed 13 points , nine rebounds , an assist and a steal in 27 minutes .
The Golden State Warriors defeated the Oklahoma City Thunder , 121 - 118 , in Game 2 of the Western Conference first - round playoffs Saturday at Oracle Arena . It was a fair and foul game for reigning MVP Steph Curry . Though the superstar scored 46 points and nailed two three - pointers in Curry 's absence , most of his damage came from the free throw line , where he tied most of the way by the free throw line . The Warriors then pulled away late , out - scoring the Thunder 25 - 25 in the final period to seal the deal . For the second straight game , backcourt of Klay Curry and Klay Thompson led the way with 32 points and 32 points , respectively . Westbrook added three rebounds , six assists and two steals , while Durant scored 37 points , to go along with 12 rebounds and five assists . The point guard was one of his best performances of the season by scoring 32 points on 12 - of - 24 shooting from the field . The MVP point guard finished with 46 points on 14 - of - 24 shooting from the field , which included hitting 12 of his 24 shots from behind the arc . Beyond those two , Draymond Green was able to record his fifth double - double of the season , finishing with 2 points and 14 rebounds . The Warriors improved to 53 - 5 and currently resides in third place in the Western Conference 's Southwest Division . They head to Oklahoma City for a matchup with the Thunder on Sunday . Golden State , meanwhile , will be challenged by Orlando as they play host to the Magic this Sunday .
The Atlanta Hawks defeated the host Boston Celtics , 114 - 98 , at TD Garden on Friday . In a battle between two Eastern Conference contenders , both squads left it all on the floor . The third quarter was the decisive one for the Hawks , as they outscored the Celtics , 33 - 24 . In fact , Boston won or tied the other three quarters , but could n't quite make the full comeback in the fourth . Defense was key for Atlanta , as they held Boston to 39 percent shooting and outrebounded them 53 - 44 . Points in the paint was a huge factor as well , with the Hawks recording 74 paint points to the Celtics ' 27 . Many people pegged the Hawks as a subpar team , but they showed some resiliency in an impressive opener . Paul Millsap was the player of the game , as he tallied 17 points , 10 rebounds and four steals . Paul Millsap finished with 17 points , 10 rebounds and four assists . Jaylen Brown led the bench , as he provided 15 points and five rebounds . Tim Hardaway Jr. also scored 15 points , adding five rebounds to his tally . Jaylen Brown led the bench with 15 points and five rebounds . Boston will be in action again on Saturday in a road matchup against the Cleveland Cavaliers . The Hawks ( 33 - 26 ) have now won five of their last six games , with this win giving them a tie for the eight - seed in the east . Isaiah Thomas did all he could for Boston , as he led the team with 19 points , seven rebounds and five assists . Dwight Howard recorded a double - double , amassing 17 points , 12 rebounds and two blocks . Kent Bazemore was huge off the bench , providing 15 points and four rebounds . The Celtics will be off until Wednesday , when they play the Detroit Pistons on the road for their next game .
The San Antonio Spurs ( 38 - 11 ) defeated the Philadelphia 76ers ( 18 - 31 ) 102 - 86 on Monday at the AT & T Center in San Antonio . Pushing their win streak to seven games in a row , the Spurs had another strong performance Wednesday , ending the season sweep of the 76ers . The Spurs were the superior shooters , going 43 percent from the field and 29 percent from the three - point line , while the Sixers finished at 34 percent from the floor and just 36 percent from deep . The Spurs were led by the duo of Kawhi Leonard and Kawhi Ilyasova . Ilyasova finished with a team - high of 25 points ( 8 - 17 FG , 2 - 6 3Pt , 7 - 8 FT ) , while also adding nine rebounds and four steals . It marked his second double - double over his last three games , a stretch where he 's averaging 39 points and 12 rebounds . Leonard , on the other hand , finished with 19 points ( 8 - 17 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 3 - 5 FT ) , eight rebounds and five assists , as he did a little bit of everything Tuesday . The only other Sixer to reach double figures in points was Danny Green , who scored 12 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt , 0 - 0 FT ) in 29 minutes off the bench . The Spurs ' next game will be on the road against the Brooklyn Nets on Wednesday , while the Sixers will travel to Minnesota to play the Timberwolves on Wednesday .
The Chicago Bulls ( 24 - 16 ) defeated the Detroit Pistons ( 22 - 19 ) 111 - 101 on Wednesday at the Palace of Auburn Hills . Despite securing the victory , the Cavliers were out - shot in this matchup . The Pistons went 52 percent from the field and 19 percent from the three - point line , while the Pistons went 44 percent from the floor and just 19 percent from beyond the arc . The Bulls were able to force the Pistons into 11 turnovers , while committing only 10 of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . Pau Gasol had his way with the Pistons ' bigs . He went 13 - of - 18 from the field to score a game - high of 31 points , while also adding 12 rebounds and three blocked shots . It marked his second double - double over his last three games , a stretch where he 's averaging 36 points and 19 rebounds . Drummond , on the other hand , finished with 31 points ( 13 - 18 FG , 4 - 5 FT ) of his own , while adding 12 rebounds . It was his first double - double of the season , pushing his season averages to 10 points and 36 rebounds on the year . Marcus Morris was the other player to reach double - digit points , as he finished with 18 . The Bulls ' next game will be on the road against the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday , while the Pistons will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Wednesday .
The New York Knicks defeated the Charlotte Hornets , 102 - 94 , at Madison Square Garden on Sunday . The recent form of these teams would indicate an easy Hornets win , but the Knicks had other ideas . This game was close throughout , as there were nine ties and seven lead changes , with neither team leading by more than 10 points . Rebounding was key for New York , as they won that battle , 46 - 42 . In addition , they shot 40 percent from the field and 50 percent from three - point range . New York also dominated the rebounding , winning that battle , 45 - 42 . Carmelo Anthony had one of his best games of the season , dropping a game - high 31 points on 12 - of - 21 shooting . Carmelo Anthony also scored 18 points , adding 11 rebounds on 10 - of - 18 shooting . Arron Afflalo was the only other starter in double figures , as he accrued 16 points and three assists . Spencer Hawes led the bench , dropping 14 points on 4 - of - 10 shooting . Kevin Seraphin was second on the team , as he provided 10 points and five rebounds off the bench . The Knicks will host the New York Knicks on Friday for their next game . The Knicks ( 6 - 6 ) have been one of the surprises of the season and a comeback road win here just adds to their impressive resume ' . Kemba Walker continued his great play , as he tallied 31 points , four rebounds , eight assists and three steals in the win . Arron Afflalo was second on the team , as he provided 16 points , three rebounds and three assists off the bench . Jeremy Afflalo led the starters in scoring , as he amassed 16 points , three rebounds and three assists . Charlotte will look to keep rolling on Wednesday against the Washington Wizards .
The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 16 - 10 ) defeated the Memphis Grizzlies ( 21 - 6 ) 105 - 91 on Wednesday at Fed Ex Forum Arena in Memphis . After going into the fourth quarter down 60 - 22 , the Grizzlies came out firing in the third quarter , out - scoring the Grizzlies 25 - 25 to finish off the 14 - point victory on the road . The Cavs were the superior shooters in this one , going 61 percent from the field and 50 percent from the three - point line , while the Grizzlies went 45 percent from the floor and just 6 - for - 38 from beyond the arc . They were also able to force the Grizzlies into 9 turnovers , while committing just 14 of their own , which may have been the difference in this game . The Cavaliers were led by Marc Gasol , who went 10 - for - 17 from the field and 3 - for - 4 from the free throw line to score 23 points , while also adding 11 rebounds and a blocked shot . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 60 points and 6 assists over those two games . Jon Leuer was the only other player in double figures , as he chipped in with 16 points ( 7 - 14 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and seven rebounds . The Cavaliers ' next game will be at home against the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday , while the Grizzlies will travel to Chicago to play the Bulls on Wednesday .
The Los Angeles Lakers defeated the Memphis Grizzlies , 116 - 102 , at Staples Center on Sunday . The Lakers ( 13 - 25 ) came in to Wednesday 's contest looking to right some of the ills that had plagued them over their previous seven games , a stretch in which they 'd suffered five defeats . The Lakers ( 22 - 15 ) may have initially looked like easy prey , considering their losing record and the fact that they 'd recently lost their second - best playmaker , Rudy Gay , for the season with an Achilles injury . However , the old adage of `` that 's why they play the games '' rang particularly true Wednesday , as Memphis forced the same 47 to only 19 percent success rates from the field and three - point range , respectively . Memphis was led by a pair of 16 - point efforts from D'Angelo Russell and Jordan Clarkson . Jordan Clarkson generated 16 points , while Timofey Mozgov posted a 14 - point , 5 - rebound double - double . Lou Carter led the second unit with 14 points . The Grizzlies ( 22 - 15 ) were led by Mike Conley 's 21 points , which he supplemented with four assists and one rebound . Nick Young supplied 16 points , two assists and one block . Jordan Clarkson matched Clarkson 's point total and supplemented it with two rebounds and two assists . D'Angelo Russell compiled 18 points , six assists , four rebounds and one steal . Zach Randolph led the bench with 11 points , nine rebounds , one assist and one steal . Gasol paced the Lakers with 22 points , which he supplemented with six rebounds , seven assists and one steal . Nick Young tallied 16 points , two rebounds and two assists . Jordan Clarkson was right behind Conley with 16 points , seven boards and three assists . D'Angelo Russell supplied 18 points , four rebounds , six assists and one steal . Zach Randolph led the bench with 11 points , nine rebounds , one assist and one steal .
The Chicago Bulls ( 1 - 0 ) defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers ( 0 - 1 ) 97 - 95 on Thursday at Quicken Loans Arena in Cleveland . LeBron James ' homecoming did n't end the way he 'd probably imagined , and it appears Gasol is trying to fit into the Cavaliers ' new offense as merely one of the cogs . He played 37 minutes but finished with just 17 points , which is more than 11 points off his career per - game average of 30 points . Nikola Mirotic continued his strong start to the season , replacing the departing DeMarre Carroll in the starting lineup and providing a team - high 19 points ( 6 - 11 FG , 3 - 4 3Pt ) . Kevin Love nearly had a double - double with 18 points ( 6 - 17 FG , 3 - 3 FT ) and eight rebounds . The Bulls had nine players finish in double figures for points . Chicago was led by Kevin Love 's 18 points , which he supplemented with eight rebounds , four assists , two blocks and two blocked shots . Mirotic has been one of the hottest offensive players in the NBA this year , as he 's now averaging 22 points and 11 rebounds on the year . Mo Williams also had a productive night , posting 19 points ( 7 - 15 FG , 3 - 7 3Pt , 2 - 3 FT ) and seven assists in 37 minutes . Mo Williams ( 7 - 15 FG , 3 - 7 3PT ) and Mo Williams ( 7 - 15 FG , 3 - 7 3PT ) led the Bulls with 19 points apiece . Cleveland shot just 40 percent from the floor and committed 10 turnovers , which turned into 16 points ( 4 - 9 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 5 - 3 FT ) from Mo Williams . The Bulls ' next game is at home Monday against the Boston Celtics , while the Bulls will stay at home to play the Detroit Pistons on Wednesday as well .
The Portland Trail Blazers ( 34 - 16 ) defeated the Phoenix Suns ( 28 - 23 ) 108 - 87 on Wednesday . Portland was able to secure a win for the 16th time in the last 21 games on the strength of a typically stellar effort from offensive linchpin Damian Lillard , along with strong performances from two of their best bench players . After a dead - even first period , Portland forged ahead in the second quarter to build a 14 - point lead by halftime . Both teams played relatively mistake - free basketball , with only 14 turnovers between them , but the Suns managed to stay a step ahead of the Suns on the night to secure the relatively comfortable victory . Batum 's 20 points paced Phoenix , and he added four rebounds , seven assists and a steal . Wesley Matthews followed with 14 points , three rebounds and three assists . Matthews was next with 14 points , eight rebounds and three assists . Robin Lopez had a near double - double with 11 points , 12 rebounds , one steal and four blocks . C.J . McCollum paced the reserves with 12 points , four rebounds , two assists and a steal . The Trail Blazers are currently in second place in the Western Conference 's Northwest Division , and in possession of the seventh seed in the conference as well . They head to Indiana for a Sunday evening showdown with the Pacers . The Suns were led by a remarkable triple - double from LaMarcus Aldridge , who totaled 19 points , 13 rebounds , seven assists , a steal and a pair of blocks . Wesley Matthews managed 14 points , eight rebounds and three assists . Wesley Matthews managed 14 points , eight rebounds and three assists . Robin Lopez had a near double - double with 11 points , 12 rebounds , two steals and four blocks . C.J . McCollum paced the reserves with 12 points , four rebounds , two assists and a steal . The Trail Blazers remain in second place in the Western Conference 's Northwest Division . They 're home to close out the season against the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday .
The Toronto Raptors ( 19 - 8 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 12 - 17 ) 109 - 79 on Monday at the Amway Center in Orlando . The Raptors got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Magic 23 - 30 in the first quarter alone . The Raptors were the superior shooters in this one , going 49 percent from the field and 26 percent from the three - point line , while the Magic went 41 percent from the floor and just 14 percent from beyond the arc . The Raptors were also able to force the Magic into 19 turnovers , while committing only 10 of their own , which may have been the difference in this game . The Raptors were led by DeMar DeRozan , who went 13 - for - 21 from the field and 1 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 31 points , while also adding five rebounds and four assists . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 32 points and 10 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 20 points and 9 rebounds on the year . Kyle Lowry was able to record a double - double of his own , finishing with 16 points ( 3 - 9 FG , 2 - 7 3Pt , 8 - 8 FT ) and 10 assists . It was his second double - double in the last three games , as he continues to excel as a member of the starting lineup . Jonas Valanciunas had a double - double of his own , finishing with 16 points ( 8 - 15 FG , 0 - 0 FT ) and 13 rebounds . He 's combined for 0 - of - 12 from the field and 0 - for - 8 from the three - point line over his last two games , so it was good to see him get things pointed back in the right direction . Getting the start at shooting guard , Evan Fournier shot 6 - for - 10 from the field and 0 - for - 2 from the three - point line to score 15 points . It was his second strong showing in a row , as he 's combined for 35 points and 21 rebounds over his last two games . Evan Fournier was also a force this game , finishing with 15 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 3 - 3 FT ) , three rebounds and three assists of his own . The Raptors ' next game will be at home against the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday , while the Magic will be at home against the Detroit Pistons on Friday .
The Charlotte Knicks ( 5 - 15 ) defeated the Charlotte Hornets ( 5 - 15 ) 102 - 103 on Friday . Charlotte has won two straight and four of their last five games . They were paced by Carmelo Anthony who scored a game - high 32 points on an efficient 11 - for - 22 shooting from the field . Al Jefferson also had a solid performance , recording 16 points and 13 rebounds in 34 minutes . As a team , the Hornets had just 19 assists to just seven turnovers . Up next , the Hornets will head home Saturday to take on the 76ers , while the Hornets will stay at home to take on the red - hot Cavaliers on Friday . For the Blazers , it was a disappointing loss for the Hornets . The Hornets will continue their road trip in Miami on Tuesday against the Pistons . The Hornets will look to bounce back when they visit the Phoenix Suns ( 11 - 41 ) on Wednesday . Charlotte has lost two straight , and while they have tons of talent on their roster , it looks like the Hornets will be focusing on development this season instead of fighting for a playoff spot . The Hornets have been in a downward spiral since a surprisingly hot start to the season , and is now the coldest team in the NBA . Center Al Jefferson has been sidelined with multiple knee injuries and a drug suspension , which has not helped Charlotte 's weak play in the paint . Even in the face of a losing streak , Kemba Walker has maintained strong play . The point guard scored 11 and dished out four assists on Friday . Charlotte 's next matchup will be against the Brooklyn Nets on Friday .

The San Antonio Spurs defeated the Indiana Pacers , 110 - 106 , at Bankers Life Fieldhouse on Monday . San Antonio were expected to win this game easily , but it took a monster second half to do so . In fact , San Antonio outscored Indiana , 54 - 67 in the second half , while outscored the Pacers by eight in the second quarter . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive , with San Antonio dishing out 18 assists to just 11 turnovers , while Indiana committed 11 turnovers to just nine assists . The Pacers shot 46 percent from the field and 47 percent from three - point range , while holding the Pacers to 49 percent from the field and 45 percent from long range . Kawhi Leonard led Indiana in scoring , as he accumulated 32 points , six rebounds and three assists . Myles Turner was second on the team , finishing with 22 points and six rebounds . Jeff Teague started at point guard and provided 15 points , five rebounds and five assists . Kawhi George was the player of the game , as he collected 32 points , six rebounds , three assists and five steals . LaMarcus Aldridge finished second on the team , amassing 19 points and seven rebounds . Rodney Green and David Lee scored 12 points apiece , while Rodney Mills added nine points a piece . Monta Ellis was a nice spark off the bench , providing 13 points , four assists and two steals . Indiana will look to keep rolling on Friday in a home matchup against the Charlotte Hornets .

They jumped out to a 30 - 18 lead after the first quarter and held the Bulls at a distance the rest of the game . The Bulls shot 43 percent from the field and 29 percent from beyond the arc . While they are traversing one of the rougher parts of their schedule , the depths to which the Bulls have struggled is surprising . The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the Chicago Bulls , 95 - 69 , at United Center on Friday . Fresh off a double - digit home victory over the Bulls ( 13 - 13 ) on Thursday night , the Bucks ( 13 - 12 ) bounced back with an even more dominating effort Friday . Chicago 's offense had no answer for a stifling Milwaukee defense that held them to a season - low scoring total , while also limiting them to a 30 percent success rate from the field . Giannis Antetokounmpo once again proved to be a thorn in the side of the visitors , leading the way with a 22 - point , 11 - assist double - double that also included seven boards , three steals and a block . Jabari Parker could n't come close to his 26 - point effort from Thursday , but he managed 12 points , seven rebounds , an assist and a steal . John Henson and Tony Snell posted a pair of 10 - point efforts , supplemented by four rebounds , a steal and a pair of blocks by Henson , to go along with five rebounds and a pair of dimes from Snell . Greg Monroe came off the bench to tally a 14 - point , 12 - rebound double - double over 23 minutes , while Mirza Teletovic compiled 13 points for the second straight night in a reserve role , and also hauled in eight boards . A nightmarish outing for the Bulls saw Dwyane Wade pace them in scoring with a modest 12 points , which he complemented with five boards , an assist and a steal . Taj Gibson and Robin Lopez posted a pair of eight - point efforts on a combined 7 - of - 20 shooting , although they at least managed 11 boards between them . Jimmy Butler and Rajon Rondo had matching seven - point contributions as well , with the former also supplying seven boards , six assists and a steal , and the latter dishing out four dimes and recording four rebounds . Bobby Portis actually served as the second - leading scorer on the team despite coming off the bench , posting 10 points and eight rebounds in 19 minutes . The Bucks are now off until Tuesday night , when the Cleveland Cavaliers will come calling to the Bradley Center . The Bulls are home again Monday night , when the Detroit Pistons come to town .
The Atlanta Hawks ( 5 - 3 ) defeated the Miami Heat ( 5 - 4 ) 114 - 103 on Tuesday at Philips Arena in Atlanta . The Hawks got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Hawks 35 - 23 right away in the first quarter . The Hawks were the superior shooters in this one , going 56 percent from the field and 39 percent from the three - point line , while the Heat went 47 percent from the floor and a meager 48 percent from beyond the arc . To put the icing on the cake , the Hawks forced the Heat into 14 turnovers , while committing just 13 of their own . The Hawks ' frontcourt was dominant in this game , with Shawne Williams leading the way . He went 8 - for - 11 from the field and 0 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 21 points , while also adding six rebounds and an assist . The points were a new season - high for him , while the double - double was his third since the end of January . The only other player to reach double figures in points was Thabo Sefolosha . He had 12 points ( 4 - 7 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) and six rebounds in 33 minutes . The Hawks ' next game will be at home against the Charlotte Hornets on Friday , while the Heat will be at home against the Charlotte Hornets on Wednesday .
The San Antonio Spurs ( 29 - 6 ) defeated the Houston Rockets ( 16 - 19 ) 121 - 103 on Sunday at the AT & T Center in San Antonio . Quite unexpectedly , the Spurs were able to keep their winning streak alive and extended it to six games in a row Wednesday . After the Spurs came out of the third quarter leading 82 - 77 , the Spurs went on a fourth quarter run , out - scoring the Rockets 25 - 25 . It was n't enough though , as the Rockets could n't keep up with the Spurs strong and were also on the road , winning the second half of a game to home win . The Rockets were the superior shooters in this one , going 52 percent from the field and 54 percent from the three - point line , while the Rockets went just 50 percent from the floor and 41 percent from beyond the arc . The Rockets were also able to force the Rockets into 15 turnovers , while committing only 11 of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Spurs were led by LaMarcus Aldridge , who went off for a team - high of 24 points ( 10 - 16 FG , 4 - 4 FT ) , while also adding 12 rebounds and two blocked shots . It marked his second double - double over his last three games , a stretch where he 's averaging 26 points and 11 rebounds . Coming off the bench , Boris Diaw added 20 points ( 8 - 13 FG , 2 - 2 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) , eight rebounds and two assists , as he was able to stuff the stat sheet against a tough opponent . The Rockets ' next game will be at home against the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday , while the Rockets will be at home against the Memphis Grizzlies on Wednesday .
The Phoenix Suns ( 2 - 0 ) defeated the San Antonio Spurs ( 1 - 1 ) 94 - 89 on Tuesday at the US Airways Center in Phoenix . In a winning effort , the Suns finished the game shooting 40 percent from the field and 11 percent from behind the three - point line . The Suns finished at 40 percent from the field and just 11 percent from deep . The Suns were led by Markieff Morris , who scored 20 points ( 7 - 16 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 6 - 6 FT ) , while grabbing 11 rebounds . Tony Parker had 12 points ( 3 - 15 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 5 - 5 FT ) , two rebounds , six assists , and one steal in 38 minutes . The Suns are now one game behind the Oklahoma City Thunder for the eighth and final playoff spot in the Western Conference . The Spurs , on the other hand , are currently in the eighth spot in the Western Conference standings , as they own just a half game lead over the Oklahoma City Thunder for the eighth and final projected playoff seed in the Western Conference standings . The Suns , on the other hand , are currently the second projected playoff seed in the West , six games back from the Golden State Warriors . The Suns will head to Los Angeles to face the Lakers on Wednesday , while the Suns will travel to Houston to take on the Rockets on Saturday . For the Spurs , it was just a solid performance from the big men . They were led by Markieff Morris , who scored 20 points ( 7 - 11 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 6 - 6 FT ) to go with 11 rebounds , three assists and one block in 30 minutes . Tim Duncan had 16 points ( 6 - 11 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 4 - 6 FT ) , nine rebounds and two blocks in 30 minutes , while Boris Diaw finished with a double - double of 10 points ( 4 - 6 FG ) and six rebounds in 29 minutes . Green , however , struggled with his shot , going 0 - for - 5 from the field and 0 - for - 1 from behind the arc and 6 - for - 6 from the free throw line . The Suns ' next game will be at home against the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday , while the Suns will be at home against the Denver Nuggets on Friday .
The Washington Wizards defeated the Portland Trail Blazers , 125 - 124 , at Moda Center on Saturday . While this appeared to be a blowout at halftime , the Wizards heard something in the locker room that completely turned this game around . Portland took a 70 - 49 lead headed into the half , but they completely collapsed by allowing the Wizards to outscore them , 63 - 42 , in the second half to send it to overtime . Markieff Morris then played hero , as he hit the game - winning shot with 0 seconds left , despite the fact that it appeared he stepped out of bounds prior to the shot . Both offenses were efficient , with Washington shooting 52 percent to Portland 's 51 percent . Fastbreak points was the only noticeable difference in the stat sheet , with the Wizards winning that battle , 15 - 7 . The Wizards ( 41 - 24 ) overcame a huge halftime deficit to send this game to overtime , as this marked their second game in three nights in which they overcame a double - digit halftime deficit . John Wall was fantastic , as he led the team with 39 points , two rebounds and nine assists . Bradley Beal finished second on the team , totaling 26 points and six assists . Marcin Gortat and Markieff Morris each recorded a double - double , combining for 28 points and 26 rebounds . Otto Porter provided 18 points , 10 rebounds and four assists . C.J . Crabbe led the team in scoring off the bench , as he provided 14 points and six rebounds . Marcin Gortat collected 15 points and 15 rebounds .
The Oklahoma City Thunder ( 36 - 13 ) defeated the Houston Rockets ( 25 - 24 ) 116 - 108 in overtime Friday at the Chesapeake Energy Arena in Salt Lake City . The Thunder got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Rockets 22 - 29 in the first quarter alone . The Rockets were the superior shooters in this game , going 48 percent from the field and 42 percent from the three - point line , while the Rockets went just 38 percent from the floor and a meager 23 percent from beyond the arc . To go along with the superior shooting , the Thunder also secured a 57 - 40 rebounding advantage . Kevin Durant had a big game as well . He went 11 - for - 18 from the field and a perfect 9 - for - 9 from the free throw line to score 33 points , while also nearing a triple - double with 12 rebounds and three assists . The Thunder were led by Kevin Durant , who went 11 - for - 18 from the floor and 9 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 33 points , while also adding 12 rebounds and a blocked shot . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 36 points and 24 rebounds over his last two games . He 's now averaging 18 points and 16 rebounds on the season . Dion Waiters was the other player to score in double figures for the Rockets . He went 6 - for - 9 from the field and 2 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score 16 points in 32 minutes . Both Dion Waiters and Dion Waiters reached double figures in points as well with 16 and 16 points respectively . The Rockets ' next game will be at home against the Oklahoma City Thunder on Thursday , while the Rockets will travel to Sacramento to play the Kings on Friday .
The New Orleans Pelicans defeated the Dallas Mavericks , 121 - 118 , at Smoothie King Center on Wednesday . These are two of the hottest teams in the Western Conference right now and New Orleans showed that their season is still alive with this crucial win . It was a tale of two halves , as Dallas took a six - point lead into the locker room , while New Orleans responded by winning the second half , 61 - 37 . Rebounding was key for the Pelicans , as they won that battle , 44 - 23 . The big men of New Orleans dominated in the paint , outscoring the Pelicans , 46 - 26 . The Pelicans ( 32 - 43 ) had a tough task here against one of the best home teams in the league and they fell just shy in this close loss . Anthony Davis carried the load , as he tallied 30 points and 13 rebounds on 11 - of - 21 shooting . Harrison Barnes also had one of his best games of the season , totaling 19 points and eight rebounds . Jrue Holiday was the only other Pelican in double figures , as he collected 18 points , five rebounds and seven assists . The only other starter in double figures was Wesley Matthews , who dropped 10 points to accompany three rebounds and to assists . The Pelicans will host the Boston Celtics on Sunday for their next game . The Pelicans ( 32 - 43 ) have been one of the best teams in the league across the last two months , as this win marks their 10th home win in 15 tries . DeMarcus Cousins led the way for New Orleans , as he accumulated 29 points , 16 rebounds and four blocks in the win . Jrue Holiday was second on the team , finishing with 18 points , five rebounds and seven assists . DeMarcus Cousins accumulated 29 points , 16 rebounds and six assists .

The Toronto Raptors ( 1 - 1 ) defeated the Indiana Pacers ( 1 - 1 ) 98 - 87 on Tuesday at Bankers Life Fieldhouse in Indianapolis . Despite being outrebounded 44 to 44 , the Raptors were able to force the Pacers into 32 turnovers , which allowed them to finish with the victory . As a team , the Raptors shot 44 percent from the field and 28 percent from the three - point line , while the Pacers shot 41 percent from the field and 20 percent from beyond the arc . Despite out - rebounding the Raptors 33 - 44 , the Raptors were forced into 13 turnovers , which may have been the difference in an otherwise evenly played game . The Raptors received a huge contribution from center Jonas Valanciunas , who scored a season - high 23 points , to go along with 15 rebounds . It was his second double - double in the last three games , as he continues to excel as a member of the starting lineup . Jonas Valanciunas scored 23 points ( 10 - 18 FG , 3 - 4 FT ) and grabbed 15 rebounds . It was his thirteenth double - double of the season and third straight game with at least 18 rebounds . Valanciunas shot 10 - for - 18 from the field and 0 - for - 0 from beyond the arc to score 23 points . The Raptors ' next game will be on the road against the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday , while the Pacers will be at home against the Chicago Bulls on Friday .

In a battle between two teams battling for a playoff spot , the more experienced team went on a late run to cap off a big road win . In fact , the Rockets finished the game on a 28 - 8 run to open things up and win comfortably . They actually led for the majority of the game , as Houston 's only lead lasted less than two minutes in the second quarter . Shooting was the big difference in the game , with Houston hitting 51 percent of their shots , while 10 - of - 39 from the free - throw line . Defensive rebounding was decisive as well , with Houston winning that battle , 12 - 5 . The Rockets ( 49 - 24 ) had to play this game without DeMar DeRozan ( ankle ) , as they simply did n't have enough bullets to beat this hungry Rockets team . Nikola Jokic did all he could for Denver , as he led the team with 22 points and 13 rebounds . Will Barton was huge off the bench , providing 24 points , seven rebounds , eight assists and a steal . Gary Harris was second on the team , as he accrued 14 points , six rebounds and three assists off the bench . Clint Capela led the bench , as he provided 14 points and four rebounds . Trevor Ariza was the only other starter in double figures , totaling 14 points , four rebounds and three assists . Eric Gordon led the bench in scoring , providing 18 points and three assists . On deck for Houston is a home matchup against the Sacramento Kings on Wednesday . James Harden led the way for Houston , as he collected 39 points , seven rebounds , 11 assists and four steals . Will Barton was second on the team , scoring 24 points off the bench . Will Barton was also huge off the bench , providing 24 points and eight rebounds . The Nuggets have a quick turnaround , as they host the Houston Rockets on Thursday for their next game . Scola was right behind him with a season - high 30 points and which he supplemented with three rebounds , an assist and a block . The Portland Trail Blazers ( 17 - 4 ) defeated the Detroit Pistons ( 3 - 19 ) 98 - 86 in a nail - biter on Friday . There were a ton of swings in this game and it came down to a 22 - point fourth quarter for the Trail Blazers to runaway with a win . The statistics indicate a Pistons victory , as they shot 35 percent from the field and under 23 percent from three - point range . The Blazers have one of the best defenses in the NBA and the Pistons have one of the worst offenses , so this was simply a mismatch of epic proportions . The Trail Blazers were once again led by superstar LaMarcus Aldridge , as he tallied 23 points , 10 rebounds , two steals and two blocks in the loss . Andre Drummond also had a nice game in just 30 minutes of play , as he recorded 10 points and 15 rebounds in the victory . The only other player in double figures was Andre Drummond , as he totaled 10 points and 15 rebounds . The only other starter in double figures was Andre Drummond , who totaled 10 points and 15 rebounds . Chris Lillard had a nice all - around game as well , as he accumulated 14 points , five rebounds and seven assists in the win . Up next for the Trail Blazers is a date with the Oklahoma City Thunder on Monday . The Trail Blazers got some great performances from their studs here , but it was one again the defense that let them down . Not only did they allow 98 points , they allowed Portland to shoot 53 percent from the field . Greg Monroe recorded a double - double off the bench , as he scored 22 points to go along with 10 rebounds . The Trail Blazers will look to keep this going against the Boston Celtics on Tuesday .

The San Antonio Spurs ( 52 - 15 ) defeated the Portland Trail Blazers ( 30 - 37 ) 106 - 110 on Sunday at the AT & T Center in San Antonio . The Spurs got out to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Spurs 29 - 29 right away in the first quarter . They were the superior shooters as well , going 48 percent from the field and 42 percent from the three - point line , while the Trail Blazers went 48 percent from the floor and 42 percent from deep . What really made the difference though was turnovers . The Spurs forced the Spurs into 11 turnovers , while committing just 14 of their own . The Spurs were led by the duo of Kawhi Leonard and CJ McCollum . McCollum went 8 - for - 16 from the field and 2 - for - 2 from the three - point line to score 26 points , while also adding four rebounds . He 's now averaging 19 points and 9 rebounds on the year . LaMarcus Aldridge recorded a double - double of his own , finishing with 19 points ( 9 - 24 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 1 - 1 FT ) , seven rebounds and four assists . He 's had a strong stretch of three games where he 's averaging 34 points and 10 rebounds , both of which are higher than his season averages up until this point . Jusuf Nurkic chipped in with 16 points ( 7 - 18 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 2 - 5 FT ) and nine rebounds , while Patty Mills chipped in 13 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 3 - 8 3Pt ) and three rebounds off the bench . The Trail Blazers ' next game will be on the road against the Utah Jazz on Friday , while the Spurs will be at home against the Indiana Pacers on Friday .
The Portland Trail Blazers ( 32 - 37 ) defeated the Miami Heat ( 34 - 36 ) 115 - 104 on Sunday . The game was a testament to the perseverance and marksmanship of the visiting Heat , who shook off a 29 - 29 first - quarter explosion by the Heat that had the home crowd buzzing . Miami returned the favor by incredibly doubling up Miami in the second period , 24 - 22 , on the strength of a barrage of three - point shots . While the Blazers did an excellent job of completely taking Hassan Whiteside to the second straight game , the veteran big man also hauled in 13 boards to secure the victory . Miami remains in third place in the Eastern Conference 's Southeast Division , and is slotted in the sixth seed as well . They head to New Orleans to face the Pelicans on Friday .
The New York Knicks defeated the Houston Rockets , 107 - 102 , at Toyota Center on Friday . This was a matchup full of stars and none of them disappointed . There was an NBA record tied in this game , as there were 88 combined three - point attempts . There were eight ties and 18 lead changes in total , with neither team leading by more than 24 points . New York actually dominated the shooting , as they outshot Houston from the field , from three - point range and from the free - throw line . Rebounding was the glaring difference for the Rockets , as they won that battle , 45 - 42 . James Harden added another triple - double to his tally , accumulating 24 points , seven rebounds and 10 assists . Kristaps Porzingis also scored 24 points , adding 14 rebounds to his tally . Terrence Jones got the start for Dwight Howard and led the team with 18 points and nine rebounds on 8 - of - 12 shooting . Clint Capela recorded a double - double , totaling 16 points and 14 rebounds . Carmelo Anthony did all he could for the Rockets , accruing 24 points , seven rebounds , 10 assists and three steals . Clint Capela recorded a double - double , amassing 16 points and 14 rebounds . Langston Galloway and Marcus Thornton were the only bench players in double figures , as they scored 12 a piece . On deck for the Rockets is a home matchup against the New Orleans Pelicans on Sunday . The Rockets ( 5 - 9 ) have been one of the best teams in the league across the last two months , as this win marks their 10th home win in 14 tries . James Harden led the way for Houston , as he accumulated 24 points , seven rebounds and 10 assists . Terrence Jones recorded a double - double off the bench , totaling 18 points and nine rebounds . Terrence Jones was a huge spark off the bench , totaling 18 points , nine rebounds and four blocks . New York will look to keep rolling against the Dallas Mavericks on Tuesday .
The Miami Heat defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves , 113 - 113 , at American Airlines Arena on Monday . The recent form of these teams would indicate a Minnesota blowout , but that simply was n't the case in this close - fought battle . A 29 - 0 run spanning between the second and third quarter was the decisive stretch , as that swung a double - digit lead for the Timberwolves into a 12 - point lead for the Timberwolves . Despite there being just three ties and three lead changes , neither team led by more than 13 points , as it was a single - digit margin for well over 100 minutes . Three-point shooting was the difference in the game , with Minnesota going 8 - of - 25 from long distance , while Minnesota went just 11 - of - 31 . The Heat also dominated the rebounding , winning that battle , 38 - 34 . Andrew Wiggins led Minnesota in scoring , as he dropped 27 points on 11 - of - 23 shooting . Andrew Wiggins was the only other starter in double figures , as he totaled 27 points and four rebounds . Karl-Anthony Towns dominated down low , as he collected 19 points and 13 rebounds on 8 - of - 14 from the field . Ricky Rubio accrued 14 points and 13 assists , but did commit six turnovers . The Timberwolves ( 19 - 33 ) have been dominant at home this season , but this was a devastating loss in a game they were supposed to win . Karl-Anthony Towns was the player of the game , as he accumulated 35 points , eight rebounds , two steals and three blocks in the defeat . Ricky Rubio was second on the team , as he accrued 14 points , three rebounds and 13 assists . Gorgui Dieng amassed 13 points , seven rebounds and three blocks . Rodney McGruder got the start for Kris Dunn and provided 11 points , four rebounds and five assists .
The Los Angeles Clippers ( 37 - 25 ) defeated the Chicago Bulls ( 31 - 31 ) 101 - 91 on Friday at the United Center in Chicago . While they were up just two points at the break , the Clippers used a strong second half , where they out - scored the Bulls 60 - 52 , to steal a road win in Chicago . The Clippers were the superior shooters in this one , going 48 percent from the field and 24 percent from the three - point line , while the Bulls went 42 percent from the floor and 35 percent from deep . What really made the difference though was turnovers . The Clippers forced the Bulls into 19 turnovers , while committing just 15 of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Clippers were led by Jamal Crawford , who went 10 - for - 17 from the field and 2 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score 25 points , while also grabbing two rebounds . It was a season - high in points for Crawford and a nice surprise of the season . Jamal Crawford also had a big game off the bench as well , posting 25 points ( 10 - 17 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt , 3 - 3 FT ) , two assists and two steals in 26 minutes . He 's really stepped up his game in the absence of Jamal Crawford , as Carter-Williams is averaging 18 points and 5 rebounds over his last three games . J.J. Redick was also a solid contributor , finishing with 13 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 1 - 5 3Pt ) and three assists . It was far - and - away his best game of the year so far , as it marked a new season - high in points , along with being his first double - double of the year . He 's averaging just 5 points and seven rebounds on the year . J.J. Redick was able to notch a double - double of his own with 13 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 1 - 5 3Pt ) and eight assists . J.J. Redick was the only other player to score more than 12 points for the Bulls . He went 6 - for - 12 from the field and 1 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score 13 points in 30 minutes . The Clippers ' next game will be on the road against the Detroit Pistons on Tuesday , while the Bulls will travel to Los Angeles to play the Clippers on Wednesday .

Shooting was the glaring difference , with the Sixers shooting 43 percent to the Pistons 33 percent . Philadelphia also took care of the glass , winning the rebounding battle , 42 - 51 . It was n't just the rebounding , as the Sixers outscored the Pistons , 70 - 26 , in the paint . The Sixers ( 16 - 52 ) have really struggled recently , but they 're still playing as hard as anyone . The San Antonio Spurs defeated the Dallas Mavericks , 116 - 90 , at AT & T Center on Tuesday . The Spurs ( 42 - 8 ) came into Wednesday 's contest looking to keep their faint playoff hopes alive and to complete a season sweep of the Mavericks ( 28 - 25 ) . Given that they 'd blasted Dallas by 50 points in their most recent meeting , it appeared the chances for another win were high . The hosts had other plans , though , as they jumped out to a 54 - 48 halftime lead . However , led by a superb bench effort from Kawhi Leonard , who managed a near double - double with 23 points , nine assists , two rebounds and a block . As a team , the Spurs shot a stellar 51 percent from the field , including 11 - of - 27 from three - point range . However , they also committed 15 turnovers and forced 15 turnovers from the Mavericks while limiting them to a paltry 20 percent success rate from long range . Kawhi Leonard led the way for the Spurs with 23 points , two rebounds , one assist and one block . LaMarcus Aldridge followed with 14 points , 10 boards , two assists , two steals and two blocks . This sort of performance exemplifies which directions these two franchises are going right now and Utah has a great sign to build off this win . They 'll look to bounce - back against the Denver Nuggets on Sunday in their next scheduled game . The Jazz shot 53 percent from the field and made 16 - of - 23 from three - point range . The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the Indiana Pacers , 109 - 105 , at Wells Fargo Center on Wednesday . The Sixers ( 1 - 7 ) had taken the Pacers ( 4 - 5 ) to the limit just two nights prior before succumbing in overtime , 122 - 115 . However , their second consecutive foray into an extra period against Indiana went much better , culminating in Philadelphia 's first victory of the season . Joel Embiid led the way by playing a game - high 26 minutes and posting 25 points , seven rebounds , two assists and a block . The impressive third - year man helped spearhead a sizable advantage for the Sixers down low , as they outrebounded the Pacers by a 54 - 40 margin . Indiana was led by Paul George , who despite leaving the game in the first half temporarily with a left thumb sprain , totaled 26 points , nine rebounds , four assists and two steals . Miles , who drew the start at shooting guard , turned in 12 points , four rebounds , an assist and a steal . The Washington Wizards defeated the Indiana Pacers , 111 - 98 , at Bankers Life Fieldhouse on Thursday evening . The Pacers ( 29 - 28 ) came in to Tuesday 's contest hoping to snap a five - game losing streak , but were also running on fumes after two games in the previous three nights . Fatigue may have played a role in the first half , as the Wizards ( 34 - 21 ) built a 62 - 52 lead by halftime . The second half was much tighter , but Washington eventually pulled away on the strength of a highly productive night for their starting five . All first unit members hit double digits in the scoring column , and the Wizards managed to shoot 52 percent from the field overall , as well as a superb 52 percent on their 29 shots from behind the arc . Otto Porter , Jr. led the way with 25 points , eight rebounds , two assists and one block . Markieff Morris managed 21 points , seven rebounds , two assists and two steals . John Wall followed with a trademark double - double , posting 20 points , 12 assists , two rebounds , two blocks and one steal . Bradley Beal was right behind with 19 points , four assists , three rebounds and one steal . Marcin Gorat contributed 12 points seven rebounds and one steal . The Wizards resume post - All - Star - break play in Philadelphia against the Sixers on Friday , February 24th , while the Pacers kick off the second half of their season on the same night at home against the Memphis Grizzlies .
The Los Angeles Clippers ( 3 - 1 ) defeated the Houston Rockets ( 1 - 3 ) 128 - 95 on Tuesday . The Clippers pulled off an impressive upset over a struggling Rockets team thanks to some depth and good defense . The biggest discrepancy in the game were the bench points , as the Clippers bench outscored the Rockets bench 44 - 30 in the victory , which was a much more lopsided number until a late hot - streak from Jason Terry . Los Angeles also held Houston to 41 percent shooting from the field and 43 percent from the free - throw line . The Clippers won nearly every game in the stat sheet , as they outassisted the Rockets by 18 and held them to under 50 percent shooting in the win . They also recorded 27 assists on 51 made baskets and outrebounded them 51 to 47 . The big difference was the rebounding though , as Los Angeles brought down 51 boards to the Rockets 47 . This marks Houston 's seventh loss in their last 12 games and they continue to lose bodies as well . Eight players scored in double figures , with Jason Terry leading the team with 16 points off the bench . Houston will have to play the Los Angeles Lakers on Friday in their next game . Los Angeles had to play this game without arguably their two best players , but this type of performance shows how talented their depth can be . Dwight Howard had one of the best games of his career , as he accumulated 18 points , eight rebounds and two assists in the loss . Chris Paul also had another solid game , as he tallied 15 points , 12 assists and four rebounds in the win . Up next for the Clippers is a matchup with the New Orleans Pelicans on Monday .

The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Detroit Pistons , 128 - 96 , at Quicken Loans Arena on Thursday . The Cleveland-Golden State matchup is always one of the showcase games of the year and that ended up being the case in this Christmas Day classic . Despite Detroit leading for the first 60 minutes , this game was close throughout , as there were eight ties and eight lead changes , with neither team leading by more than 13 points . The host Los Angeles Lakers took down the Minnesota Timberwolves on Friday , 130 - 119 . Friday also marked the unveiling of Los Angeles 's new Shaquille O'Neal statue . Los Angeles ( 21 - 51 ) snapped a six - game losing streak on Friday , though it may not have been in their best interest . LA will lose its draft pick if it falls outside of the top three , and the Phoenix Suns remain on the Lakers ' tail for the second - worst record in the NBA . Still , there was a lot to like on Friday for Lakers fans . Guard Jordan Clarkson had a career - high 35 points while shooting 8 - of - 10 from three - point range . It was the team 's first overtime game of the season , and they seemed to respond well to the extra period . LA outscored Minnesota 29 - 10 in overtime , immediately establishing an eight - point advantage at the start of the OT . The team finished with staggering shooting splits of 52 percent from the field , 61 percent from three - point range , and 86 percent form the line . Minnesota ( 28 - 43 ) , meanwhile , extended its own losing streak to four games . While production from the starting five was solid , the Timberwolves struggled once again with finding points off the bench . The team saw just 23 bench points versus 39 from LA . There was no issue for Minny 's starters , though , as third - year forward Andrew Wiggins exploded for an efficient 36 points . Reigning Rookie of the Year Karl-Anthony Towns recorded a double - double with 25 points and 13 rebounds , and point guard Ricky Rubio had 19 points while dishing out a whopping 15 assists . The Timberwolves will visit Portland on Sunday , while LA will host the Blazers on Sunday .

The Spurs came out firing in this game , out - scoring the Hornets 24 - 24 in the first quarter alone . The Spurs were the superior shooters in this game , going 40 percent from the field and 38 percent from the three - point line , while the Hornets went just 40 percent from the floor and 19 percent from deep . The Spurs had three players reach the 34 - point plateau in this game . LaMarcus Aldridge led the way , going 5 - for - 9 from the field and 5 - for - 6 from the free throw line to score 15 points , while also adding 11 rebounds and a blocked shot . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 39 points and 26 rebounds over his last two games . It was the first time he 's reached double figures in points since the beginning of November , so the added minutes really helped him get things going . The only other Wizard to reach double - digit points was Roy Hibbert , who came off the bench for 15 points ( 6 - 6 FG , 3 - 4 FT ) , 10 rebounds and two blocked shots . The Spurs ' next game will be on the road against the Brooklyn Nets on Wednesday , while the Hornets will travel to Houston to play the Rockets on Wednesday .
The Oklahoma City Thunder defeated the New Orleans Pelicans 101 - 92 Wednesday at Smoothie King Center . The Thunder ( 13 - 8 ) were once again led by their fearless leader Russell Westbrook , who put together another 21 - point performance with 28 points , 17 rebounds and four assists in just 38 minutes . Davis was also effective , shooting 14 - of - 32 from the field overall and 0 - of - 1 from behind the arc . The Thunder , as a unit , did n't shoot efficiently from both the field and behind the arc , as they shot 21 percent from behind the arc . For the Pelicans ( 7 - 14 ) , they 've now dropped two straight games after rattling off three straight victories , as the absence of Nikola Jokic ( hip ) has really taken a tole on this team . His replacement , Steven Asik , who has struggled early in the season , scored just seven points ( 2 - 5 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 1 - 1 FT ) to go with five rebounds , two blocks , and one assist in 37 minutes . Russell Westbrook led the way , going 10 - for - 23 from the field and 2 - for - 8 from the three - point line for 28 points . He also posted 6 - of - 9 from the free - throw line . The third - year forward was able to record a triple - double , as Victor Oladipo finished the game with 28 points and 12 rebounds . Enes Kanter was the only other player in double figures for the Pelicans , as he had 17 points to go along with 10 rebounds . Andre Roberson had a double - double of his own with 13 points and 5 rebounds .
The Detroit Pistons ( 19 - 16 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 19 - 16 ) 115 - 89 on Wednesday at the Amway Center in Orlando . The Pistons got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Magic 31 - 23 right away in the first quarter . Along with the quick start , the Pistons also shot much better , going 49 percent from the field and 47 percent from the three - point line , while the Magic went 44 percent from the floor and 30 percent from beyond the arc . The Pistons were led by the duo of Kentavious Caldwell-Pope and Kentavious Caldwell-Pope . Caldwell-Pope went 7 - for - 12 from the field and 5 - for - 8 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 21 points , while also adding two assists . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to be , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 26 points and 10 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 26 points and 11 rebounds on the season . Victor Oladipo was another player with a solid showing . He did n't have his best shooting performance on the season ( 7 - 11 FG , 1 - 1 3Pt , 3 - 3 FT ) , but he still finished with 18 points , as he was able to get to the free throw line at a high rate . In the two games since returning from the All-Star break , he 's combined for 16 points and 7 assists . Tobias Harris was the third Pistons starter to reach double figures , as he posted 11 points ( 4 - 7 FG , 2 - 2 FT ) and three rebounds over 33 minutes . The Pistons ' next game will be on the road against the Miami Heat on Wednesday , while the Magic will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Wednesday .
The Orlando Magic ( 2 - 3 ) defeated the Sacramento Kings ( 2 - 4 ) on Tuesday by a score of 102 - 94 at the Moda Center in Sacramento . The Kings maintained control of the game from the opening tip , outscoring the Kings 23 - 29 in the first quarter and never looking back . The effort was led by Evan Fournier 's 29 points ( 10 - 15 FG , 3 - 7 3Pt , 6 - 7 FT ) , and NIkola Gay 's 16 points ( 6 - 13 FG , 2 - 5 FT ) . While it was really an all - around effort from the Kings , who saw 14 players score in this game , including 13 from Orlando . The Kings were led by DeMarcus Cousins , who put up 33 points ( 12 - 20 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 8 - 9 FT ) , to go along with seven rebounds , four assists , two steals and one block . The Kings have now lost two in a row , and have another tough game ahead on Saturday when they take on the Portland Trail Blazers on the road . Sacramento got some solid production from their bench , with both Aaron Gordon and Serge Ibaka reaching double figures in points . Green finished with 13 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 2 - 3 FT ) , 10 rebounds , three assists , one steal and one block in 31 minutes , while Nikola Gay produced 17 points ( 6 - 13 FG , 1 - 6 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) to go with three rebounds and one block in 33 minutes . The Magic 's next game will be on the road against the Golden State Warriors on Wednesday , while the Kings will be at home against the Golden State Warriors on Thursday .

The Pistons came into this game with a 5 - 5 road record and played well in this dominant game . They held the Hawks to just 36 percent from the field and 25 percent from three - point range , while the Hawks shot 36 percent from the field and only 25 percent from deep . The Pistons were led by the duo of Kentavious Caldwell-Pope and Dennis Schroder . Schroder finished with 17 points ( 7 - 13 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 2 - 3 FT ) and 11 assists , while Harris added 18 points ( 8 - 13 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt ) and nine rebounds . Tobias Harris had a huge game off the bench , shooting 8 - for - 13 from the field and 2 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score 18 points . He also chipped in seven rebounds , two assists and two blocked shots . Dennis Schroder was very efficient as well , going 7 - for - 13 from the field and 1 - for - 2 from the three - point line to score 17 points . He 's now combined for 37 points , seven rebounds and five assists in the past two days . The Boston Celtics defeated the New York Knicks , 115 - 87 , at Madison Square Garden on Sunday . The recent form of these teams would indicate an easy Knicks win , but the Celtics had other ideas . This game was close throughout , as there were nine ties and seven lead changes , with neither team leading by more than 11 points . Rebounding was the difference in the game , with Boston winning that battle , 53 - 57 . They also dominated the assist - to - turnover ratio , recording 10 more assists and committing three less turnovers . Isaiah Thomas led New York , as he tallied 29 points and four assists . Kristaps Porzingis finished with 14 points and six rebounds . Kristaps Porzingis also scored 14 points , adding seven rebounds to his tally . Marcus Holiday went just 5 - of - 13 from the field , but finished with 12 points , six rebounds and nine assists . Isaiah Thomas led the Celtics in scoring , as he accrued 29 points and four assists . Avery Bradley finished second on the team , totaling 15 points and six rebounds . Joakim Noah recorded a double - double , totaling nine points , 10 rebounds , two assists and three blocks . The Knicks ( 3 - 5 ) have been one of the surprises of the season and a comeback road win here just adds to their impressive resume ' . Isaiah Thomas continued his great form , as he accumulated 29 points , three rebounds and four assists . Kelly Olynyk was second on the team , as he dropped 19 points on 6 - of - 11 shooting off the bench . Kristaps Porzingis led the starters , as he scored 14 points to go along with six rebounds .

The Clippers were able to exploit the Hornets defensive breakdowns which eventually led to a 20 points blowout win . Los Angeles burst out the gate and opened up a 28 point lead by the end of the second quarter . DeAndre Jordan was a force on the glass and proved to be the difference maker for the Clippers , as he finished with 20 points and 19 rebounds , while Chris Paul had a double - double with 15 points and 17 assists . Jeremy Lamb played well off the bench , logging 19 points on 5 - of - 10 shooting , including 1 - of - 3 from behind the arc . Rookie Frank Kaminsky added 16 points , five rebounds and four assists in 28 minutes off the bench . Frank Kaminsky got the start at power forward and contributed 16 points , five rebounds and four assists on 5 - of - 13 shooting . Frank Kaminsky III continued his strong play as of late , scoring 16 points on 5 - of - 13 shooting . Up next , the Clippers will stay home Wednesday to take on the Trail Blazers , while the Hornets will stay at home to go up against the Kings on Wednesday . Charlotte has been trading wins and losses like coin flips over their last eight games , going 2 - 2 in that stretch . Both teams have played well in Staples Center as well , as they 'll face off against the Golden State Warriors on Saturday .

They now head to Atlanta to take on the Hawks on Wednesday . Portland was led by a pair of 18 - point efforts from the backcourt duo of Damian Conley and Mike Conley . Harkless was next with 18 points , seven rebounds , a steal and two blocks . The Grizzlies remain in fourth place in the Western Conference 's Northwest Division , and are 10 games behind the eighth - seeded Dallas Mavericks . They head to Sacramento to take on the Kings on Sunday night .

The Denver Nuggets ( 11 - 14 ) defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves ( 9 - 15 ) 112 - 100 on Monday . The New Year 's Eve showdown between the two Central Division rivals was atypical in a number of ways . To begin with , one of the rarest sights in the NBA this season , a Nuggets road victory , came to pass , and against a quality opponent to boot . The Timberwolves had entered Thursday 's contest sporting an impressive 7 - 3 home record and playing quality basketball overall . Meanwhile , Denver 's Big Three of Karl-Anthony Towns , Andrew Wiggins and Andrew Wiggins combined for 57 points , and Denver proved to be too much for the visitors to handle . Minnesota was once again led by Andrew Wiggins , who tallied 23 points , five assists , a rebound and two steals . Zach LaVine was next with 20 points , four rebounds , five assists , a steal and a block . Danilo Gallinari followed with 15 points , three rebounds and five assists . Will Barton was productive in a reserve role as well , tallying 14 points , seven rebounds and five assists . The Timberwolves remain in third place in the Western Conference 's Northwest Division , and are 11 games behind the eighth - seeded Dallas Mavericks . They head to Minnesota to take on the Timberwolves on Monday night . Denver was paced by Kenneth Faried , who supplied a 19 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included an assist and three blocks . Zach LaVine supplied 20 points , five rebounds , five assists , a steal and a block . Danilo Gallinari registered 15 points , three rebounds and five assists . Will Barton ( 14 points , seven rebounds , five assists ) and Joffrey Lauvergne ( 11 points , seven rebounds , an assist and a block ) were highly productive in reserve roles . The Timberwolves head back home to face the Portland Trail Blazers on Tuesday evening , while the Timberwolves remain home to face the Oklahoma City Thunder on Tuesday evening .
The Golden State Warriors ( 4 - 2 ) defeated the Memphis Grizzlies ( 2 - 4 ) by a score of 108 - 95 on Saturday night . The Grizzlies handed the Grizzlies their 11th straight loss to their hometown rivals and earned their 50th win of the season . Doc Rivers opted to rest Wesley Johnson , Brandon Bogut and Austin Rivers with the playoffs around the corner , but also got a slight scare when Jeff Green exited the game with a right knee contusion , initial reports suggest he will be available for the Warriors next game on Wednesday . The tough half was a bit more relaxed for the Grizzlies , as they did not have enough spring left in their legs , as they shot just 37 percent from the field and were out - rebounded 43 - 43 . Memphis was unable to successfully defend their homecourt against the Warriors on Friday . Most teams have been unable to do that this year but few would 've expected the laugher that ensued when these two teams matched up . Harrison Barnes was the only other Memphis starter to reach double - digits , adding a team - high 13 points . The Grizzlies will look to bounce back when they host the Houston Rockets ( 19 - 27 ) on Saturday . Stephen Curry led all scorers with 32 points to go along with six rebounds and 10 assists in 39 minutes . He shot 11 - of - 25 from the field and 8 - of - 2 from the free - throw line . Draymond Green recorded a double - double with 16 points and 12 rebounds , along with two assists and a blocked shot . The Golden State Warriors ( 3 - 0 ) defeated the Jrue Holiday ( 10 - 10 ) , 123 - 100 , on Tuesday at the Air Canada Centre to advance to the Eastern Conference Finals . The Warriors had a chance to bounce back on their home court to extend the series on Thursday , but the Warriors bounced back with a convincing 19 - point victory in front of their home crowd in the game . They were the superior shooters in this one , going 40 percent from the field and 34 percent from the three - point line , while the Pelicans finished at 51 percent from the floor and 29 percent from deep . What really made the difference though was turnovers . The Warriors forced the Pelicans into 17 turnovers , while committing just 10 of their own . The Warriors were led by their superstar backcourt of Stephen Curry and Tyreke Thompson . Curry went 10 - for - 29 from the field and 7 - for - 18 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 40 points , while also adding nine assists and two blocked shots . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's now combined for 71 points in his last two outings . The only other Pelican to reach double figures in points was Norris Cole , who came off the bench to score 16 points ( 7 - 10 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt ) in 26 minutes . The Warriors ' next game will be on the road against the Dallas Mavericks on Wednesday , while the Jrue Los Blazers will be at home against the Brooklyn Nets on Friday .

The Raptors , on the other hand , have lost eight of their last ten games , but sit tied for the third projected playoff seed with the Chicago Bulls in the Eastern Conference standings . The Trail Blazers had seven players reach double figures in points . LaMarcus Aldridge led the way , going 10 - for - 19 from the field and 3 - for - 5 from the free throw line to score 23 points , while also adding 13 rebounds and a blocked shot . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 53 points and 9 rebounds over his last two games . It was the first time he 's reached double figures in points since the beginning of November , so the added minutes really helped him get things going . The only other Wizard to reach double - digit points was Terrence Ross , who came off the bench for 12 points ( 5 - 15 FG , 2 - 6 3Pt ) and five rebounds . The Trail Blazers ' next game will be on the road against the Golden State Warriors on Wednesday , while the Raptors will travel to Utah to play the Jazz on Monday .
The Atlanta Hawks ( 25 - 8 ) defeated the Portland Trail Blazers ( 26 - 8 ) 115 - 107 on Wednesday at the Moda Center in Atlanta . The Trail Blazers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Trail Blazers 29 - 20 in the first quarter alone . They also shot better in this game , going 51 percent from the field and 35 percent from the three - point line , while the Trail Blazers went 45 percent from the floor and 39 percent from beyond the arc . The Hawks were also able to force the Trail Blazers into 18 turnovers , while committing only 14 of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Hawks were led by a big game from LaMarcus Aldridge , who went 14 - for - 25 from the field and 2 - for - 0 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 30 points , while also adding 12 rebounds and two blocked shots . It was his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's combined for 8 points , 13 rebounds and 8 assists per game . Thabo Sefolosha also had a double - double with 13 points ( 3 - 4 FG , 1 - 1 3Pt , 6 - 6 FT ) , 12 rebounds and three steals . The only other player to reach double figures in points was Kyle Korver . He went 5 - for - 11 from the field and 4 - for - 9 from the three - point line to score 14 points in 36 minutes . The Hawks ' next game will be at home against the Memphis Grizzlies on Friday , while the Trail Blazers will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Wednesday .
The New York Knicks ( 4 - 5 ) defeated the Charlotte Hornets ( 4 - 4 ) 93 - 95 on Friday . New York was coming off a 117 - 97 loss to the Denver Nuggets on Friday , but they finished their three - game road trip with a win to give them two of out three on the trip . Carmelo Anthony scored a game - high 29 points . New York has won two straight and seven of their last eight . Jeremy Lin has been dealing with a sore left foot but was able to play and start . He recorded 17 points and three assists in 21 minutes . Marvin Williams has been dealing with hand and finger injuries all season but still manages to make the lineup on most nights . He sat out Tuesday night against the Golden State Warriors but was able to give it a go against the Hornets . He had five points , two rebounds and three assists in 28 minutes . Carmelo Anthony ( knee ) is expected to miss at least another two weeks . The Hornets will continue their road trip in Phoenix against the Suns on Wednesday . Charlotte has lost two straight , and with Al Jefferson ( groin ) expected to miss at least the next four weeks , it 's getting hard to find reasons to think the Hornets could climb back into the playoff conversation this season . Lance Thomas ( pelvic ) has started to do some work in practice but is n't considered too close to returning . Most of Charlotte 's options in the frontcourt right now are underwhelming , but Kristaps Porzingis left the game with a sprained ankle and did not return . The Knicks will look to shake off this loss on Friday when they hosts the Clippers .

The Warriors dominated in nearly every category , as they recorded more turnovers , assists , blocks and steals than the Sixers . It was a relatively clean game played all - around though , as there were only 32 combined turnovers between both teams . However , John Wall and the Wizards were unable to find free rhythm and finished the game shooting 48 percent from the field . The Wizards were led by Chris Wall , who put together a great performance . The Toronto Raptors defeated the Detroit Pistons , 109 - 90 , at Air Canada Centre on Wednesday . The Pistons ( 0 - 1 ) invested heavily into their star two - guard DeMar DeRozan in the offseason , inking the 27 - year old to a five - year , $ 139 million contract . He began paying immediate dividends on that hefty sum Wednesday , tallying a game - high 40 points and adding four rebounds , an assist and a steal . While the stellar showing was n't necessarily a surprise from a player of his caliber , the fact that Jonas Valanciunas , and not Kyle Lowry , checked in as Toronto 's second - leading scorer was a tad more unexpected . The veteran big man dominated in his showdown with Andre Drummond , posting a 32 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included an assist . The dominant Raptors , which outscored Detroit in every quarter , did n't need much else , with Lowry the only other player to hit double digits on the scoreboard . The Pistons ( 0 - 1 ) were led by Tobias Harris ' 22 points , which he supplemented with five rebounds , an assist and a steal . Marcus Morris supplied a near double - double with 17 points , nine boards , three assists and a steal , but struggled from long range , draining only a pair of his eight three - point attempts . Drummond tallied 16 points , six rebounds and a steal , while the starting backcourt of Ish Smith and Kentavious Caldwell-Pope only managed 10 combined points on 5 - for - 23 shooting .

The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the Detroit Pistons , 97 - 79 , at Palace of Auburn Hills on Sunday . The Sixers ( 6 - 18 ) came in to the contest short - handed , as Joel Embiid was given the night off to tend to elbow inflammation , while starting point guard Sergio Rodriguez sat out with an illness . That opened the door for Jahlil Okafor and T.J. McConnell to enter the starting five , and both parlayed their opportunities into highly productive performances . McConnell came within an assist of a triple - double , tallying 12 points , 10 rebounds and nine assists , while also adding three steals . Meanwhile , Okafor stepped up with 14 points , nine rebounds , an assist , two blocks and a steal . The two players combined to go 12 - of - 18 from the field , and the Sixers shot an outstanding 56 percent from the field overall , keying what was only their second road win of the season . Robert Covington actually led Philadelphia in scoring , posting 16 points , seven rebounds , two assists , two steals and a block . Ersan Ilyasova was right behind with 15 points , eight boards and a pair of steals . Nik Stauskas received some extra run off the bench as a residual effect of Rodriguez 's absence , and he turned in 10 points , four assists , two rebounds and a steal to lead the second unit . Nerlens Noel , making his season debut after recovering from a knee injury , was only able to log 10 minutes off the bench before being forced from the game with a sprained ankle . He supplied eight points and a steal during his time on the court . Marcus Morris led the offensive effort for the Pistons ( 13 - 13 ) , registering a game - high 28 points and supplementing them with two rebounds , an assist and a block . Andre Drummond posted a 14 - point , 14 - rebound double - double that also included an assist and a pair of steals . Reggie Jackson filled out the stat sheet with 10 points , three assists , a rebound and two steals . Reggie Jackson led the second unit with 10 points , three assists and a rebound . The Pistons continue on their swing through the Deep South with a visit to the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday night , while the Sixers remain home to face the Detroit Pistons on Friday as well .

The Denver Nuggets blew out the Los Angeles Lakers 129 - 101 at Staples Center on Monday . Denver ( 32 - 35 ) inches closer to a .500 record for the season and more importantly , show cased their ability to blow out the bottom tier teams while also staving off the Portland Trail Blazers for the 8 - seed in the Western Conference playoffs picture . Depth was on display for the Nuggets in the rout , as they went up 67 - 43 at the half and handed over much of the work to the bench , who also flexed their scoring prowess in the win . The Lakers ( 20 - 47 ) were unable to match the shooting efficiency the Nuggets had going , and finished 30 percent from three point range and 43 percent from the field , compared to the lights out 54 percent effort by Denver . Nikola Jokic and Danilo Gallinari each scored 18 points , and combined for 12 rebounds and nine assists . Mason Plumlee scored 15 points and added 10 rebounds across 36 minutes . Jamal Murray and Will Barton each pitched in 22 points and each played 30 minutes , and combined for nine three - pointers . Lakers Ivan Zubac drew the start at center and offered a bright spot in the box score . Zubac scored 25 points , grabbed 11 rebounds and dished out an assist in 30 minutes . Jordan Clarkson added 19 points on 7 - of - 18 shooting , while Brandon Ingram pitched in 14 points , one rebound and two assists . Next up , the Lakers visit the Houston Rockets on Wednesday , while the Nuggets host the Los Angeles Clippers on Thursday .
