The Timberwolves got off to a quick start in this game and took an early lead , finishing the first half up 55 - 47 . Despite shooting better from the field , the Timberwolves did n't have as much success from the three - point line , where they went a meager 27 percent compared to the Suns , who went 27 percent . Making up for their poor three - point shooting , the Timberwolves did it on the defensive side of the ball and forced the Sixers into 18 turnovers , while committing just 21 of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . Karl-Anthony Towns had his way with the starting lineup . He went 10 - for - 18 from the field and 6 - for - 6 from the free throw line to score 27 points , while also grabbing 10 rebounds . The 27 points matched a season - high for Wiggins , while the double - double was his second in the last three games . Karl-Anthony Towns recorded a double - double of his own , finishing with 27 points ( 10 - 18 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 6 - 6 FT ) and 10 rebounds . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 33 points and 54 rebounds in the last two games . The only other player to reach double figures in points was Zach LaVine , who had 15 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 1 - 5 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and one assist in 34 minutes . The Timberwolves ' next game will be at home against the Denver Nuggets on Friday , while the Timberwolves will be at home against the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday .
The Portland Trail Blazers defeated the New Orleans Pelicans 112 - 94 Monday at Smoothie King Center . The Trail Blazers ( 1 - 0 ) came into this game off a disappointing opening loss and put it to the Pelicans ( 0 - 2 ) in this game . The second quarter was especially decisive , as Portland scored 27 points , while holding New Orleans to just 27 in the second half . Defense was key for the Trail Blazers , as they held the Pelicans to 40 percent from the field , 61 percent from the free - throw line and 33 percent from three - point range . Portland also dominated the assist - to - turnover ratio , recording nine more assists than New Orleans , while committing four less turnovers . The Trail Blazers ( 1 - 2 ) had a tough task against the Pelicans and they did n't disappoint . Damian Lillard was the star , as he tallied 21 points , five rebounds and 11 assists . Ryan Anderson was second on the team , as he scored 21 points on 9 - of - 20 shooting . Ed Davis was a spark plug off the bench , accruing 12 points and eight rebounds . The Pelicans will look to play better on Thursday in a road matchup against the Charlotte Hornets . The Pelicans ( 0 - 2 ) have gotten off to a historically bad start offensively this season , but they were able to pull out a win here , thanks to some elite defense . All five starters scored in double figures , with Ryan Anderson leading the team with 21 points . Ryan Anderson was the only other starter in double figures , as he totaled 21 points and nine rebounds . Jrue Holiday led the starters in scoring , tallying 20 points , three rebounds and three assists . New Orleans will look to build off this win on Wednesday against the Atlanta Hawks .
The Golden State Warriors ( 25 - 4 ) defeated the Utah Jazz ( 18 - 11 ) 104 - 74 on Wednesday at Energy Solutions Arena in Salt Lake City . The Warriors got out to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Jazz 19 - 15 in the first quarter alone . The Jazz were the superior shooters in this game , going 44 percent from the field and 39 percent from the three - point line , while the Jazz went 36 percent from the floor and just 30 percent from beyond the arc . The Jazz were also able to force the Jazz into 23 turnovers , while only committing 10 of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Warriors were led by their superstar backcourt of Stephen Curry and Klay Thompson , as they were the only players on the team to reach double figures in points . Curry went a ridiculous 8 - for - 18 from the field and 4 - for - 9 from the three - point line to score 25 points , while also adding four assists and three steals . He shot a combined 8 - for - 27 from the field over his last two games , so it was refreshing to see him find increased succes during Friday 's matchup . Coming off the bench , Joe Johnson added 14 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and two rebounds in 22 minutes . The Warriors ' next game will be on the road against the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday , while the Jazz will travel to Minnesota to play the Timberwolves on Wednesday .
The Memphis Grizzlies ( 23 - 16 ) defeated the Golden State Warriors ( 31 - 6 ) 128 - 119 on Friday at Fed Ex Forum Arena in Memphis . In a meeting of Southwest Division foes , the Grizzlies were able to push past the Warriors in a tough overtime victory and move to the top of their division standings . The Grizzlies were the superior shooters in this game , going 49 percent from the field and 39 percent from the three - point line , while the Warriors went 49 percent from the floor and just 27 percent from beyond the arc . The Grizzlies were also able to force the Warriors into 16 turnovers , while committing only 12 of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . Zach Randolph had his way with the Warriors ' bigs . He went 12 - of - 17 from the field to score a game - high of 27 points , while also adding 11 rebounds and a blocked shot . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 41 points and 40 rebounds over his last two games . Klay Thompson also had a double - double of his own , finishing with 11 points ( 5 - 16 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) and three assists . Although it was n't his best day shooting from the floor , he still made up for it with the opportunities he gave to his teammates . Tony Allen added 11 points ( 5 - 16 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) and 12 rebounds , while Chandler Parsons chipped in with 10 points ( 4 - 7 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt ) and three assists . The Grizzlies ' next game will be on the road against the Boston Celtics on Wednesday , while the Warriors will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Wednesday as well .
